ðŸ”¥Everyone Mocked the Boy for His F-Rank Talent, Until He Became Invincible by Conquering More Women!

Channel: Bella's Comic Chronicles Published: 2026-02-22 247,871 words Source: auto_caption

Transcript

In the center of a high platform in an awakening plaza, the pristine white awakening pillar hummed, emitting a soft glow. Beneath the enormous circular dome, thousands of young men and women gathered, their eyes filled with excitement and tension. This is a world where everyone awakens their talents. Under the iron hooves of star beasts, humanity struggles to survive, and its high-end combat power is in grave danger. Fortunately, everyone can awaken their talents through the awakening pillar upon reaching adulthood.

If one successfully awakens a powerful talent, one will gain strong combat power to fight against star beasts and enjoy countless privileges. However, if one fails to awaken or awakens a low-level talent, one can only sink to the bottom and live a mediocre life. Shin Yuan stood in the queue, his gaze sweeping over the crowd and fixed on the awakening platform, his heart pounded with nervousness, for he was next to step onto the stage. In this world where talent determined destiny, today would decide his future. Next, Shin Yuan.

A cold mechanical voice rang out from the loudspeaker. Shin Yuan stepped forward and under the watchful eyes of countless people, ascended the cold metal platform. He raised his right hand and placed his palm on the awakening stone pillar. The cold touch spread along his skin, calming his agitated emotions slightly. A beam of light suddenly rose up and enveloped him.

The light was not dazzling, but rather dim, displaying a gray color that represented the lowest level. The awakening officer presiding over the ceremony glanced at the light screen, his expression becoming subtle. He cleared his throat and announced loudly in a hesitant tone, "Shen yuan, F- level good luck talent, guaranteed luck every shot." Upon hearing this, the students in the room fell completely silent. But just a few seconds later, a hoof of laughter broke the silence. It was unclear who was the first to burst out laughing.

Laughter quickly spread, and the entire square resounded with a tsunami of laughter. The mocking sounds pierced Shin Yuan's ears like sharp buzzing, leaving his mind in chaos. He never expected that he would awaken a useless support type good luck talent, which was tantamount to a death sentence for him, leaving him with no hope of ever turning his life around. He stood frozen in the pillar of light, feeling utterly hopeless. However, just as he was falling into despair, a cold mechanical voice rang out in his mind without warning.

Ding! The host's special talent and the background of the era have been detected to be highly compatible. The good luck in succession system has been activated. The system notification continued. As long as you win over women who meet the systems requirements and increase their favorability, you can trigger a lucky effect and obtain generous rewards such as talent awakening, potion recipes, and various special items. The system then issued a beginner's task.

Bring good fortune to a pure goddess with a rating of 95 or higher. Condition affection level of 80 or higher. Mission rewards. One, gene potential enhancement potion recipe increases the chance of talent awakening by 30% for ordinary people. Two, the host gains one's second talent awakening opportunity.

The voice in his mind instantly reversed Shun Yuans emotions. His breathing became rapid. He knew that his chance to change his fate had arrived. At this moment, standing before him was a target person who met the systems requirements. Chin Shua, the girl who had awakened an SSS level talent.

A bold plan quickly took shape in his mind. He wanted to win over Chinua, increase her affection for him, complete the newbie tasks issued by the system, and thus win the opportunity to awaken his talent a second time. Next, he will continuously seek out other women who meet his criteria, conquer them one by one, build a powerful herm team, and use the systems rewards to quickly improve his strength and rise to power in this cruel world. After calming himself down, Shinuan quickly ran down from the awakening platform and returned to the crowd. His gaze almost instinctively fell on Chinua.

Just then, Ziao Jingua and Li Yun, a couple from the largest civilian armed company in the East China Sea, and even the entire empire, came to the scene and took Shin Yuan and Shinui on the grounds that Shin Yuan's talent was somewhat special. The train carriage was spacious, yet it seemed to be invisibly divided into two different worlds. On one side were Xiao Jingua and his wife Le Yun surrounding Chinua. Their words filled with boundless anticipation for the future. Chinua, don't worry.

Once you arrive at the umbrella base, everything will be arranged to the highest standards. Although her majesty the Empress has a somewhat cold temper, she is always extremely kind to her own people. If you can become her disciple, your future will be limitless. Chin Schwa simply nodded, speaking very little and sparingly. Yet her calm and composed demeanor still delighted Xiao Jingua and his wife.

On the other side of the carriage, Shin Yuan sat alone in a corner, seemingly out of place amidst the hustle and bustle. Leaning against the window, he gazed at the city silhouettes rushing past, and the plan he had just drafted involuntarily surfaced in his mind. With his frrank talent, Chinua probably wouldn't even give him a second glance. To win her over with personal charm and get her to willingly grant him good luck. That's far more absurd than asking him to single-handedly fight a lordle star beast.

No, I absolutely can't do it on my own. Shinuan quickly processed his thoughts. The rewards given by the good luck in succession system were simply too incredible. Gene potential enhancement potion. It could increase the probability of an ordinary person's talent awakening by 30%.

What does this mean? It means that capable awakened ones can be created in a continuous stream. And that other reward, the opportunity for a secondary talent awakening is his only hope to get rid of his F-rank useless talent. Fortune favors the bold. An incredibly audacious idea rapidly took shape in his mind. If he were to work alone, he'd probably be busy forever to complete the task.

But if you want to advance quickly, you have to find the strongest backer to cling to. Umbrella Corporation. Just hearing the name makes you think of the kind of company you can cling to tightly. The mag lev train traversed numerous checkpoints before finally stopping deep within a heavily guarded underground base. The metal doors opened, releasing a chilling and menacing aura.

Led by Ziao Jingua and his wife Shin Yuan and Shin Shu entered a secluded room devoid of any decoration. At the head of the table sat a kind-faced old man with white hair. He wore a simple gray Jehong Sean suit, exuding a reserved air like a kind grandfather next door. Beside him stood a tall, beautiful woman. Her crimson combat uniform accentuated her perfect curves, and her eyes flashed with a sharp, almost electric light, the exquisite war goddess.

As soon as Xiao Jingua and his wife entered, they respectfully bowed to the woman in red. She was none other than Yu Ling Long, one of the five pillars of the human race and the exquisite war goddess. Shin Yuans heart tightened suddenly. The person before him was a genuine powerhouse, standing at the very top of the pyramid. Yu Ling Longs gaze didn't linger on anyone else, landing directly on Chinua, her sharp eyes instantly turning fiery.

Indeed, you are of Ice Phoenix bloodline with excellent potential. She made no attempt to hide her admiration and announced directly. By order of the empress, from this day forward, you will be my last disciple, Yu Ling Long. As soon as she finished speaking, she flicked her finger and a jade pendant radiating coldness flew towards Chinua. This is the ice heart jade, which can stabilize bloodlines and accelerate cultivation.

This book, The Profound Ice Nine Heavens Technique, is a cultivation method personally passed down by Her Majesty the Empress, and I bestow it upon you as well. Xiao Jingua and Li Yun stared wideeyed, their faces filled with envy. That was the ice heart jade, a priceless treasure. And there was also the profound ice nine heavens technique, a fundamental method personally taught by the empress. Chinu respectfully accepted the jade pendant and the cultivation manual, bowed, and said, "Disciple Chin Schwe greets master." Yuing Long nodded in satisfaction and turned to leave.

Just as she turned around, Yuling Longs gaze finally landed on Shin Yuan. With just one glance, Shin Yuan felt as if the blood in his body had frozen. It was an absolute suppression from a higher level of life. Yuing Long said calmly, "I'm taking Chinua with me. This is your company's business.

You can make your own arrangements." After saying that, she left with Chinua without lingering. Shinuans heart sank. Sure enough, he was just a freebie to be picked up along with others. He was even prepared to face Chinu's mocking or indifferent gaze. After all, not long ago, he had confessed his feelings to this prodigy.

Her answer at the time was both direct and realistic. If you can awaken your talent and defeat me in the prodigy battle a year from now, I will accept your proposal. He has awakened the most useless frank talent of good fortune in history. While she has awakened the SSS rank ice phoenix bloodline, soaring to new heights, the difference is like an insurmountable chasm. Shinuan's fist clenched silently in his sleeve.

Just as Chinua was about to step out of the secret room, she suddenly stopped, turned her head slightly, and her clear, cold eyes finally landed on Shen Yuan. She looked at him calmly, her red lips parting slightly. The Battle of the Prodigies in a little over a month. I'll be waiting for you there. With that, she turned and disappeared out the door with Yu Ling Long without looking back.

Shinyuan was completely stunned. Was this an insult or something else? Countless thoughts flashed through his mind, but they ultimately coalesed into an indescribable heat. He suddenly smiled. Whatever her meaning, it at least proved that in her heart, he wasn't a completely transparent background figure. A battle of prodigies, is it good? In the secret room, only Shun Yuan, Xiao, Jingua, and his wife, and the white-haired old man with a constant smile remained.

Little one, were you frightened? The white-haired old man picked up his teacup, took a slow sip, and looked at Shin Yuan. That girl Ling Long, that's just her temper. Ziao Jingwa quickly introduced, "Shuan, this is ElderQin. His full name is Chin Jean, a ninth realm demagod titled Madslaughter." When Zhiao Jingua said these words, his tone was full of heartfelt respect. The title mad slaughterer was not self-proclaimed, but rather a fearsome name forged amidst mountains of corpses and seas of blood piled high with the bones of countless star beasts.

Shinjan possessed neither a distinguished family background nor top tier talent. He was the only rogue cultivator on blue star without any connections who had yet reached the pinnacle of power. Shinyuan's heart skipped a beat, and he immediately bowed respectfully. This seemingly ordinary old man who looked just like a chess player in a park was actually a legendary ninth realm demagod who could single-handedly annihilate a beast tide, and his strength was even above you Linglongs. Don't be so reserved.

Sit down. Old Sheen gestured to the chair opposite him, his tone gentle. Shinwa has already told me about your matter. Shin Yuans heart tightened and he unconsciously rubbed his hands together knowing that the real show was about to begin. ElderQin, why did you call me here? ElderQin put down his teacup, a smile on his face, but said something that was enough to shake people's hearts.

Young man, you may not know this. The stronger a martial artist is, the more doineering their gene chain becomes, and the more difficult it is to leave offspring. currently within the empire in the company, including myself, over 90% of the top experts have no offspring. Our high-end combat power is on the verge of extinction. He sighed softly.

Therefore, your talent is not wasted. Old Sheen's words, "Your talent is not wasted," struck Shinuan like a heavy hammer. But before he could even ponder the deeper meaning of those words, Old Sheen's next action shocked everyone present. The approachable old man suddenly stood up, solemnly straightened his collar, and then bowed respectfully to the air. "Little one, have you always felt that you have an innocent background, that you're an orphan with no parents and a pitiful, helpless child?" Old Sheen sat down again, his gaze fixed intently on Shin Yuan.

Shin Yuan was taken aback, then nodded subconsciously. "Isn't that right?" I grew up in an orphanage. It's all clearly written in my file. Old Sheen chuckled softly, tapping his fingers on the mahogany tabletop with a deep, resonant sound. That thing, if I wanted, could forge a thousand unique files for you.

I could even package you as the illegitimate son of a space pirate. Shinuan's lips twitched involuntarily. This old man looked kind and gentle, but his words carried a thuggish air. Shinuan, listen carefully. Old Chen's smile vanished, and his deep brown eyes instantly became incredibly sharp.

An invisible pressure quietly spread out, and even the air seemed to freeze. Bringing you here was not a spur-of-the- moment decision by Jinua and me, nor was it simply for recruitment. Jingua and I are all members of the Umbrella Corporation. Our goal is simple. In an era ravaged by star beasts, to preserve the last spark of humanity and cultivate future strong men, Old Sheen explained calmly.

Every year, we search for promising talents during the awakening ceremonies in major base cities, recruit them into our ranks, provide them with the best resources to support their growth, and then hunt star beasts together to protect our home. Chinua is one of the targets we have chosen this time. But you are different. At this point, his tone suddenly became solemn, and he uttered a shocking sentence. Word by word.

Bringing you here was a secret order personally issued by her majesty, the Supreme Empress, from the depths of the universe. Boom! Shiny Yuan's mind was struck as if by lightning, his thoughts instantly thrown into chaos. The Empress, that being who ruled the entire human realm, suppressed all races, and was revered as a god by countless beings. He was merely a nobody who had awakened an F-rank talent. How could he possibly catch the eye of such a being? Just before your awakening ceremony began, a top level encrypted communication directly cut into my private channel.

Old Sheen's tone was low with an undisguised awe in his eyes. The empress's exact words. On the day Shinuan awakens, immediately guide him and do everything in your power to protect him. If the East Sea is breached, abandon the company to save him. Xiao Jingua and Lie Yun were already sweating profusely.

Although they knew the mission was to pick someone up, they never imagined the order would be so harsh to abandon a super company with hundreds of thousands of martial artists and a complete system for one person. Just who was this Shinuan? Shinuan himself was completely stunned. He swallowed hard, pointed to his nose, and said, "Elder Chin, you're not joking, are you? You're going to protect me." Old Sheen slowly shook his head, his gaze deep and unfathomable. "I can't find a single thing about your background. Before you turned 18, your file was a top secret document of the highest level, which I have no right to view.

But since it was the empress herself who gave the order, it means that you are burdened with karma that we cannot access." As he spoke, he leaned forward slightly, his previously kind, neighborly grandfather, demeanor vanishing instantly, replaced by a ruthless and indomitable aura, as if he had fought his way through mountains of corpses and seas of blood. So, Shinuan, from today onwards, Umbrella Corporation is your home. You only need to do one thing. Become stronger and then survive. Looking at the old man before him, Shin Yuan felt a long-lost warmth welling up in his heart.

But this was quickly followed by a profound sense of absurdity. He had intended to lie down and relax, but instead he had been unexpectedly struck by a powerful, unexpected benefactor. And this wasn't just any ordinary benefactor. It was the kind of benefactor so powerful it seemed to reach the heavens. Since that's the case, Shinuan took a deep breath.

His previously hunched back, straightening up a bit. The systems offer was already outstretched. Any further hesitation would be ungrateful. With the system task right in front of him, relying solely on his F-rank physique, completing the task and winning over the goddess seemed like a distant dream. Old Sheen, since you've put it this way, I won't keep anything from you.

Shin Yuans usual nonchalant attitude faded somewhat, replaced by a firm and serious look in his eyes. Ziao Jingua and Lie Yun exchanged a glance, their eyes filled with curiosity. "What secrets could this kid possibly have?" The infallible luck displayed on the awakening platform is actually just a manifestation of my talent," Shin Yuan said without changing his expression, speaking nonsense with a straight face. Of course, he knew in his heart that this wasn't lying. The system itself was part of his power.

What if I told you that my talent is far more powerful than you imagine? What if I told you that I can help more ordinary people awaken their talents? As soon as he finished speaking, Old Chin's expression clearly froze. Xiao Jingwa and Le Yun also frowned. Shinuans words sounded rather exaggerated. Help ordinary people awaken their talents. How dare an F- level awakener make such a claim? However, Shin Yuan didn't give them a chance to question.

He quickly focused his mind and issued a command to the system in his mind. Buzz, a pale blue virtual light screen, which only Shin Yuan and ElderQin could see, quietly appeared in front of ElderQ. The information displayed on the screen had been slightly beautified by Shun Yuan, making it appear to appropriately showcase the systems capabilities. Good luck galore. FF level talent grants good luck to a female character with a score of 95 or higher.

Mission rewards. One, gene potential enhancement potion recipe can increase the chance of talent awakening by 30% for ordinary people. Two, the host will receive one's second talent awakening opportunity. The smile on Old Sheen's face froze instantly, and shock and disbelief appeared in his eyes. The Celadone teacup slipped silently from his hand.

Crack! The teacup shattered on the hard floor, breaking into several pieces. The crisp sound of shattering was particularly jarring in the silent enclosed room. Ziao Jingua and Li Yun were startled, not daring to utter a sound. Even the most composed Ninth Realm demagod, ElderQin, who remained unmoved, even in the face of a collapsing mountain, had actually accidentally shattered his most beloved teacup. Chapter 4.

Lying flat, I clinged to a powerful figure. Old Sheen looked at Shan Yuan, his gaze shifting from amiable to sharp as a blade, as if trying to see through his entire secret. The atmosphere in the secret room instantly became heavy, an invisible pressure washing over Shun Yuan, making it difficult for him to even breathe. Jean serum, second awakening. Old Sheen slowly sat up straight, the smile on his face vanishing, replaced by the calm and authoritative demeanor of someone in a high position.

Words are meaningless. You need to provide evidence. Despite the overwhelming aura emanating from him, Shinuan secretly breathed a sigh of relief. This was exactly what he wanted to hear. Questioning was acceptable, but a direct rejection was not.

He forced a calm smile and spoke in a composed tone. "Elder Chin, my good luck, actually has an additional ability. I can access some rather private information simply by touching a woman." He then turned his gaze to the icy face of Li Yun not far away. To verify my abilities and to ensure the authenticity of the confidential information, how about having Li Yun cooperate? Lie Yuns face darkened, her eyes turning icy as she stared directly at Shun Yuan, her aura overwhelming. Xiao Jingwa also frowned instinctively.

This kid was far too audacious. Wua Leun, you two stepped back. Old Sheen, however, didn't get angry, but smiled, a hint of interest flashing in his eyes. Fine, I'd like to see what you can find out. Leons expression was complicated, but she finally extended her right hand.

Her hand was fair and slender, but there were faint calluses on the base of her thumb and the knuckles, clearly the marks of long-term training. All three eyes focused on each other, and Shinuan didn't hesitate, gently touching the back of her hand with his finger. The moment his fingertips made contact, a blue light screen visible only to him appeared in his mind. Subject of investigation. Le Yun age 28.

Talent B-level strength amplification cultivation. Fifth Realm Grandmaster appearance rating 92. Figure rating 91. Status. Partner Xiao Jinga.

Number of investigations 3,000. Shin Yuans eye twitched slightly. This system was far too unreliable. He almost clicked the expand more option but ultimately steadied himself. Ahem.

He cleared his throat and began his report. Le Yun, 28 years old. The three elders remained calm. This information could be found online. B-level power enhancement.

Fifth realm Grandmaster cultivation. Ziao Jingua and Lie Yun exchanged a glance, their eyes narrowing. Talent level was known to the outside world, but cultivation level was classified. Shin Yuan continued reading. Appearance score 92, figure score 91.

As soon as he said this, Lean's expression changed visibly, and Shin Yuan immediately skipped over the rest of the detailed description. Overall score 92. The air suddenly fell silent. A scoring system? What nonsense? Xiao Jingua looked completely bewildered while Leans face turned from white to red, filled with shame and indignation. Just as everyone was wondering, Shin Yuans expression changed and he unleashed his final devastating blow.

There's one last piece of information. He deliberately dragged out his words, his expression turning strange. Number of times, 3,000. Number of times. Old Chin didn't immediately understand what that meant.

But Xiao Jingua and Lie Yuns expressions changed drastically, almost simultaneously, turning bright red, especially Li Yun, whose face instantly flushed crimson. Her eyes fixed intently on Shin Yuan. Shinyuan glanced at the system panel, clicked on the question mark next to a number of times, and an explanation note immediately popped up. Note refers to the number of times with a partner. It's an important reference for measuring emotional and physical qualities.

Shinyuan coughed lightly, forcing himself to remain calm. Judging from the feedback from my talent, this number seems to be some kind of data related to marital relations. Xiaoing nearly choked and fainted. Le Yun was so ashamed she didn't want to live anymore. She must be crazy to believe that someone else would know about this.

At that moment, however, old Sheen was suddenly jolted, his eyes filled with unusual excitement. He completely ignored their awkwardness and turned to asking, "How long have you been married?" Zhiaoings face turned red, but he still answered honestly, "3 years and 2 months." Old Sheen's eyes narrowed, and a strange light flashed in them. He immediately asked the crucial question, "Is this true?" Xiao Jingwa and Li Yun exchanged glances for a moment and finally nodded simultaneously under Old Chin's gaze. That's right. Last night was the anniversary of their third breakthrough of a thousand times.

They had never mentioned this information to anyone. How did Shinuan know? Good. Good. Haha. Old Sheen suddenly stood up with a loud laugh, slamming his hand heavily on the alloy tabletop with a deafening bang.

It's all real. This ability is actually real. His laughter was filled with joy and relief, as well as a release that had been suppressed for a long time. Xiao Jingua and Li Yun were completely bewildered, unable to keep up at all. They then realized that ElderQin's verification was actually to confirm the ability Shinuan had mentioned.

Could this kid's F-level talent really be extraordinary? Just as the two were still processing this astonishing fact, Old Sheen suddenly rushed forward and grabbed Shinuan's shoulder. child, what do you want? Our umbrella corporation is willing to fully support you. Shinyuan was shaken until he was dizzy, but he was already overjoyed inside. You ask me what I want. Of course, I want nothing and then you can give it all to me.

He feigned an indifference to fame and fortune as if money were dirt. Old Sheen, I ask for nothing. He raised his head, his voice firm. I, Shin Yuan, am willing to wholeheartedly obey the arrangements of the Umbrella Corporation without any complaints. Xiao Jingua and Lie Yun were both stunned.

Just a moment ago, wasn't this guy terrified, saying he didn't want to be dissected? And now he's a hot-blooded warrior. Old Sheen, on the other hand, was filled with satisfaction. The more he looked at Shu Yuan, the more he felt he was a treasure. Talented yet not arrogant and so loyal. He's the company's most valuable asset.

Chapter 5. Buying the Umbrella Corporation's fortress. Payment successful. The air in the secret room seemed to freeze for half a second before being broken by Old Sheen's hearty laughter echoing in every corner. Good.

Good. His eyes were full of intense praise. As if he had found a ray of hope for the future, and he was extremely gratified. He pulled out a dark, heavy-l looking jade pendant from his pocket. It was carved with a coiled dragon, and a faint light shimmerred in the dragon's eyes.

Even a layman would know that this jade pendant was no ordinary item. Without a word, he casually hung the jade pendant around Shin Yuan's neck as if giving him an ordinary ornament. Dragon soul jade. This old man has worn it for 60 years. He said it lightly, but his tone revealed something unusual.

It's not very useful. It can only block all attacks from those below the fifth realm Grandmaster. Shin Yuan nearly threw the jade pendant away. His hands were trembling. This was called not very useful.

Did that mean he could live several more lives? Before he could recover from this wave of surprise, old Sheen pulled out a black card and stuffed it into his hand. The card had no number or logo, only a faint golden dragon pattern. It looked understated yet luxurious and felt inexplicably heavy. "The dragon card," his majesty specifically instructed me to use it," Elder Cheen said in a low voice, his tone tinged with a mischievous joking. It's her private stash of money from the treasury, and there's no limit to the amount.

Feel free to use it. Don't be shy about buying anything on Earth. Shinyuan stared at the card, feeling a bit giddy. Was this the joy of being a kept man and doing it with such self-righteousness? Old Chin patted him on the shoulder, his expression turning serious. With Jingua and Li Yun and Don Hai, I'm at ease.

You only need to remember one thing. Live. How to live. What to do is up to you. After speaking, Old Sheen turned and left, leaving the three of them awkwardly staring at each other.

A moment of silence filled the secret room, the atmosphere so subtly amusing it was almost comical. Ziao Jingua looked at Shin Yuan with a complex expression as if he hadn't yet recovered from his recent social death. Lie Yun turned her head away, her face still slightly flushed. At this moment, Shinuan weighed the dragon card in his hand, then suddenly turned to Xiao Jingua and asked, "Seriously," "Brother Xiao, does our company sell houses?" Ziao Jingua spat out the water he had just drunk, coughing until his face turned red. "What did you say?" Lean also turned her head sharply, looking at him with a shocked expression as if she had seen some monster.

"The Umbrella Corporation is a top tier fighting fortress in the civilian world, not some real estate company." Shun Yuan argued confidently, waving the card as if it were the most natural thing in the world. Old Sheen said, "My mission is to survive. Staying safe is the top priority. This secret room is nice, but we can't live here forever, can we? I don't trust the accommodations you've arranged. I want to buy my own house.

Right here in the Umbrella headquarters, the most secure and safest kind, where no one can break in." Lie Yun was momentarily speechless at his words, while Xiao Jing was lips twitched. They'd met many geniuses. Some wanted weapons, some wanted secret manuals, some wanted the blood of divine beasts. But this guy, who immediately asked, "Are you selling your house," was truly a first. The key point was that what he said actually made a lot of sense.

Ziao Jingua sighed and explained, "The houses within the base are not for sale in principle. They are only allocated to core high-ranking officials." "Then am I not a core member now?" Shinuan retorted, his tone serious. Ziaoin was speechless with his majesty's secret order, Elder Chin's jade pendant, and the black card in hand. If he's not a core member, then who is? He paused for a moment before finally saying, "Yes, there is one." In the core area of the base, there is fortress number one, which was originally the company founder's refuge. The alloy walls are 10 m thick and have their own independent energy system capable of withstanding a full force attack from a ninth realm expert.

Shinyuans eyes lit up and he immediately slapped his thigh. That's it. How much? I'll buy it. Ziao Xing Wu was practically going crazy. That's a strategic asset.

It's never been sold to outsiders before. Name your price. Shin Yuan handed over the dragon card, saying casually, "Is my personal savings enough?" Xiao Jingua stared at the card, his throat dry and his heart skipping a beat. He gritted his teeth, dialed the internal communication, and after a low growl, managed to utter an astronomical figure. 300 billion credit points.

He then stared intently at Shin Yuan, trying to see if he would show any shock. Shinuan simply gave a curt, "Oh," and held up the card, "Swipe card!" Xiaoing froze completely, taking the card with trembling hands. He gently swiped it across the terminal. Beep! Payment successful. The moment the electronic voice rang out, Xiao Jingua and Lie Yun froze on the spot.

Their expressions shifting from surprise to bewilderment and then to blankness. They finally understood this wasn't recruiting a genius. This was bringing back a walking talking super rich patron. Just then, there was a knock on the door of the secret room and a special forces team in black entered. The captain at the head of the team gave a crisp military salute.

Mr. Shan, the transfer of ownership of fortress number one has been completed. Please come with us for inspection. Chapter 6. A Lind Dau falls from the sky.

Shin Yuan was escorted out of the secret room by a special forces team. Along the way, he passed through multiple layers of security, and each door required dual verification of his iris and jeans, making the security level ridiculously high. Only after passing through the last heavy alloy gate did he finally arrive at the so-called fortress number one. Mr. Shawn, this is your private residence.

The special forces captain personally opened the last door for him, his tone filled with undisguised respect and envy. The door slowly slid open, revealing to Shun Yuan not a cold steel space, but a minimalist yet extremely luxurious technological residence. Instead of carpet, the floor is made of a warm jade-like material that feels like walking on clouds. Light yet grounding. The fortress is predominantly milky white with blue skies and white clouds projected from the ceiling and the lighting automatically adjusts according to the time and temperature.

The interior lacks traditional partitions. All functional areas are divided by light and shadow projections and retractable smart walls, a highly advanced design. The living room, bedroom, and meditation room are integrated into one spacious and airy environment with smart touch panels emitting floating blue light throughout. The fortress's daily needs are managed by the intelligent AI. Friday, all ingredients are of the highest quality and specially supplied.

If needed, just wake it up. The special forces soldier saluted and retreated to the door. Shinyuan closed the door alone, and the entire space instantly became silent. He put down his backpack and wandered around the room as excited as a child opening a blind box until he saw the large bathtub carved from warm jade in the bathroom. The pipes connected to it flowed with diluted spiritual liquid which could not only be used for bathing but also nourish the body.

How luxurious. Shin Yuan sighed as he laid down in the spiritual liquid. Closing his eyes contentedly as if he were finally truly living. He chewed on a crimson flame fruit, a bloodnourishing spiritual fruit stored in the refrigerator. One bite warmed his entire body.

He chewed while toying with the black dragon card, its edges gleaming coldly in the light. unlimited funds, a private stash bestowed by the empress herself. Truly a top tier existence. However, he quickly thought of the system task to find a suitable target. Should he send the Umbrella Corporation to find one? Shin Yuan shook his head, immediately rejecting the idea.

Those people were strong in combat, but their aesthetic sense might mislead him. He didn't even want to think about sending a few muscular women. Instead of asking others for help, I'd rather handle it myself. Shin Yuan got out of the bathtub, wrapped a towel around his neck, and walked across the warm floor to the arched French window. The window wasn't made of glass, but was a single high-end virtual reality screen reflecting the night view of Donghai City with neon lights flashing like a flowing galaxy.

Friday, he called softly and a gentle neutral electronic voice immediately filled the room. Sir, what can I do for you? Contact the top headunting firm in Donghai City or a socialite club. I need to hire 10 personal assistants aged 18 to 24 with decent looks and clean backgrounds. Regardless of whether they are hired or not, each person will be paid 50,000 yuan for travel expenses up front, Shinuan said calmly. For hours later, the fortress gates sounded and 10 women of different styles lined up to enter.

Leun even personally led the group through the security check. Shinuan changed into a loose silk robe and lazily sat on the floating sofa in the center. On the coffee table were black dragon cards and a pile of cash transferred from the bank stacked into a small bright red mountain. Let them in. 10 women filed in each with a different makeup style and distinct temperament immediately filling the air with a strong scent of perfume.

They looked at Shun Yuan, then glanced at the banknotes on the coffee table, their eyes burning with undisguised desire. Relax," Shinuan said calmly, picking up his glass of red wine. "Ill judge them by appearance and fortune. Those who catch my eye can stay, and those who take the money and leave can go." He walked to the first woman, who, dressed in a red dress, gave him a flirtatious wink. Her makeup was as exquisite as a stage stars.

Shin Yuan lightly tapped the back of her hand, and a system panel popped up with information. Wong Lily, 22 years old, appearance score 75. Excessive plastic surgery, inferior jeans, not recommended. He twitched his lips and unhesitatingly tossed out a watt of cash. Travel expenses.

Next one. The second person was a woman in workout clothes with clearly defined muscles. Zhao Chiian, 25 years old. Appearance score 88. Body score 93.

Number of attempts 1588. Suggestion fitness interaction. Shin Yuans eyelids twitched and he coughed lightly. You can go down too. In the blink of an eye, all nine people had been screamed and Shin Yuans expression had changed from expectation to disappointment.

These high-end standards are too lax. Just as he was about to give up, his gaze fell on the last girl. She was wearing a faded blue dress and worn out canvas shoes, standing far back like a little rabbit, ready to run away at any moment. She was clutching the hem of her dress, her head bowed, her whole body trembling with nervousness, huddled in the shadows. Shinyuan's heart stirred slightly, he slowly walked up to her and said softly, "Lift your head." The girl looked up, revealing a face that was naturally beautiful, yet breathtakingly so.

Her eyes were slightly red, and her expression was timid. Shin yuan gently touched the back of her hand, and a screen of light appeared. Lynn Sharon 19 years old appearance 95 figure 97 naturally beautiful without any editing state pure background former ays of the Lynn group her family was destroyed 3 years ago leaving her heavily in debt suggestion intervene with a protective stance to increase favorability shiny heart skipped a beat wasn't this the person he was looking for the system hadn't lied after all chapter 7 a date with Lin Sharon Umbrella Corporation Shinyuan Juan was overjoyed. He immediately looked at the manager who had led the team, his voice crisp and decisive. The rest of you can leave.

He casually grabbed a few stacks of cash and tossed them to the unselected women, but his finger pointed steadily at Lin Sharon. You stay. Soon, only the two of them remained in the large living room, and the air suddenly became silent and awkward. Lynn Sharon stood there like a small statue, motionless, neither daring to move forward nor backward. She looked down at Shun Yuan, and tears finally welled up in her eyes, rolling down her cheeks and dripping onto the floor.

She knew what staying meant. The manager had made it clear. If she was chosen, she would receive a huge sum of money, enough to solve all her problems. She could pay off the lone sharks and save the old house her parents had left her. But what about her dignity? She bit her lip hard until she tasted blood.

Looking at her, ready to die expression, Shinuan couldn't help but rub his forehead. He wasn't a monster, and he wasn't exactly scaryl looking, was he? He walked back to the sofa, picked up the kettle, poured a glass of warm water, and pointed to the sofa opposite him. Sit! Lynn Char didn't move, remaining frozen in place, as if she were rooted to the spot. "What? Afraid I'll eat you?" Shinuan chuckled, trying to sound easygoing. "Don't worry.

I don't like forcing people, especially girls who are crying." Lynch sobbed slightly, hesitated for a moment, then carefully moved to the edge of the sofa, sitting only on the corner. She crossed her arms over her chest, looking at him wearily, "What's your name?" Shin Yuan pretended not to know and asked casually, "Lin Sharon." Her voice was so soft, it was almost inaudible, like a mosquito's hum. "Do you know why you're here?" Shin Yuan continued. Lynn Sharons face instantly flushed red, a wave of shame washing over her. She lowered her head, her lips trembling.

To be a personal assistant. I'll do anything for money. The last few words were barely audible. Anything. Shinuan raised an eyebrow, leaning forward.

How about having my baby? Lyn Sharon looked up abruptly, her face filled with shock and disbelief. She had thought it would be just to keep him company at most, but having a baby? She wasn't prepared at all. Unwilling, Shin Yuan leaned back on the sofa, picking up the dragon card and twirling it casually. Then you can leave. The door's over there and the 50,000 yuan travel expenses will still be paid.

Upon hearing the words leave, Lynn Charn's body visibly trembled, her fingertips shaking slightly. 50,000, not even enough to cover this month's interest. If she didn't get the money tonight, the creditors would come and demolish the house tomorrow, throwing all her parents' belongings onto the street. She had no choice. I'm willing.

Lynn Sharon closed her eyes, tears streaming down her face again, her voice trembling softly. She reached out, her hands trembling to unbutton her clothes. Hey, stop. Stop. Shinuan quickly stood up and shouted, "What are you doing? Who told you to take your clothes off?" This girl was too honest.

He was just asking, not telling her to get down to business. Although, he was also quite interested in watching. If he messed up the systems favorability mechanism and the mission failed, wouldn't he be at a huge loss? Put your clothes on properly. Shinyuan sighed, looking disgusted. I'm not the kind of person who forces people to do things against their will.

I value mutual affection. Understand? Lynn Sharon stared at him blankly, somewhat confused about what this wealthy man was trying to do. Shin Yuan waved the dragon card in his hand, his tone slightly somber. Lynn Sharon, I know you're short of money. I know everything about your parents' old house, your debts, and the Lynn group.

Hearing Lynn Group, Lynn Sharon suddenly became alert. her eyes instantly turning defensive. Don't be nervous. I'm not a bad person. Shinyuan walked over and lowered his voice.

I can help you. I can help you pay off your debts, save the old house, and even take back everything you've lost. Lynn Char's eyes widened, unable to believe her ears. I only want one thing from you. Shinuan reached out and gently wiped away the tears from the corners of her eyes.

Try to fall in love with me or cooperate with me and have a relationship. Lynn Sharon was stunned, completely dumbfounded. Dating, paying off hundreds of millions in debt just to date? Was this man crazy? Wipe your tears, Shinuan said, pulling her up, his eyes serious. Come with me. Where to? Lynch asked instinctively.

Shin Yuan turned and smiled, revealing a set of perfectly white teeth. To create some romance, of course. A relationship always needs a sense of ritual. A magv car smoothly pulled up in front of the VIP entrance to Star Dream Park, Shinuan got out, bent down to straighten his casual clothes worth hundreds of thousands. Still feeling a little uncomfortable, he felt like he was on a special operations mission, cenamed Heartbreaker, and his target was standing quietly by the carousel railing.

Lynn Chur, she stood there in a pale purple butterfly patterned gauze dress, light and flowing like a dream. The hem of the dress swayed gently, revealing a pair of long, straight legs that appeared as white as snow in the sunlight. Sunlight filtered through the branches and leaves, casting a halo of light upon her, making her seem as if she had stepped out of a fairy tale. Her face was pure and clean, without a trace of makeup, yet as clear and translucent as the first snow in the mountains. Breathtakingly beautiful.

Regardless of gender, passers by couldn't help but glance at her. Even arguing couples would instantly stop the man from speaking and children would cease their crying, pointing at her and calling her fairy sister. It was a pure unadulterated admiration, a natural yearning for beauty. She clutched the hem of her skirt tightly with her left hand, her right hand pressed against her chest, looking extremely nervous. This awkward posture, ironically, accentuated the stunning curves of her figure.

Shin Yuan's heart felt as if it were being gripped by an invisible hand, his breath catching in his throat. He admitted that when he first saw the systems rating, he had only considered Lin Churin as a mission objective. But now, this blushing, nervous girl stood before him, his usually hardened heart suddenly softened. A mission was a mission, but a person was a person. He walked towards her, his steps slow but firm.

Lynn Sharon heard footsteps and timidly looked up. When she saw it was Shun Yuan, a flicker of panic crossed her eyes and a blush instantly spread across her cheeks. Shin Yuan stopped in front of her, revealing a smile as gentle as possible. He didn't rush to speak, but simply gazed at her quietly. In his mind, he silently recited, "System, investigate.

Target: Lynn Sharon, current favorability 60. Initial nervousness and curiosity 60 points. Not bad, but not terrible either." Shinuan made up his mind and before she could react, reached out and gently took her cold right hand that was resting on her chest. Let's go. Didn't you want to ride the carousel? Lynn Chars body trembled slightly.

Her first instinct being to pull her hand away. But Shin Yuan's grip was just right. Neither too tight nor too loose, neither offensive nor impossible to break free from. She tried several times but couldn't pull away and finally had no choice but to let him lead her towards that dreamlike world of interwoven lights. Accompanied by light music, the carousel slowly started moving.

Shin Yuan insisted that the two of them ride together on an exquisitely decorated white horse with Lin Char in front and him behind. Very close. He could smell the faint fragrance of shampoo in her hair and feel the subtle stiffness and trembling in her body. The atmosphere suddenly became quiet and delicate. Just then, two couples were sitting on two wooden horses nearby.

One man wrapped his arms around his female companion from behind, resting his chin gently on her shoulder, whispering, "Sweet nothings." The other was even more direct, his arms around the girl's waist, laughing heartily in rhythm with the music. Shin Yuans eye twitched, and he silently cursed inwardly. "They've even arranged a live lesson. These umbrella agents are too professional." He hesitated for a second, then followed suit, wrapping his arms around Lin Char from behind to gently hug her. The moment they touched, he felt the soft, warm body of the young woman in his arms.

Unfortunately, his hand went a little too high, touching a spot he shouldn't have. Lynn Sharon's body instantly stiffened, her face flushing crimson to the roots of her neck. She quickly pressed both hands against the back of Shun Yuan's hands as if she had been electrocuted and dared not let go. Only after confirming he wasn't moving again did she carefully lean back, her back pressed against his firm chest. Shin Yuans heart pounded.

He felt like he was holding a ball of fire. Just as he was about to adjust his hand position, he noticed the two couples beside him looking at him with strange expressions. One of them secretly pointed to his stomach, then to Shun Yuan's hand, mouthing two words. Waist. Waist.

He instantly understood. His hand was too high. It was over the line. Shiny Yuan quickly tried to put his hand back down, but the direction of his movement was wrong. It went upwards.

As a result, the back of his hand solidly went up another inch. "Ah!" Lyncharin let out a very soft gasp, pressing his hand down tightly with both hands, her face burning like a cooked shrimp. "Don't move! This is outside," she said in a pitifully soft voice, almost fainting from embarrassment. Shin yuan froze, completely still, as if he had become a wooden sculpture. The two couples were also stunned, clearly not expecting the plot to fall apart, and they all turned to look at the sky, pretending to admire the ceiling.

A nearby passerby, agent whispered through his earpiece, calling Hawkeye. Target has deviated from the planned trajectory. He's entered sector C. Hawkeye. Okay.

Damn, I saw it, too. Did he hold the training manual upside down? Captain, this mission is harder than hunting Cberus. This isn't a mission. It's a test of our psychological limits. Shin Yuan inwardly groaned.

He used to be a complete weakling, but now this was a social disaster. If he continued with this kind of skill, he'd probably turn his 95 points of goodwill into a negative 95. So, he gave up on physical actions and started trying to ease the awkwardness with words. He chatted softly with Lin Char about the weather, asked her what she liked to do, and even mentioned some interesting things at school. His voice was gentle, the conversation light, and there wasn't a single idle word.

Gradually, Lynn Chur began to respond. Although her voice was still soft, her mood had clearly relaxed. As the last piece of music from the carousel began to play, the horse slowly came to a stop. Shin Yuan carefully helped Lin Char, whose legs were clearly a little weak. Off the horse.

Just then, a system notifications sounded in his mind. Ding. Targets favorability plus 5. Current favorability 65. A smile crept onto Shun Yuan's lips.

There was hope. There really was hope. Chapter 8. Nourished by Dragon Chi, upgrading talent. The next challenge is the legendary haunted house.

Shun Yuan and Lin Char stood before the eerie entrance from which piercing screams echoed intermittently. "Lin Charuns face turned pale, her hands gripping Shu Yuans clothes tightly, her strength increasing with each passing moment." "Maybe we shouldn't go," she said timidly in a low voice. "Don't worry, I'm here." Shin Yuan patted his chest, showing a man's got to step up attitude, and then took her hand and walked inside. The haunted house was pitch black with gusts of cold wind and a damp, decaying smell. Lynch was so frightened that she didn't dare to open her eyes.

She practically clung to Shun Yuan, staying close to him every step of the way. Just as the two turned a dark corner, a disheveled female ghost with distorted features suddenly lunged at them. Lynch's scream was deafening, scaring Shin Yuan so much that he cowered in fear and curled up into a ball. Without thinking, she snuggled into Shun Yuans arms, her arms wrapped around his waist, her body trembling uncontrollably. Shin Yuans head buzzed, and he felt as if he had been struck by lightning.

Holding such a warm and soft body in his arms, he instantly wondered if he had secretly made a wish that had now come true. He gently patted her back, leaned close to her ear, and softly comforted her. Don't be afraid. It's fake. It's all an act.

Lynn Sharon still buried her face in his chest, clearly not daring to look, her body slowly relaxing, but still pressed tightly against him. Just as Shun Yuan was thinking of making a final push and taking the opportunity to throw in a few sweet words to score points, he glanced to his right and was immediately startled. A pale, distorted face floated in midair, blood streaming from its seven orififices, staring blankly at him. Shin Yuans heart skipped a beat and his face turned green. A ghost.

A pure traditional Chinese phrase escaped his lips. He reacted quickly, grabbing Lin Char and running for his life. A ghost. Run. Though he claimed to be protecting her, he was actually the first to rush out, running even faster than Lynch.

There's another passage over there. An employee dressed as a zombie reached out to warn him, only to be nearly knocked over by the gust of wind he created. Meanwhile, in the monitoring room of Umbrella Corporation headquarters, Lean stared intently at the two figures fleeing with their heads and their hands on the screen, falling into a long silence. She rubbed her temples, finally sighed, and picked up her headset. Listen up, everyone who's getting paid.

Haunted house courage booster plan C three has failed. Immediately activate backup plan F7, the gaming expert romance side quest. Everyone, wake up. This is harder than hunting Cberus. Outside the haunted house, Shinuan leaned against the wall, panting heavily, his face even more ashen than the hanged ghost from before.

It took him a long time to calm down when he heard a suppressed chuckle beside him. He turned his head and saw Lynn Sharon covering her mouth, her shoulders shaking uncontrollably, her eyes glistening with laughter. Her smile was like a crescent moon. Two dimples appearing and disappearing on her cheeks. Pure and captivating.

You're afraid of ghosts, too? Of course. Who wouldn't be afraid of someone so ugly? Shiny Yuan retorted stubbornly. That's not fear. It's the natural human aversion to ugliness. Lynch couldn't help but laugh even harder at his force composure.

I was protecting you. Don't you understand tactical retreat. Oh, I see. Lynn Sharon replied, her eyes full of teasing. In that instant, Shin Yuan felt all the embarrassment was worth it.

Ding! Targets favorability plus 10. Current favorability 75. The system notification startled him, so sincere awkwardness could actually gain favor. Sure enough, this unexpected mishap at the haunted house shattered the barrier between them. Afterwards, they went on bumper cars.

Shinuan's skills were terrible, but he still managed to corner Lynch, making her laugh so hard she stomped her feet. At the ring toss booth, Shin Yuan immediately threw in 100 Yuan, tossing 99 rings without even getting a toothpick on the ring. Just as he was about to give up, a burly man happened to walk by and bumped into him. Shin Yuan's hand jerked, and the last ring traced a perfect ark, instantly tossing the grand prize, a giant plush bear. The booth owner was stunned, applause erupted, and cheers from the tourists continued.

Shin Yuan handed the teddy bear, almost taller than himself, to Lin Chur, feeling like he was floating on air. Ding! Targets favorability plus three, current favorability 78. Night fell, the amusement park lights shone brightly, and the two walked side by side in the plaza. Lynch held the giant bear in her arms, a happy smile she had never worn before radiating from her as if she were enveloped in happiness. Several other couples nearby waited quietly and the atmosphere gradually heated up.

Don't Don't. The clock tower struck 11:00 and suddenly dazzling fireworks burst across the night sky. One after another, they felt like a meteor shower as if lit just for the two of them. Lynch looked up at the starry sky, her eyes gradually welling up with tears. All the repression, grievances, and pain of the past 3 years seemed to be completely washed away in this dreamlike fireworks display.

The couples around her began to embrace and kiss, pushing the romantic atmosphere to its peak. Shinuan turned his head to look at the girl beside him. Lynch also turned her head at the same time, and their eyes met under the fireworks. The world seemed to stand still for a moment. He gently raised his hand to wipe away the tears on her face, feeling her warm skin.

Without further hesitation, he slowly lowered his head and gently kissed her lips. Lynch closed her eyes, her long eyelashes trembling slightly. Fireworks exploded overhead as they silently embraced and kissed as if the entire park existed solely for them. Ding. Targets favorability plus three.

Current favorability 81. Minimum requirements for the mission met. The system notification sounded, but Shin Yuan paid no attention. At this moment, his world consisted only of the girl before him. Chapter nine.

Having consumed Lin Churin, nourished by dragon energy. The Maglev train silently entered the underground hub of the Umbrella Corporation headquarters and came to a smooth stop in front of the exclusive passage. At the entrance of the passage, Leun had been waiting for a long time. She had changed into a smart and neat black suit. Her long hair was tied up, her aura was powerful, her eyes were calm, and her posture was composed.

But when she saw Shinuan get out of the car, a slight smile appeared on her lips, and she couldn't hide the mischievous glint in her eyes. She subtly gestured with her chin towards him as if silently saying, "Kid, not bad. You've got something." Then she turned to the nervous Lin Chur, her tone instantly softening like a gentle neighbor. "Charin, don't be nervous. Just think of it as coming home.

This seemingly ordinary sentence was full of profound meaning. Lynn Sharons ears turned bright red, her cheeks practically sizzling with embarrassment. She buried her face in the large teddy bear she was holding. Too ashamed to look up, Shin Yuan understood, a strange restlessness and anticipation rising within him. Lean led them to the heavy alloy gate, Fortress One.

Shinuan was already familiar with this gate, but its meaning today was clearly different. All right, I'll stop here. Lie Yun smiled meaningfully and stuffed a gray silver card into Shun Yuans hand. A visitor pass, a spare. She paused, glanced at Lin Charuns blushing expression, and added, "The room has everything you need.

If you need more, just have the robot apply for it." As soon as she finished speaking, she turned and left, her steps firm, her high heels clicking as she walked away. The alloy door closed slowly behind them with a dull click. In that instant, the outside world's clamor was shut out, leaving only the two of them inside the fortress. The air instantly became quiet and ambiguous. The temperature seemingly rising slightly.

Outside the window, the city lights shimmerred, a dazzling spectacle, their cascading light pouring into the room like a galaxy. Inside, the lighting adjusted by Friday to its softest, warmest gold, bathed the two in a dreamlike glow. Lynn Sharon still clutched the large plush bear tightly, one hand unconsciously clutching the hem of her skirt. Her cheeks flushed crimson. Her heart was pounding wildly.

She knew nothing was certain, yet she couldn't control her nervousness. This was the first time she had been alone in a room with a man. Shinuan didn't speak immediately. He simply took off his coat and casually draped it over the sofa, then walked to the window, turning his back to her to gaze at the night view. His posture was effortless, yet his aura subtly enveloped the entire space.

He was putting on an act. Inwardly, he was exploding with excitement. After all, he lacked experience, and this was, frankly, his first time in such a situation. He could only maintain this mysterious aura through silence. Silently buying himself some time to cool down.

But this silence only made Lynn Churn more uneasy. The boy in front of her, who had been somewhat clumsy and shy during the day, now seemed to have shed his disguise, becoming calm and dangerous. When Shun Yuan finally turned around, his gaze held a hint of aggression that he himself was unaware of. Lynn Sharon felt flustered by his gaze and reflexively took a half step back only to bump into the cold door. Ah! A soft gasp escaped her lips.

Shinyuan strode forward and scooped her up, bare and all, in his arms. The movement was swift and decisive without warning. "The bear was in the way," he said, a smile playing on his lips, but a hint of mischief in his voice. Lynch's heart skipped a beat. She was completely stunned.

The plush bear landed with a thud on the carpet, and she, exposed in his arms, had nowhere to hide. The butterfly patterned tool skirt rolled up slightly, revealing her snow white thighs, making her appear as if she were under a spotlight. Shin Yuan looked into her clear eyes, which seemed to reflect the stars, and at her face, which was flushed with embarrassment and almost crying, soft, pure, and alluring. And her figure, enhanced by this level talent, was simply unfair. Chu ran, he whispered her name.

Don't be afraid. From now on, I'll be your support. These words, like a key, quietly unlocked the long sealed lock in her heart. support. That was the word she had longed for most, yet could never have for the past 3 years.

Lyn Shu Ran nodded gently, tears sliding down her cheeks like dew drops falling into the deep sea. She softly responded with a barely audible yet as heavy as a thousand lbs. Under the cover of night, the lights of Dong Hai City flowed like a river. The ceiling was adorned with silhouettes of lights cast by windows. Lynn Sharon slept soundly in his arms, her small hands still clutching his clothes like a cat afraid of being abandoned.

A smile played on her lips. She slept peacefully and contentedly. Shin Yuan looked down at the sleeping girl in his arms, a tenderness striking accord within him. At that moment, he even forgot he was a mission executive, forgot about the system and the favorability rating. He gently adjusted her position to make her more comfortable.

Then, with a thought, he brought up the system panel in his mind. The next second, a golden notification popped up, almost blindingly bright. Ding detected that the host has completed their first task. The hidden talent, Dragon Chi Nourishment, has been activated. Shinyuan's pupils contracted.

A hidden talent. He immediately checked the detailed description below. Dragon chi nourishment. The host body contains special dragon chi. Each deep contact allows a portion of the dragon chi to dissipate, nourishing the targets gene chain.

effect. Extremely low probability of activating the talent or increasing the targets existing talent level. Shinuan almost stopped breathing. This this is too heaven defying. Not only can she develop while lying down, but she can also carry others to victory.

He looked down at Lin Char sleeping peacefully in his arms. If she continues to be nurtured, could she go from no talent to a S or even SSS? This is simply a bug-like talent for targeted cultivation of top geniuses. Chapter 10. Leaving with the support of the wall, a female instructor is needed. The next morning, sunlight peers through the high altitude clouds and poured into the fortress, casting a golden ribbon of light on the white carpet.

Shinuan sat up in bed, stretched, his joints cracking, and squinted his eyes with a satisfied look. He felt refreshed and invigorated, as if his entire being had been thoroughly cleansed. My first reaction, of course, was to bring up the system. Ding. Luck check failed.

As expected, Shinuan was not surprised. This kind of thing is not something that can be accomplished overnight, but rather something that requires gradual accumulation and eventual breakthrough. He turned his head and looked at Lin Sharon, who was still fast asleep beside him with a strange emotion in his eyes. Her eyelashes fluttered slightly. A faint smile played on her lips.

She slept peacefully and calmly with a few tear stains still remaining on her face. As Shin Yuan watched, a sudden idea struck him and a mischievous smile crept onto his face. He leaned close to her ear, lowered his voice, and gently blew a breath. Chu ran, "Wake up! It's time for our morning exercise!" Lin Charuns eyelashes fluttered a few times, and she opened her still misty eyes, looking at the ceiling with a bewildered expression. The next second, her gaze settled on Shun Yuans face.

Whoosh! Her entire face flushed red, even her ears turned red, and she immediately burrowed into the blankets to avoid his gaze. "No, no." Her voice was muffled under the covers, soft and sweet. Shiny yuan laughed even more mischievously, pretending not to hear clearly, and reached out as if to pull at the corner of her blanket. "What did you say? Speak louder. I didn't understand.

I said I couldn't get up." Lin Sharon protested softly like a small animal that had run out of energy, hiding from him in grievance. That won't do, Sharon. That's lazy behavior, and you'll get criticized. Shinyuan began to spout nonsense with a straight face, his expression particularly serious. I didn't slack off.

Lynn Sharon panicked, poked her head out from under the covers, and accused him with red eyes. It was you who bullied me. I bullied you. Shinuan looked completely innocent, then pulled her blanket and all into his arms and whispered in her ear. So, shall I continue to bully you today? A dash.

3 days. For three whole days, Shin Yuan didn't even step out of the fortress's gate. On Friday, the smart butler delivered an astonishing amount of high energy nutrient solution, exotic beast meat chops, and crimson flame fruit. It was as if the fortress had become a physical recovery base, and every meal was like a special supply for military combatants. It wasn't until the morning of the fourth day that the heavy alloy door finally opened slowly.

Shin Yuan leaned against the door frame, looking like a paper doll whose energy had been drained and walked out with unsteady steps. He was weak and had dark circles under his eyes, as if he had just crawled back from the battlefield. But Lynn Sharon behind him seemed like a completely different person. Her complexion was rosy, her blood was abundant, her skin was radiant and glowing, and her eyes were as clear as mountain springs. The delicate girish charm that once belonged to her has completely disappeared, replaced by a lively quality that lies between innocence and allure.

Mr. Shun, how are you? The blackclad special forces captain standing guard outside twitched at the corner of his mouth as he looked at Shun Yuan, who appeared to have all his energy drained. Good job, Shin Yuan plopped down in the corner, took a bite of the crimson flame fruit, and only then did he catch his breath. Contact Leon. He swallowed the fruit, his eyes becoming exceptionally resolute, even tinged with a hint of despair.

I need special training. I'm not afraid of the system. I'm not afraid of women. But if my body isn't up to par, I might really die in the arms of a woman. Half an hour later, inside the top-of-the-line combat pod at the Umbrella Corporation's training base, Lean stood at the door with her arms crossed, observing Shun Yuan's swaying figure, and her lips twitched.

Oh, young Master Shan, you've already backed down after only 3 days. She glanced at him up and down a few times, lingering, especially on his waist and legs for a couple of seconds, her eyes filled with a teasing tone. I think your talent is not only mentally taxing, but also physically demanding. Shinuan blushed, picked up the sports drink, and gulped down a few mouthfuls, stubbornly holding on with his neck stiff. Sister Lee, stop being sarcastic.

I'm fighting for the company, the organization, and the people. All right. All right, martyr. Leon rolled her eyes, speechless, and brought up the training system. So, how do you want to train? Gravity chamber, simulated battlefield, actual combat pile driving.

No, I need a personal trainer. Shinyuan's eyes lit up, and he held up one finger. It must be oneon-one. You're still choosing your instructors. Leian raised an eyebrow.

Tell me, what are your shady conditions? First, she must be female. Shinyuan looked serious. A mix of men and women makes work less tiring. Female instructors are less intimidating, which helps to relax the mind and improve training efficiency. Secondly, she is good-looking and has a great figure.

Third, be single, have a clean romantic history, and don't carry too many past burdens. Li Yun was dumbfounded. Is this training or recruiting concubines? Why not? Shin Yuan smiled and lowered his voice. Sister Lee, haven't you already met her? My talent has side effects. What if more physical contact activates a promising talent? Wouldn't that be a win-win situation for the company? This is called training and nurturing talent simultaneously.

A two-pronged approach. Lean burst out laughing. Have you no shame? The task requires it. Shiny Yuan spoke with conviction. Lie Yun was furious, but then she remembered Lin Churin, whom Shin Yuan had brought along, whose physique had improved dramatically.

An ordinary person who originally had no talent actually developed a faint sense of chi in just 3 days. This is simply a miracle in the fields of medicine and genetics. Okay, she gritted her teeth and agreed, uttering each word with difficulty. I'll go get the data right away, and I'll call on the whole company to help you. Chapter 11.

Selecting female instructors. Lean's efficiency is ridiculously high. Less than 2 hours later, the doors to the previously empty fighting arena were pushed open. Two rows of beautiful women with distinct styles filed in, led by Le Yun. On the left are 10 stylish and exquisitly madeup urban beauties whom Leun transferred from the entertainment and public relations departments of Umbrella Corporation to be the face of the company.

On the right side, there were 10 female martial artists dressed in tight- fitting martial arts uniforms, exuding a fierce aura. They stood tall and proud, their eyes sharp, each step carrying the sound of wind and thunder, clearly seasoned veterans who had seen blood. The sight of 20 women standing there seemed to freeze the air in the entire training ground. The scent of perfume mixed with the aroma of hormones assaulted the very core of my being. Shin Yuan sat on a soft chair by the sidelines playing with the dragon soul jade in his hand, but his eyes scanned the crowd like radar.

Young Master Shan, "Everyones here." Lean walked up to him, handed him an earpiece, and said in a cool tone. "On the left is what you desire, visual appeal. On the right, a clean record," "Choose whichever you prefer." Shin Yuan put on his headset, stood up, and walked to the left row first. The 10 women's eyes lit up the moment they saw Shin Yuan. In the past few days, rumors about the new owner of Fortress number one, a mysterious young master and holding hundreds of billions of yuan in cash have been circulating wildly within the company.

Anyone who can climb this high branch, even if it's just to be a fleeting instructor, will be set for life. Shin Xiao. The woman at the front of the line bowed first, her neckline low, revealing her ample bosom, and her voice was so sweet it could be drawn out like silk.
