Dr. Sue, I think it would be safer for you to switch back to the lava giant lizards blood essence first. Perhaps you shouldn't experiment with your latest research findings. Su Ching Xu seemed to enjoy his ghostlike expression. She pushed up her gold- rimmed glasses and a playful smile appeared on her lips.

What's wrong? Are you scared? Don't worry. After I diluted dragon blood number one dozens of times, its threat level is only slightly higher than that of the lava giant lizard's essence blood. To ensure the integrity of the experimental data, I will try my best to keep you alive." As she spoke, she walked toward the enormous alloy bathtub, which resembled a small swimming pool, and poured rows of different colored potions into it. The once clear water was instantly stained a strange dark green and it was bubbling and steaming. All right, go in my little guinea pig.

Such clapped her hands and gave instructions to Shin Yuan. Shin Yuan swallowed hard, stealed himself, and walked towards the bathtub. He repeated the phrase, "If you want to become a superior person and a true strong man, you must first taste the bitterness of hell to himself no less than 800 times." This is more than just hell. It's a direct route to the 18th level of hell. Just as he was about to step into the bathtub, Su Ching Xus voice rang out again.

This time directed at Ling, who was watching coldly from the side. Instructor Long, you join us, too. What? For the first time, a clear look of astonishment appeared on Lyings icy face. In order to guide the medicinal effects more accurately and monitor the energy flow in his body in real time, I need a highle martial artist to assist me. Such Ching Zu turned around and explained in a serious tone.

Of course, the most important thing is that Dragon Blood number one's energy is too doineering. What if some uncontrollable accident happens midway, such as him not being able to withstand the energy impact and his meridians being severed? She paused, glancing at Ling through her glasses, her tone becoming meaningful. You'll probably have a hard time explaining this to yourself, won't you? L Yings brows furrowed instantly. She stared at Su Chingu silently for a few seconds as if trying to figure out what this woman was really up to. She always felt that Su Ching Zu had planned all of this from the very beginning.

But she couldn't refuse because what Su Chingu said was true. Shun Yuan safety was the top priority. After a brief moment of deliberation, Longing silently and decisively took off her black combat jacket. Beneath the jacket was a black sports bra that hugged her body's curves even better. Not an ounce of excess fat.

Every muscle line is full of power and physique, brimming with astonishing explosive force. This perfect body, brimming with health and strength, creates a striking visual contrast with Su Ching Xus voluuptuous and fiery sexiness. Shinuan felt his nose getting hot and his mouth and throat dry. God, a scientific research prodigy with a score of 98. A future female warrior with a rating of 98 is now going to accompany her.

This direct route to hell doesn't seem so unbearable after all. He subconsciously gave Su Ching Xu a thousand thumbs up in his mind. Dr. Su, you are like my own sister. Just as he was lost in thought.

Su Ching Xus gaze swept over them unintentionally, her eyes carrying a hint of approval that said, you know what's good for you. Shin Yuan's heart skipped a beat, and he instantly understood. Not only is he top-notch in physique and brains, but he's also a god tier support player with a huge reputation. While Shin Yuan was still feeling emotional, Longing had already stepped into the huge bathtub with a blank expression, sat down cross-legged, and closed her eyes as if everything around her was irrelevant to her. Shinuan took a deep breath and stepped inside, stealing himself.

The scalding hot liquid instantly enveloped his entire body, and a burning, stinging sensation spread through his skin. He gritted his teeth and sat down opposite Ling. Such Chingu nodded in satisfaction. She walked to the bathtub and held up the dark gold dragon blood number one vial. Are you ready? It's about to begin.

Before she finished speaking, she plunged the needle into the liquid and poured the entire tube of viscous dragon blood essence into the bathtub. Boom. Dash. The dark green liquid. The moment the dragon's blood was injected seemed to boil like gasoline that had been ignited.

A violent energy, even more terrifying than magma, exploded continuously. A dash Shin Yuan only had time to let out a shrill scream before he felt as if he had been thrown into an erupting volcano. An indescribable, excruciating pain emanated from the depths of every cell in my body. The skin was being burned, the muscles were being torn apart, and the bones were being crushed inch by inch. His vision went black, his consciousness began to blur, and he was like a fish thrown ashore, struggling wildly in the scalding liquid, almost fainting on the spot.

It hurts so much. This is a pain that no human being can bear. Just as his consciousness was about to be completely swallowed by the excruciating pain, a pair of cold yet powerful hands suddenly pressed down on his shoulders, which he was flailing wildly. Longing, who was opposite, had opened her eyes at some point. She looked at Shun Yuans face, contorted with extreme pain, her brows furrowed.

She didn't agree with Su Ching Xus radical and almost cruel methods, but her military instincts made her unable to stand by and watched the mission target die in front of her. The next second, she lunged forward, approaching Shin Yuan amidst the boiling medicinal liquid, and her hand flashed out and pressed against his back. A cool and pure energy flowed through her palm and was forcibly transferred into Shun Yuan's chaotic and violent body. Guard your mind and focus your attention on your lower abdomen. L Yings cold shout was like a thunderclap exploding in his chaotic mind.

If you want to die, then give up. These cold words, however, acted like a shot of adrenaline, sharply waking Shin Yuan from his fading consciousness. Give up? Are you kidding me? He thought of Lin Shauns sleeping face, which was stre with tears yet filled with contentment. I haven't had enough fun yet. How could you die here? Roar.

Shin Yuan let out a roar, using the last bit of strength in his body to forcefully suppress the instinctive struggle of his body. And following Long Yings command, he concentrated all his thoughts into his dantion. Guided by Long Yings pure internal energy, the rampant and violent medicinal power within his body seemed to find an outlet and began to be forcibly restrained and converge in one direction. Time passed by second by second. The only sounds in the training room were Shun Yuan's suppressed painful roars and the bubbling of the bathtub.

Su Ching Zu stood to the side, arms crossed, quietly watching the frantically jumping data curves on the screen, her eyes behind her glasses gleaming with an increasingly bright light. She anticipated that Shin Yuan might break down, beg for mercy, or even go into shock. But she never expected that this seemingly frail man could actually withstand the first wave of the most violent energy impact from dragon blood number one with his own willpower and with Lyings help. His willpower exceeded his own assessment. I don't know how much time passed.

Maybe an hour, maybe 2 hours. As the boiling medicinal liquid in the bathtub gradually subsided, and its color changed from dark green to clear, Shin Yuan's painful roars finally stopped. The excruciating pain subsided like a receding tide. Instead, there is a feeling of complete comfort and strength. Shinuan opened his eyes and clearly felt a warm power flowing through his limbs and bones.

The blood and energy that had been depleted due to days of hard work were now so full that they seemed about to overflow. Every muscle, every bone is filled with power. He's gotten stronger. It's over. Longing withdrew her hand, her voice carrying a hint of barely perceptible weariness.

She gave Shin Yuan a deep look, her eyes filled with complex emotions. This man was much more resilient than she had imagined. Just then, Su Chingu walked over quickly, holding a wristwatch style detector in her hand, and without saying a word, she put it on Shun Yuans wrist. Beep beep. On the light screen, a series of data were rapidly refreshed.

Suching eyes widened, a hint of surprise in her gaze. Chi and blood value 660. Bone density increased by 200%. Muscle strength increased by 350%. You're already at the late stage of the first realm Marshall apprentice.

In just 2 hours, you went from an ordinary person to someone who has stepped into the realm of martial arts. Your body's absorption rate of the medicine has reached a staggering 97%. This is unscientific. Suching gaze towards Shun Yuan completely changed from that of a rare experimental subject to that of a genius martial artist. Shinyuan slowly stood up and looked down at his hands.

He gently squeezed his hand. Crack. A crisp popping sound suddenly rang out in the air. This is what power feels like. He raised his head and looked past Su Chingu, who was still in shock and landed on Ling, who was sitting cross-legged opposite him.

Thank you, Instructor Long. Starting tomorrow, the training intensity can be doubled. Chapter 16. Instructor Long wants to do extra training. When Shinuan came out of the messy training room, he felt like a completely different person.

He changed into a clean set of casual clothes. His steps light and quick, each step containing explosive power. The overflowing blood and chi within his body were washing over his limbs and bones. Late stage of martial apprentice realm. In just 2 hours, he went from an ordinary person who couldn't even kill a chicken to a genuine martial artist.

He was looking for a mirror to admire his transformed appearance when he looked up and met the cold figure at the end of the corridor. Longing she had also changed into a clean black combat uniform and was standing with her arms crossed against the wall, seemingly waiting for him. Shinuan's excited smile froze instantly. An untimely thought flashed through his mind like lightning. He suddenly recalled that just now in that boiling pool of medicine, he had been tormented by inhuman pain to the point of losing his mind.

And when his hands were frantically thrashing in the scalding liquid, he seemed to have grabbed something. The feel of that touch was completely different from Long Yings usual steely demeanor. Shin Yuans Adams apple bobbed involuntarily. His gaze began to wander, and he dared not meet her eyes. "Damn it.

It seems we've grabbed the wrong spot. How are you feeling?" Ly Yings voice remained cold and indifferent, revealing no emotion. "Ah, great. Very good. I feel like I could kill a bull with one punch." Shin Yuan scratched his head guiltily, trying to get away with it with an exaggerated tone.

Very good. Longing nodded, straightened up from the wall, and slowly walked towards him. As she walked, she flexed her slender, fair hands, her knuckles making a series of crisp, cracking sounds. Now that you have reached the first level of martial arts mastery, and your physical strength far exceeds expectations, the previous training plan needs to be scrapped. She stopped in front of Shun Yuan, her sharp phoenix eyes scanning him up and down as if assessing a newly sharpened weapon.

From now on, double the training intensity. The smile on Shun Yuans face froze completely. Double to help you quickly familiarize yourself with the surge of power within your body. I will personally provide you with practical guidance. L Yings lips seemed to curve into a very faint smile so quickly that it was almost an illusion, she added.

So you won't accidentally do it again. She emphasized the words slipped hand very heavily. Shinuan's scalp tingled instantly. She definitely sensed it. This is hardly practical guidance.

It's clearly settling personal scores. With her strength as a fourthle grand marshall master, her so-called guidance would probably only make her feel like she's been beaten to a pulp and rendered unable to take care of herself. The instinct for survival made Shun Yuan's brain work at an extremely fast pace. No, we absolutely cannot let her succeed. The next second, the guilt and embarrassment on his face vanished, replaced by an extremely serious, even somewhat sacred expression.

Instructor Dragon. He straightened his back and spoke with righteous indignation. Training is important, but I have something more urgent and important to do right now that needs to be done immediately. This sudden change surprised even Longing. Shin Yuan pressed his advantage, continuing with an air of righteous indignation.

After Dr. pursues medicinal bath tempering. I am now full of chi and blood and full of energy. This is the golden period when my talent is at its strongest. This is a golden opportunity.

I must return immediately and join forces with Chu ran to press our advantage. Before long, Ing could even react to his shameless remarks. Shin Yuan turned and ran. He practically became a blur, running while shouting back. Instructor Long, you go ahead and get busy.

Ly Yings outstretched hand froze in midair. As she watched Shun Yuans retreating figure, a speechless expression appeared for the first time on her perpetually icy and beautiful face. Her clenched fist remained clenched for a long time. Cluck, cluck. A suppressed chuckle came from the side.

Such Chingu also came out at some point. She pushed up her gold rim glasses and was looking at the data curves representing Shun Yuans heart rate and speed on the screen with great interest. My heart rate was 180 and my instantaneous speed reached 15 m/s, surpassing the peak speed of a sprinter. It seems that the effects of dragon blood number one are even better than I expected. She walked over to Ling, who was still somewhat petrified, and said, "Don't mind, Instructor Long.

You see, you have a thick skin, clear goals, strong execution, and a high level of enthusiasm and initiative for these tedious, repetitive tasks." Such Chingghus glasses reflected a gleam of wisdom as she calmly summarized in the tone of someone analyzing a lab report. They are simply the perfect cattle and horses with a long flowering period and high efficiency. Longing. She felt her fists grow harder. With a bang, Shin Yuan smashed open the gate of fortress number one and rushed inside.

Lyn Sharon was wearing an adorable bunny pajama set, curled up on the sofa, engrossed in reading a thick paper book. Hearing the noise, she looked up in surprise. You come back. Before she could finish speaking, she was lifted into the air by a tremendous force. Ah.

Lynn Sharon let out a short gasp and instinctively hugged Shin Yuans neck. The book in her hand falling to the carpet with a thud. When she met Shin Yuans eyes, which seemed to be burning with flames, her pretty face instantly turned bright red. She shily punched his chest with her small fist, the sound barely audible. You're here again.

Yes, I'm back again. Holding the soft, fragrant body in his arms, Shin Yuan felt a surge of heroic spirit. He stroed to the huge floor toseeiling window. Outside the window, the Umbrella Corporation's headquarters were brightly lit at night with countless points of light converging into a dazzling galaxy, a beautiful blend of order and power. Shin Yuan rested his chin on the girl's shoulder and spoke softly in a husky yet gentle voice near her fair, jade-like ear.

Chu ran, this is not nonsense. He looked out the window at the myriad lights of homes and thought, "We are all creating miracles." These words seemed to possess a kind of magic. Lynn Sharn's body, which had been struggling slightly due to shyness, instantly softened. When she looked up, her clear, watery eyes reflected Shun Yuan's serious profile, as well as the dazzling starry sky outside the window. All the shyness and unease transformed into deep tenderness and dependence at this moment.

Um, she nodded emphatically, then deliberately raised her delicate chin. The last bit of guilt Shin Yuan felt for skipping training was instantly overwhelmed by a huge sense of satisfaction. He swept the girl up in his arms and her cute bunny pajamas rolled up as he did so, revealing a pair of straight, slender, and beautiful legs that gleamed like ivory. Late at night, Longing sat cross-legged on the bed, her eyes closed, meditating. Vital energy flowed slowly around her, trying to calm her agitated mind, but it didn't work.

Call longing suddenly opened her eyes, and a rare flame of irritation burned in her sharp phoenix eyes. She clenched her fists so tightly that her knuckles turned slightly white from the force. "That bastard. Tomorrow, tomorrow, she's going to make this unrestrained guy experience firsthand what it truly means to be completely drained." Chapter 17. He got brutally beaten by Long Ying.

And then his hands slipped. The next morning, before it was fully light, Shin Yuan was fast asleep, dreaming that he had already ascended the throne as emperor and was surrounded by 3,000 beauties. Lin Sharon, wearing an adorable bunny apron, was feeding him peeled grapes in small bites. Su Ching Zhu, standing to the side, was holding sophisticated instruments, analyzing the grape's genetic sequence with a serious expression, muttering to herself, "Excessive sugar content will affect activity. It is recommended to replace it with a low sugar, high protein exotic beast fruit." Meanwhile, Ling, the goddess of war, stood expressionless behind him, holding a gleaming military dagger and peeling an apple for him.

My beloved concubine, make it a little thinner," Shin Yuan commanded in his dream. Suddenly, a bone-chilling cold pierced through his dream, freezing him deep into his soul. He jolted awake and opened his eyes abruptly. Long Yings handsome and spirited face hovered less than half a meter above him, quietly looking down at him with eyes colder than the dagger in her hand. She had changed into a sleek black combat suit, still carrying the slight chill and smell of sweat from her morning workout.

Good morning, Instructor. Long Shin Yuan forced a smile that looked more like a grimace and instinctively shrank deeper into the warm blankets. Without saying a word, Longing simply reached out of hand, grabbed the back of his pajamas by the collar, and pulled him out of bed like a calf that had done something wrong. Oh, so cold. Shiny Yuan stepped barefoot onto the cold floor, shivering from the cold, and was wide awake.

Starting today, you are no longer entitled to sleep in. L Yings voice was devoid of any emotion. She dragged him along as if he were a bag of trash, heading straight for the training room. Over the next two weeks, Shin Yuan experienced firsthand what it meant to be in hell on earth. Longing completely treated him like a human punching bag, and she wouldn't stop him from doing so.

The punch is too slow, resulting in a dispersed force. Bang! Shinyuan was struck in the side by a powerful whip kick and flew sideways, crashing into the soft protective mat. slow to react, full of flaws. Slap. Shinyuan had just managed to get up when he received a slap across the face that was neither too hard nor too soft.

The slap made him see stars and half of his face went numb. Instructor Long, you promised you wouldn't hit my face. I rely on this face to make a living. Shin Yuan covered his face and protested indignantly. Longing flexed her wrists and gave him a cold glance.

One more thing, I can apply to the company to switch to a more direct manual method. Shin Yuan immediately shut up. He had no doubt that given this female warrior style of doing things, she was absolutely capable of doing such a thing. Every day, Shinuan's pig-like screams echoed in the training room. Oh, my back.

Stop. I surrender. I surrender. Okay, sister. I called you sister.

Please be gentle. This is a valuable asset for the future. However, no matter how much he begged for mercy or acted shamelessly, Longing remained unmoved. In every sparring session, she beat him to a pulp, but skillfully controlled her strength, keeping him just on the verge of collapse without letting him pass out. It hurts.

It really hurts. But the results are truly remarkable. In the daily cycle of being passively attacked, Shinuan's reaction speed, resilience, and combat skills are improving at an unbelievable rate. He has even improved his ability to withstand Long Yings attacks, going from being unable to last more than 10 seconds at the beginning to now being able to barely last 3 minutes. On this day, Longing swiftly threw Shun Yuan to the ground with a clean and decisive over-the-shoulder throw, then pounced on him.

Her long, straight legs instantly wrapping around his neck, her arms hooking around his arms, forming a textbook arm bar in an instant. Ugg. Shinyuan felt as if his arm was about to be broken in the next second. The feeling of suffocation and excruciating pain surged up at the same time, leaving his mind blank. His survival instinct made him start to struggle frantically, waving his hands wildly upwards, trying to grab onto something for leverage.

Then his palm touched her again, just like yesterday. Shinuan's brain went blank for a moment. Almost at the same time, Ling, who was exerting her strength, suddenly stiffened. An unfamiliar heat surged uncontrollably from her neck to her ears, and two charming blushes appeared on her perpetually icy face. The pressure on his hands unconsciously loosened slightly.

Now, seizing this once-ina-lifetime opportunity, Shin Yuan suddenly exerted force in his waist, and with a somersault, managed to flip over and break free from the deadly lock. He scrambled to a safe distance, panting heavily, his face showing relief at surviving the ordeal. Longing slowly stood up from the ground. She lowered her head, her black hair hanging down, making it impossible to see her expression. The air in the training room seemed to freeze at that moment, eerily quiet.

That instructor Long, "It wasn't intentional. It was purely accidental, an accident." Shin Yuan explained guilty, his voice growing softer and softer. The next second, Longing suddenly raised her head. in her sharp phoenix eyes. It seemed as if two clusters of fury capable of burning everything were burning.

You find hit. The three words were practically squeezed out from between his teeth. Boom. Longing moved faster than ever before. Ah, she murdered her husband.

Shinyuan screams were more piercing than ever before. But he found that this kind of interaction, which could break the iceberg like instructor's defenses, greatly alleviated the boredom and pain of training. After each training session, the half-dead Shinuan would be thrown into the medicinal bath prepared by Su Ching Xu next door by Longing, who had a fierce look on her face. Under the extreme stimulation of both ice and fire, his injuries would heal at a visible speed, and he would become energetic again. Such adjusted her glasses, looked at the soaring data on the screen, and asked with great interest.

Instructor Long, "What new stimulation method did you use today?" His adrenaline secretion was three times the normal peak and the effect was very significant. Longing turned and left without a word. Her face cold, her back view exuding a murderous aura that said, "Don't mess with me." Shin yuan soaked in the fragrant medicinal liquid, groaned comfortably, and habitually opened the system panel. Target: Longing. Affection level 54.

Extremely annoyed. It did drop a little. Shin Yuan felt a chill in his heart. But when he looked down, a line of brand new gold text made his eyes widen instantly. Ding.

Due to special physical contact, the target long Yings conquest progress has unlocked a new stage. Breaking the ice. I see. Shin Yuans lips curled into a smug smile. It seems that conventional methods are indeed useless in dealing with this iceberg.

We have to use some special means. Chapter 18. Martial artist realm achieved. Oops, another slip of the hand. Before long, Su Ching Xu was excitedly recording every change in his body's data with various instruments in hand.

This is insane. Absolutely insane. She stared at the constantly fluctuating curves on the light screen and murmured to herself, "Your body is like a bottomless pit. The absorption and conversion rates of the medicine completely defy existing biological theories. Chi and blood values 720, 750, 780.

Your cell activity and recovery speed have exceeded my calculations. Suching eyes behind her glasses grew brighter and brighter, and the way she looked at Shun Yuan was no longer that of an experimental subject. A week has passed in the blink of an eye. She in blood value 990. Su Chingu looked at the final data displayed on the testing instrument, pushed up her gold- rimmed glasses, and her expression became more serious than ever before.

You're just one step away from entering the second realm. She turned and took out a test tube that gleamed with a dark dim light from a temperature-cont controlled safe. This is dragon blood too. It is made from a 50% concentration of spinal fluid from an ancient dragon-blooded subspecies and its energy intensity is 10 times that of all the potions you have used before combined. Suching handed the dangerous test tube to Shinuan.

Are you ready for either instant success or instant death? Inside the enormous alloy bathtub, Shinuan took a deep breath and completely immersed himself in the strange dark green liquid. This time, Longing did not stand by and watch coldly from afar. As usual, she seemed to know the danger of this breakthrough. After a moment of silence, she quietly took off her combat jacket, revealing a black sports bra with a powerful aesthetic, and stepped into the bathtub. Seeing this, Shin Yuans anxious heart inexplicably calmed down a lot.

Such Ching Zu said no more and forcefully injected dragon blood number two into the water. Boom dash. An energy several times more violent than before exploded inside the bathtub. Ughai. Shinyuan scream only lasted half a sound before it abruptly stopped.

His eyes instantly turned bloodshot and his consciousness seemed to be gripped tightly by an invisible hand trying to tear his soul out of his body. Pain. When the pain is extreme, even thinking becomes a luxury. Just as his consciousness was about to be completely torn apart, a cold hand pressed heavily against his back. A stream of extremely pure internal energy forcefully entered his chaotic body, acting like a stabilizing force, preserving the last bit of clarity in his mind.

Keep your mind focused. Ly Yings icy voice exploded in his mind. If you dare to die here, I will chase you all the way to hell and pull you out so I can beat you up again with my own hands. This doineering threat of death, on the contrary, stirred up the ruthlessness in Shun Yuan's bones. Die? I've only just begun to enjoy life.

How can I die? Roar. Shun Yuan unleashed astonishing willpower, frantically guiding the destructive medicinal power within his body, crashing against the invisible barrier deep within his dantion. Time and time again. Collide. Crash it again.

After an unknown amount of time, a muffled boom came from inside my body. That seemingly indestructible barrier shattered with a deafening roar. All the violent medicinal power seemed to have found an outlet, rushing wildly into the dantion, being compressed and condensed, and finally turning into a thin but extremely tough milky white stream of energy. Vitality, the mark of a second realm martial artist. Ding! Your chi and blood value has exceeded 1200.

Congratulations, host, on successfully advancing to the second realm martial artist. It's done. Shinyuan opened his eyes. A powerful feeling filling his entire body. He instinctively threw a punch at the alloy wall in front of him.

A faint wisp of white energy emanated from his fist. Bang! With a muffled thud, a clear white fist mark was left on the special alloy wall that was strong enough to withstand heavy artillery bombardment. This is the power of vital energy. A surge of pride welled up in Shin Yuan's heart. He was so excited that he wanted to stand up and fully experience this transformative change.

However, he forgot that he was still in the bathtub. His foot slipped and he fell forward uncontrollably. In his panic, his hands instinctively reached out to grab something. The entire training room fell into a deathly silence. Shin Yuan stood frozen in place, so much so that he could hear his own heart pounding wildly.

He moved extremely slowly, raising his head inch by inch until he met Ly Yings eyes, which had completely lost their luster. "It's over." This time, even jumping into the yellow river won't clear my name. Before Lyings pinup anger could fully erupt, Shinuan's brain had already provided the optimal solution. He leaped out of the bathtub with lightning speed, grabbed his clothes, and shouted righteously as he dressed, "Instructor Long, I've broken through. I feel like my talent effect has increased more than 10fold.

I must go back to Chu Ran immediately, consolidate my cultivation and press my advantage. Before he finished speaking, he had already transformed into a blur and rushed out of the training room, leaving behind a stunned Su Ching Zu and Ling, whose body was trembling slightly in the bathtub and whose fists were clenched so tightly they cracked. Su Chingu adjusted her glasses and calmly recorded on the light screen. Driven by an extreme will to survive, the target bursts into speeds exceeding the sound barrier. Note, this stimulus cannot be replicated.

Bang! Shinuan burst through the door and immediately saw the figure that haunted his dreams. The changes in Lin Sharon after just half a month are astonishing. Nourished by the dragon's energy and supplied with top quality nutrition, her originally pale face became rosy and delicate. Those clear eyes no longer held some unease, but rather a greater sense of spirit and confidence. Most incredibly, her already level talent seemed to have undergone a second development, filling out her silk slip dress to the brim and outlining a perfect, breathtaking curve.

She was sitting on the carpet by the window, basking in the sunlight, fiddling with a newly bought green plant, looking as beautiful as a painting. You come back. Lynn Sharon turned around in surprise, but before she could finish speaking, she was lifted into the air by a tremendous force. "Ah!" she gasped in surprise, only to find herself easily carried in Shun Yuan's arms in a princess carry. "You're so strong today," Lin Char blushed, her small hands pressing against his firm chest.

"Having just broken through," he was a little out of control of his power. Shin Yuan looked down at the increasingly beautiful girl in his arms, and with a mischievous grin, pecked her lips. The next morning, Shinuan opened his eyes, feeling refreshed. The physique of a second realm martial artist is indeed extraordinary. He habitually opened the system panel to check his status.

However, the moment the panel unfolded, a dazzling golden notification popped up, taking up the entire field of vision. Ding! Good luck. Check in progress. Detection successful. Congratulations, host.

The target Lynch has been successfully detected. Good luck. Total number of times, 52. Shinuan froze completely. He stared at the line of golden text, then at Lin Shuran, who was still fast asleep beside him, and his mind went blank.

Chapter 19. The second F-rank Divine Skill. Shin Yuan's brain completely shut down because of that line of dazzling golden characters. It's done. Is that all? He subconsciously looked down at the girl in his arms who was sleeping soundly with a sweet smile on her lips.

Just half a month. My own talent, combined with the surge in blood and chi after half a month of frantic medicinal baths to temper my body has resulted in an efficiency that is terrifyingly high. An immense joy and sense of pride welled up from the depths of my heart. Umbrella Corporation headquarters, Fortress 1. 5 minutes later, bang.

The valuable special alloy gate of Fortress number one was violently smashed open from the outside by a brutal force. The three of them practically turned into three after images, rushing in with an urgency completely out of character for them. The leader, Chin Lao, a rogue cultivator at the Ninth Realm, even forgot to take his precious teacup. His pair of cloudy old eyes were now surprisingly bright. Following closely behind was Xiao Jingua, a fifth level master in the company.

His eyes were red- rimmed, his lips were trembling, and he couldn't utter a single word. My little darling, you better take it easy. Leian rushed to the bedside and carefully helped Lin Sharon up from Shaun Yuan's still dazed state. All three of them simultaneously focused their gaze on Lin Char's flat stomach. Lynch was startled by the scene and her face turned pale.

But when she saw the almost uncontrollable excitement on the faces of the company's three big wigs and then looked at her own flat stomach, the clever woman instantly understood what was going on. Her cheeks flushed instantly and she lowered her head shily, her hands unconsciously protecting her lower abdomen. A wondrous and magnificent radiance quietly bloomed on her body. Shin Yuan watched this scene with a surge of heroic spirit. A thought crossed my mind.

The formula for the gene potential enhancement potion was projected out in the form of a virtual light screen. Old Sheen was immersed in great joy when he was suddenly struck by the golden characters that appeared before him and his pupils contracted sharply. Gene potential enhancement potion effect. After injection, the chance of awakening a talent is permanently increased by 30% for ordinary people. Ingredients: star grass, earth dragon root, rootless water, and one mace of void dragon saliva grass.

Old Chin's body jolted violently. Old Chen shouted at the door. Su Chinghu. One minute later, wearing a white lab coat and red high heels, Such Ching Xu pushed open the door and entered. She was holding a tablet in her hand, which displayed Shun Yuans vital data from the previous night.

Old Sheen, his physical data, never mind that. Old Sheen rudely interrupted her, quickly transcribed the recipe onto a piece of paper, and then shoved it into Su Ching Xus hand. Immediately, no matter how many company resources it takes, get this thing built. Such Ching Zu took the paper with a puzzled look, and after just one glance, her brows furrowed tightly. From her perspective as a top scientist, the formula was a joke.

The ingredients inside, apart from the legendary void dragon saliva grass, which is quite rare, are all very common, and some can even be bought in ordinary Chinese medicine shops. Can these things alone increase an ordinary person's chances of awakening by 30%. This completely contradicts everything she knows about genetic science? There's probably something wrong with this recipe. She calmly voiced her doubts. Shinyuan saw through her doubts.

He jumped off the bed, shirtless, patted his chest, which had become more angular after a week of hellish training, and grinned, "Dr. Sue, don't doubt it. This formula isn't something I made up." He winked at Su Chinghu and said in an extremely serious tone, "This is my own child. We're blood relatives. I'll compensate you 10fold if it's fake.

It's guaranteed to be genuine." His words left everyone present stunned. Leun was the first to react and couldn't help but burst out laughing. Even Lin Sharon, who had been completely bewildered, belatedly realized the meaning behind his words and buried her head in the blanket in embarrassment. Shin Yuan was too lazy to waste words with her, so he simply took out the pure black metal card with a golden dragon pattern printed on it from his pocket and casually threw it on the table.

Swipe card pin 68. The female manager's gaze fell on the black card and her professional fawning smile froze instantly, her pupils shrinking to pinpoints. The next second, she bowed deeply, almost reflexively, her voice even changing tone, and her fingers were trembling when she picked up the communicator. She lowered her voice and reported urgently in a tone mixed with awe and panic. Boss lady, top floor, long card is a long card VIP.

Soon, the expensive blood lamb and the set meal made with the tendons of the tier three ferocious beast, the earth dragon, were served. Shun yuan leisurely swirled the blood red liquid in his glass, took a sip, and felt a surge of fiery energy slide down his throat into his stomach, making every pore on his body open up. As expected of something made exclusively for martial artists, it's really powerful. He savored the fine wine and food while waiting with curiosity. Who exactly is this mysterious propriet who can open such a place and recognize dragon cards so quickly he didn't have to wait too long.

A series of crisp rhythmic high heels clicking on the ground came from afar. Along with the sound came a rich and aggressive perfume scent. The door to the starry sky palace was pushed open. A woman walked in. With just one glance, Shinuan felt his breath catch in his throat.

The woman who walked in was a western beauty, wearing a black, tight-fitting leather dress that fit her perfectly, highlighting her almost exaggeratedly voluuptuous figure. The lines are full of a powerful, captivating presence. And paired with that cold, aloof aura, she is like a poisonous young woman, alluring yet deadly. Her long wavy wine red hair was casually draped over her shoulders, making her skin appear even whiter. Her features were deep and defined.

Her azure eyes were like two of the purest sapphires, and beneath her high, straight nose were full, sensual red lips. That appearance, that demeanor, that figure, she bears a striking resemblance to the female agent cenamed Black Widow from the movies in Shun Yuan's previous life. Seven or eight points. Absolutely top-notch," Shinuan thought to himself. "If this were a rating, it would definitely be 95 points or higher, maybe even higher.

We apologize for keeping our distinguished guests waiting." The woman walked in, her voice languid and magnetic with just the right amount of huskiness, enough to make one's bones melt just by listening to it. Shin Yuan suppressed his amazement, put on a polite yet playful smile, and reached out to shake her hand.

Shin Yuan, the moment their palms touched. The system panel in Shun Yuan's mind appeared automatically. However, the content that surfaced this time caused the smile on his face to freeze slightly. Chapter 25. A federal female spy with a score of 96.

Overall rating 95 due to Black Widow's genetic modification. She is permanently inoperable. Rating minus one. Shin Yuan's smile froze when he saw the last line of small print. Permanently shut down.

A top spy for the Free Federation.

System suggestion. This target is extremely dangerous and unable to complete the reproductive task. The host is advised to engage in passive aggressive behavior. Although she is exceptionally attractive, she cannot have children. It is recommended to treat her as a hobby and not take it seriously.

She could feel a scorching heat rushing from her ears to the top of her head. And for the first time, two blushes appeared on her face, which was always adorned with rationality and confidence. Her voice no longer carried the coldness of a scientist, but instead carried a hint of feminine embarrassment and annoyance. I won't let go. Shin Yuan smiled like a triumphant rogue. and he even lowered his head to rub his nose against her hair. Unless Dr.

Su agrees to come and test me personally tonight. You're dreaming. Su Ching Xu gritted her teeth, realizing that her composure and rationality were crumbling little by little under the man's repeated provocations. Conventional threats have no effect on him since the soft approach didn't work. Such took a deep breath, a resolute glint flashing in her watery eyes.

She suddenly stopped struggling. Her whole body went limp and instead revealed a gentle smile. Oh, really? She slowly and deliberately took out a miniature projector about the size of a matchbox from the pocket of her white coat. Shinuan, since you are so dedicated to scientific research, I happen to have a new research project that I haven't been able to find suitable live subjects for clinical trials. She pointed the projector at the alloy wall next to her.

Alternative name dragon blood number three original solution. Suching voice returned to its icy emotionless tone. Each word like an icicle piercing Shun Yuan's ears.

The dragon blood number two you received before was only a 50% diluted solution. This one, however, is a 100% pure solution without any treatment. She turned to Shin Yuan and gave him a smile that was both sweet and cruel. Since you have so much energy, why not dedicate your precious body to the company's great genetic science right now? That's not even human anymore. That's just being reincarnated. He swallowed hard, his face turning as white as a wall. The arrogant and doineering wolf from a moment ago instantly turned into a trembling little white pig. He swiftly released his grip on Su Ching Xu, took three steps back, then snapped to attention, raised his hands, and assumed a standard surrender posture.

His handsome face immediately revealed righteous indignation and passionate fervor. I was wrong, Dr. Sue. I have come to realize that I am someone who has transcended base desires. I am a model young person who loves training, yearns to become stronger, and excels in all five aspects.

Instructor Long is still waiting for me in the training room. I can't let personal feelings make me late for training. Before he finished speaking, he quickly turned around and with an explosive force completely out of character for his current physical abilities, transformed into a blur, and rushed toward the laboratory door. Bang! The alloy door was slammed shut. Silence returned to the laboratory.

Su Ching Zhu remained in the position of her fingertip touching his lips, leaning against the cold wall, staring at the tightly closed door, stunned for a full 3 seconds. Immediately, she could no longer restrain herself and covered her mouth with her hand. A clear, crisp laugh like a secluded orchid blooming quietly in a secluded valley. She slid to the ground, laughing so hard her shoulders shook and tears streamed down her face. That facade of intellect, abstinence, and coldness shattered at that moment, transforming into a captivating and uniquely feminine charm that stirs the soul.

Shinyuan ran all the way until he reached the floor where the training room was located, then stopped with lingering fear. He leaned against the wall, panting heavily, his heart still pounding. That's terrifying. That woman is an absolute devil. I can't afford to mess with her.

But for some reason, deep in his heart, besides fear, there was also a secret expectation.

Instead of wearing the loose training clothes, she changed into a set of all black tight fitting combat gear. The clothes seemed like a second skin to her, perfectly outlining her flawless figure which was free of any excess fat and full of strength and athleticism. Hearing the door open, she didn't turn around immediately, but spoke coldly in a voice devoid of any warmth. If you're 3 minutes late, your training load will be doubled. Shin Yuans heart skipped a beat, and he was about to explain that he had been delayed by Dr.

Su. Longing had already turned around. Her stunningly beautiful face was expressionless, and her sharp phoenix eyes were colder than ever before. Shin Yuan almost couldn't catch his breath.

Longing raised an eyebrow, her contempt undisguised. Who says I can't do it? Shin Yuan was provoked by her gaze, and the stubbornness in his bones also came to the four. It's just 500 push-ups. He gritted his teeth, lay down on the ground without saying a word, and braced himself with his hands.

Chapter 34. A professional team, a play within a play. As explained earlier, the Umbrella Corporation is a civilian organization spontaneously formed by tens of thousands of martial artists. Umbrella Corporation headquarters, Fortress 1. Enter.

The three stared at each other, creating an extremely awkward atmosphere. H. Meeting her expectant and nervous gaze, Shin Yuan did not hesitate at all. He picked up his wine glass and drank the wine mixed with the succubus's kiss in one gulp. The warm liquid slid down his throat and a strange energy spread throughout his body.

Ding. High-risk gene stealing agent succubus' kiss detected. Gene camouflage program activated. S- level flame dragon bloodline gene information begins to be released. Disguise successful.

Shiny yuan wiped his mouth and revealed an extremely satisfied expression. He even let out a serious looking burp and then flexed his biceps in front of Natasha. Good licker. It's potent. I feel like I have all the energy in my body.

He looked at Natasha's smug expression of impending success and his smile became meaningful. Now it's my turn. The second game begins. This time the frivolity on Shun Yuan's face disappeared and he entered a state of absolute focus. With just a slight flick of his wrist, the dice in the dice cup emitted a rhythmic crisp sound.

Before the dice cup even hit the ground, he had already announced the numbers inside. Three sixes, 1 5 1, 24 points. Natasha, skeptical, opened the dice cup and saw the numbers. No more, no less. Exactly the same as the number of points Shinuan reported.

Your turn, Natasha. Shinuan picked up the wine bottle and poured Natasha a glass of the same wine to celebrate. He pushed the wine glass towards her and urged, "Come on, let's return the favor. You should also try this good stuff." Natasha's expression turned ugly for half a second. Every day, he would arrive at this special cell on time for 3 to four hours of intense training. They were then thrown into Su Chingu's speciallymade medicinal baths, each one more potent than the last, to repair their bodies while simultaneously consuming the flesh and blood of highlevel star beasts cooked by top chefs to replenish their energy. This hellish cycle would be enough to drive any martial artist to a mental breakdown. But for Shin Yuan, it was a bittersweet experience because the effect is just so damn significant.

With the combined blessing of his overpowered talent of becoming stronger through training and the divine skill of nourishing with dragon energy, his strength is skyrocketing at an alarming rate. Three more days passed. Natasha in the interrogation room had completely changed. She stopped resisting, stopped cursing, and even stopped crying. Rationally, she hated this man to the core, wishing she could eat his flesh and sleep on his skin. But instinct is screaming wildly at me.

Her face was filled with terror and despair. "Miss Angelina, don't be nervous." Su Ching Xhus voice came through the screen, still as gentle and intellectual as ever, but to Angelina, it was more terrifying than the devil's whispers.

This is our company's latest neural dissection probe. Such Ching Zu smiled and waved the probe covered with fine needles in front of Angelina's eyes. It could precisely peel away every memory nerve without damaging your cerebral cortex. Of course, the process might be a little painful. But don't worry, your body has been genetically modified, giving you far greater vitality than the average person, enough to support us in completing at least 300 experiments.

We will let you watch your memories being extracted one by one while you are in a state of endless lucidity. Suching voice seemed to possess a kind of magic. She didn't use torture or coercion. She simply explained the upcoming experimental procedure to Angelina in a tone that stated scientific facts. But that absolute disregard for life, that madness of treating her, a living person, as experimental material is more capable of destroying a person's will than any form of torture.

No, I don't need to say anything. I'll tell you everything. On the screen, the Ace Viper, who was defiant and clamoring to make the Dragon Sea Empire pay the price just a second ago, had his psychological defenses collapsed the moment he saw Su Chingu activate the neuronal stripping probe. She screamed like a mad woman, tears streaming down her face, shouting out everything she knew about the plan, the hidden spy network, and the Federation's follow-up deployments like beans spilling from a bamboo tube. Natasha, watching her former comrade and rival make such a fool of themselves on the screen, felt a chill run from the soles of her feet to the top of her head, as if the blood in her body was about to freeze.

Fear. An unprecedented fear gripped her heart like a giant thorny hand. Just then, Shinuan's voice rang softly in her ear. Did you see that? Shinuan stood up, walked step by step to her, and lifted her face. Now, I'm giving you one last chance.

Option one, become my woman. Forget your past. Forget your mission. And from now on, all you need to do is please me. In return, you will enjoy a life of comfort and luxury you never dared to dream of before.

I won't touch any of your sisters or your foolish cousin. Their fate is to be sent to Dr. Seab and become her new toys. Option two. He pointed to the screen where Angelina, who had been injected with sedatives due to a mental breakdown, was being dragged away like a rag doll.

Like her, she was sent to Dr. Sue's laboratory. Believe me, Shinuan's voice was filled with cruel malice. She's more interested in your body, which has undergone deep genetic modification by Black Widow, than in me. She has a thousand ways to make you scream out all your secrets in endless lucidity and agony, then turn you into a body that can never speak, but can still breathe and shed tears.

You can choose for yourself." After saying that, Shinuan released her hand, sat back down in his chair, and looked at her leisurely, waiting for her answer. A deafly silence fell over the cell. Natasha trembled violently, her teeth chattering. "Choose! Is this what you call a choice! On one hand, they betrayed their organization and their beliefs, becoming utterly play things of the enemy. On the other side lies a hell on earth, a place 10,000 times more terrifying than death.

Loyalty, glory, dignity. These things which she had been instilled with since childhood and for which she had fought for half her life seemed so ridiculous and so vulnerable in the face of Su Ching Xus eyes which shone with a mad light and in the face of her extreme fear of becoming an experimental subject. Her mind was flooded with images of the brutal and bloody training she had undergone since childhood, the cold-blooded and ruthless faces of the organization's higher-ups. And then she looked at Angelina's desparing numb eyes on the screen. She discovered that the faith she had fought for, even at the cost of everything seemed utterly unworthy of her journey to that hell on earth.

Is it worth it? It's not worth it. The moment this thought popped into her mind, her beliefs crumbled. Tears silently streamed down her once vibrant blue eyes. A long time. Natasha looked at the man not far away who was staring at her coldly with a scrutinizing gaze.

The stubbornness, hatred, and madness in her eyes had all vanished without a trace. At this moment, she didn't say anything. She struggled to her feet from the cold ground. The expression on his face was even more resolute than when he first joined the Federal Secret Service. Chapter 45.

Natasha's tier five blood enhancement potion. This psychological battle, which lasted for several days, has finally come to an end. He won to win completely. That night, when Shin Yuan entered the room again, a series of system notifications suddenly rang in his mind, making his heart skip a beat. Ding! It has been detected that the host and target have completed the 100th time.

The talent guarantee mechanism has been triggered. Ding! A genetic defect, permanently deprived of good fortune, has been detected in the target Natasha. The Dragon Chi nourishing function has been automatically activated to begin repair. In gene repair, 10%, 50%, and 99% are involved. Ding.

Gene repair complete. Target Natasha's luck ability has returned to normal. Ding. Talent effect triggered. Congratulations, host.

Good luck. Ding. Target Natasha. Original score 95. Score plus two after repairing the damaged luck gene.

Host attraction type score plus one. Current overall score 98. Has reached 90% conquest value. Congratulations, host, for successfully conquering the enemy nation's special agent goddess. Ding, ding, ding.

Massive rewards are being settled. A series of system notification sounds like the most beautiful symphony instantly blanked Shun Yuan's mind, leaving only endless ecstasy. It's done. It really worked. My frank skill, which guarantees a perfect shot, can actually defy fate.

Ding, your chi and blood value has exceeded 10,000.

Your chi and blood value has exceeded 15,000. Congratulations host on successfully advancing to the third realm marshall master. Three realms. In just one night, he jumped from the middle stage of the second realm to two minor realms. directly stepping into the third realm of martial arts master, which is the dream of ordinary martial artists.

He leaned down and gently kissed her smooth forehead. From today onwards, you are no longer Black Widow.

You are Natasha, my woman, Shin Yuans woman. Half an hour later, at the headquarters of the Umbrella Corporation, in the highest command center in the conference room, Ziao Jingwa and Leans hands trembled slightly as they looked at the list of spy networks that Natasha had written herself, a list that was over 10 pages long and so detailed it was appalling. Good lad, good lad. Ziao Jingo was so excited that his face turned red. He slapped Shin Yuan's shoulder hard, so hard that he almost stumbled.

Without shedding a drop of blood, the Federation's top agent spilled all his secrets. Your skills in picking up girls, I mean, in interrogation, are better than the two of us old guys combined. Lean also looked at Shin Yuan with approval and satisfaction. The more she looked at him, the more pleased she became. Upon hearing this, Shinuan simply smiled calmly.

He paused, put down his teacup, and then under the astonished gazes of the two men, uttered a startling statement. She is pregnant. From this moment forward, she is my wife, Shin Yuans wife.

Huff dash. Ziao Jingua spat out the mouthful of hot tea he had just taken a sip of, turning it into a cloud of steam that accurately smeared Li Yans face across from him. Li Yun didn't even bother to wipe the tea off her face. She and Zhiao Jingua were frozen in place, their mouths agape, as if they had been put under a spell. when Xiao Jinga and Le Yun clearly saw the rows of potion effects radiating golden light. Second tier chi and blood enhancement potion can unconditionally increase the maximumqi and blood of a second realm martial artist by 10%. Tier five health enhancement potion can unconditionally increase the maximum health of a grandmaster of the fifth realm by 10%. ElderQin Returns. With 25,000 points ofQi and blood, the Kuong fighter jet represents the pinnacle of technology in the Langai Empire. When the futuristic black fighter jet silently hovered over the helellipad of the Umbrella Corporation headquarters, the entire base went on high alert. Shin Yuan looked at the red potion on the table, which shone with an alluring luster and felt a surge of excitement in his heart. This is a fantastic item that can unconditionally increase the maximum health of a third realm martial artist by 1/10enth. His current chi and blood value is 15,000. Without the slightest hesitation, Shin Yuan picked up the third tier chi and blood enhancement potion, unscrewed the cap, and was about to pour it into his mouth, etc. Su Ching Xu suddenly spoke up to stop him. She walked up to Shin Yuan, took the medicine from his hand, and then took out a brand new syringe filled with a pale golden liquid from her briefcase. Oral absorption is too slow, and there is energy loss. Such looked at Shin Yuan and gave him a kind smile.

He looked at Elder Sheen for help, hoping that this powerful rogue cultivator could step in and uphold justice. Bring it on. Shin Yuan stealed his heart, closed his eyes, and voluntarily stretched out his arm, looking like he was bravely going to his execution for the sake of having no purpose. The cold needle pierced the skin. A gentle infusion of the medicine. Huh.

Shinyuan was taken aback. It really doesn't hurt. Moreover, a warm and powerful energy flowed through his entire body along his meridians. The feeling was like soaking in a top-notch hot spring with every cell cheering and jumping for joy. That feels so good.

That feels so good. Just as he closed his eyes, enjoying this comfort, the system panel in his mind started flashing wildly again. Ding. Detected that the host is absorbing high purity chi and blood energy. Ding.

Suching looked at the data curve on the light screen generated by her talent, which had once again risen vertically and even broken through the upper limit of the chart, and exclaimed excitedly. Old Chin was the first to react, bursting into deafening laughter.

Shin Yuan grinned from ear to ear as he listened to the continuous notification sounds in his mind. Old Shin didn't answer directly, but simply waved his hand, signaling everyone to sit down. His cloudy gaze swept over everyone present, finally settling on Shin Yuan. Do you know why our Dragon Sea Empire was able to rise from the ruins of the Great Cataclysm in just a few hundred years and become the dominant power on Earth? Standing alongside the Free Federation and the Starbeast Empire, Old Sheen's voice became distant and deep, carrying a sense of historical weight. Whether you are a scion of a wealthy family or an ordinary citizen from a remote planet, as long as you have talent and are willing to work hard, the Empire will provide you with the best resources and give you the opportunity to stand on a higher stage in the universe. Shinuan raised his eyebrows slightly when he first heard this name. That's right. Xiao Jingwa picked up the conversation, a hint of longing and reminiscence appearing on his rugged face. Lie Yun added softly. You could say that including your uncle Xiao and me and even elder back then, we all fought our way up from the heavenly pride battle. Elder Chen, do you mean that Shun Yuan looking at ElderQ already has a guess in his mind? The new Imperial Prodigy tournament will be held on the Imperial Capital Star in less than a month. The choice is yours. Firstly, staying on Earth means having a protective umbrella and my protection, which can ensure your lifelong peace and wealth, but you will never have the chance to set foot in the starry sky again and see a wider world. Secondly, participate in the battle of the prodigies. Use your fist to earn a place of fame throughout the empire and seize a ticket to the Milky Way. It is a more dazzling but also more dangerous stage.

The choice is yours. If you choose comfort, I will not force you. But from now on, her majesty the queen will no longer pay attention to someone who is content with mediocrity. Old Chin's voice echoed in the secret room. Each word striking Shin Yuans heart.

The entire secret room was completely silent. All eyes were on Shin Yuan, waiting for his choice. Shinuan's mind went blank. The Empress has abandoned him. What's the difference between this and removing the strongest protective umbrella over his head? He instinctively wanted to refuse.

Are you kidding me? Going to fight to the death with all the geniuses in the universe? He had finally earned the means to live a peaceful life with money, a house, and women. Wouldn't it be better to stay on Earth and be a landlord? But a thought popped into my head. My own system. The goal is to conquer those. On this blue planet, there are already so many stunning beauties like Chin Shu, Ling, Su Ching Xu, and Lin Sharon.

What about the entire Milky Way? What would the ratings be for those legendary elven saints, celestial fox princesses, icy female CEOs who control interstellar conglomerates, and even young female empresses who rule a civilization? To spend one's entire life holed up in the newbie village of Earth, guarding one's own little patch of land. Is this what you call lying flat? That's called being spineless. True complacency means having the power to do whatever you want anytime, anywhere. He's the kind of person that makes all the goddesses in the universe cry out for good luck. Go.

We absolutely have to go. If he doesn't go, the empress will abandon him. At that point, he might not even be able to keep anything he is now, let alone win over the goddess. The thought of those landscapes that only exist in legends made Shin Yuan feel his blood boiling. A true man is born between heaven and earth.

How can he remain subservient to others for long? We absolutely have to go have some fun. Old Shin, I understand. Shin Yuan took a deep breath, suppressing his excitement, and his eyes blazed with an unprecedented intensity. I'll participate in this battle of geniuses. However, he changed the subject, revealing his signature sly smile and rubbed his hands together in front of old Chen.

Participation is fine, but this mission is a bit too difficult. Those prodigies are all incredibly arrogant, and my strength is only at the early stage of the third realm. Compared to those top geniuses who easily possess S-level or SS level talents, my status is a bit lacking. He began to openly haggle. You have to give me something good, right? Otherwise, how am I supposed to make a name for myself in the heavenly pride battle? How about giving me a few more injections of something like a chi and blood enhancement potion? or I think my body can handle that dragon blood essence.

I can try it again. Get lost. Before old Chin could speak, Su Chingu, who was standing next to him, couldn't stand it anymore. Chapter 48. The virtuous wife's confession. The first rays of morning sunlight streamed through the enormous floor toseeiling windows of Fortress 1, casting long streaks of light across the luxurious bed. Shinyuan opened his eyes, feeling relaxed and full of energy. He looked down and found himself embracing a stunningly beautiful woman with a sweet sleeping face.

Lynch curled up in his arms like a docel cat. The continuous nourishment from the dragon's energy during this period made her look like a piece of jade that had been polished a new radiating a lustrous glow. Her already fair skin was now so tender it seemed you could pinch water from it with a healthy pink hue. Her bare face without any makeup was more captivating than any heavily madeup face Shinuan had ever seen. What's most deadly is her already outrageous figure.

Whether it was the secondary development of the dragon's energy or a normal reaction during pregnancy, her perfect curves became even more astonishing, filling out the silk slip dress to its fullest and outlining an arc that could drive any man crazy. Shinuan's Adams Applebed. This is the ultimate joy of nurturing a character. Looking at her peaceful and beautiful sleeping face, Shin Yuan's groggginess from just waking up vanished instantly, replaced by a mischievous glint in his eyes. He carefully approached Lynn Sharon's jade-like earlobe.

He lowered his voice and breathed hot air into her ear in a husky magnetic tone. Honey, wake up. It's time for your morning exercise. The warm touch and the breath near her ear made Lin Char's eyelashes tremble slightly. She groggy opened her still wet eyes and saw the handsome face with a mischievous grin right in front of her.

H. Her face flushed instantly, and she instinctively tried to push away his mischievous hand, but her body was too weak to exert any strength. She could only give him a symbolic pat on his firm chest, her voice soft and sweet with a nasal tone from just waking up. "Stop joking, it's not even dawn yet. It's perfect that it's still dark.

It'll be convenient for us to do some naughty things." Shin Yuans laughter grew even more wicked, and he became increasingly unrestrained, prompting the girl to let out a soft murmur. "You're so mean," Lin Sharon protested softly. But her clear eyes were filled with unyielding love and dependence. This complete trust pleased Shin Yuan greatly. He pinched her delicate chin and asked deliberately, "Honey, I'm going to the capital in a month to participate in the heavenly pride battle.

There might be a bunch of girls even prettier than you crying and begging to have my babies. Aren't you jealous? He had expected to see the girl acting cute, either pouting or pouting. Unexpectedly, Lin Charuns shyness disappeared after hearing these words. She suddenly reached out and carefully cupped Shin Yuans face in her hands. Those clear eyes, which always carried a hint of unease and mist, were now incredibly bright and earnest, as if trying to penetrate the deepest part of his soul.

I don't care how many women you have in the future. My only concern is your safety. The opponents in the heavenly pride battle must be incredibly strong, right? You must be careful. She paused, her eyes slightly reening, but she stubbornly held back. Go ahead and do what you want to do.

I will take good care of our home. My baby and I will always be here waiting for you to come back. These words were like a powerful warm current, instantly washing away all the joking and playfulness in Shin Yuans heart. He was completely stunned. A tremendous sense of emotion, satisfaction, and an unprecedented sense of responsibility welled up from the deepest part of his heart.

What defines a perfect wife? That's it. This is a blessing that must have taken 10 lifetimes to earn. He could no longer control his emotions and pulled the girl in front of him into his arms tightly, as if he wanted to meld her into his very bones. Rest assured, Shin Yuan rested his chin on her shoulder, his voice slightly with excitement, yet incredibly solemn. for you all.

I will become the strongest man in the world. This sudden warmth and the increasingly beautiful and alluring body of the girl in his arms was like a spark thrown into a gasoline can. Chu ran, "You are now an A-level talent martial artist, and your physique is different from before." He began to use sweet words to seduce her, but the sky hasn't yet. Shinuan didn't give her a chance to refuse. Just as he was preparing to take the next step and fully enjoy this blessing he had accumulated over 10 lifetimes.

Bang. A deafening explosion. The heavy door of fortress number one made of special alloy and touted as having soundproofing comparable to a bank vault was kicked open from the outside by an incredibly powerful force. A tall imposing figure in a black tight-fitting combat suit strode in exuding a chilling aura. It's longing.

She was clearly getting impatient and was ready to personally drag that lazy bum to training, but she never dreamed that when she kicked open the door, she would see such a disgusting scene. The air seemed to freeze in that instant. Shin Yuan froze in midair, his expression turning to astonishment, then extreme displeasure. He slowly turned his head inch by inch to look at the doorway. Lin Sharon let out a short scream.

In the next second, she buried her face in the pillow, wishing she could disappear from the world on the spot. Longing standing at the door was completely petrified. The icy murderous expression on her face when she kicked the door was still frozen on her expression, but her cold phoenix eyes were wide open, clearly reflecting this absurd scene. 1 second, 2 seconds, 3 seconds. A visible blush suddenly rose from her fair neck, quickly spreading to her ears and finally across her entire pretty face.

For the first time, a look of utter disorientation appeared on her perpetually icy face. In deathly silence, Shinuan looked at Longing, whose face was so red it was almost bleeding. Yet, she was still in the position of kicking the door open. He silently pulled up the blanket and covered Lin Char and himself. Then he cleared his throat and broke the extremely awkward silence in an extremely natural tone.

Good morning, Instructor Long. Do you want it? Chapter 49. The iceberg instructor's heart is in turmoil. Continue. You continue.

Long Yings voice was tight and she was practically fleeing in panic. Her turning around was so hasty that she looked rather disheveled, completely lacking her usual sassiness and composure. Bang! She slammed the door shut with all her might. The loud noise making the door panel tremble. The world has finally returned to peace.

Inside the room, Shinuan looked at the still humming alloy door, then looked down at Lin Sharon in his arms, who had buried her face in the pillow and was so embarrassed she looked like she was about to spontaneously combust. He couldn't help but laugh and cry at the same time. In the corridor, Longing leaned against the cold wall, her heart pounding wildly, as if it would burst out of her chest at any moment. My cheeks were burning hot, and I was breathing rapidly. Her mind was like a laggy film, uncontrollably replaying the scene over and over again.

She shook her head vigorously, trying to shake the thought out of her mind, but it was no use. She suddenly realized that today's close training would probably be incredibly agonizing and bizarre. As long as you succeed, she paused and behind her glasses, her beautiful eyes shown with a fervor that made Shun Yuans heart tremble. I'll let you study me once. These last few words were like a bolt of lightning, striking Shun Yuan directly on the top of his head.

Study her once. Is this the research you were thinking of? He subconsciously turned his head, his gaze sweeping over Su Ching Xus intelligent and pretty face so close to his and the G-level human nuclear weapon that even the white coat couldn't hide. Click. A soft sound. In this quiet laboratory was like the sounding of a war horn. He pointed to himself, then to Shun Yuan, his face contorted with grief and indignation. If you had my level of awareness, you'd have a whole platoon of kids by now. Just as the two were whispering to each other, Mu Chingshi gracefully shook off the young men who were fawning over her. And with light steps, she took the initiative to walk towards Shinuan. Shinuan. I often hear Zhoi mention you, saying that you are a very young and very powerful martial artist. Her tone carried a hint of girish coetishness, which combined with her stunningly beautiful face made it impossible for anyone to feel the slightest bit of disgust.

Only children make choices. I want them all. I've always been very interested in true heroes. Her fingertips almost touched the back of Shun Yuans hand. In the end, Shin Yuan still reached out his hand.

acting, but not much. He's just an insignificant martial artist, hardly a hero. He just turned 18 this year. 18 years old. Mu Shing Shiwa's beautiful almond shaped eyes widened instantly, a stunning light flashing within them.

If it were any ordinary third realm martial artist, they would probably have been forced to their knees and made a fool of themselves in that instant.

But Shinuan is no ordinary person. The vital energy within his body, tempered by both dragon blood and dragon soul, along with the robust physique brought about by his unreasonable frank talent, began to operate automatically. At this moment, a warm yet doineering dragon aura surged from the depths of his dantion, instantly flowing through his limbs and bones, neutralizing most of the terrifying pressure that had invaded his body. He remained unfazed and even had the leisure to gently rub Akasha's smooth, delicate hand with his thumb. He raised his head, a roguish smile on his face, and chuckled.

But this man in front of me, this little guy who looks like he's only at the mid-stage of the third realm, can actually talk and laugh so easily. That's interesting.

That's so interesting. The secrets he holds are far deeper than I imagined. She withdrew her oppressive aura, and her smile grew even brighter, as if the potentially fatal test had been nothing more than a harmless joke. Chapter 76. Shin Yuan led his men upstairs.
