Zhao Ei immediately understood. He patted his chest, making a muffled thud, and declared confidently. The rooftop terrace is reserved for you all tonight. Anyone who dares to go up and disturb us, I'll break their legs. He portrayed his lawless and utterly dissolute demeanor so vividly that it was so realistic that not a single flaw could be found.

As Akasha watched the scene of brotherly affection unfold before her, her red lips beneath the mask curled slightly upward and a playful yet profound light shown in her beautiful violet eyes. Play. You guys keep acting. She wanted to see how long this meticulously choreographed play could last. However, this scene was witnessed by a woman who came out of the banquet hall anxiously searching for Shin Yuan.

It is Muing Shua. Just moments before, she was savoring Shun Yuans promise to return and marry her once he became famous throughout the empire. Her heart filled with sweetness and a touch of shyness as she dreamed of the future. But the next second, she saw the man who had just made a marriage promise to her now leading another masked woman with an even more voluuptuous figure and a more noble and mysterious aura about to go upstairs. She felt that the beautiful fantasy she had just built up along with that sweetness shattered into countless pieces with a snap scattering on the cold corridor floor.

What kind of inspirational hero possesses F-level talent and defies fate? What kind of man will one day be renowned throughout the empire? This guy is clearly a complete scumbag who falls in love with every woman he meets and changes women faster than he changes clothes. A strong sense of grievance and anger welled up in my heart. Her cheeks flushed instantly, her fists clenched, and she was so angry that she almost rushed up to confront him on the spot. But her remaining rationality made her forcefully suppress this impulse. Her stunningly beautiful face was etched with displeasure, her beautiful eyes fixed on that glaring figure with a hint of frost.

Shinuan, accompanied by Akasha and led by Zhao E with excessive enthusiasm, headed towards the private elevator that led to the top floor emperor's terrace. As she passed by Muing Shiua, Akasha suddenly stopped. Her deep violet eyes hidden behind the mask swept over Muing Shiua with disdain. The look in his eyes was as if he were looking at an insignificant old object. Then from those fiery red lips came a very soft, victorious sneer.

Oh, a sneer pierced Moo Ching Shua's heart. Who is she? She is a global pop diva. She is the dream girl of millions of men. She is the apple of the eye of the Moo family surrounded by admirers. When has she ever suffered such humiliation to be treated with such contempt and disdain? What's more, it's because of a man who just showered her with sweet words and made promises.

She couldn't accept it. How could she accept being abandoned like this? He was even more unwilling to lose to a mysterious woman who didn't even dare to show her face. That contemptuous sneer ignited the deep-seated competitive spirit and unwillingness to admit defeat in Muing Shua's heart. Her body trembled slightly, but was quickly brought under control by a strong force. Watching Shun Yuan and the masked woman walk into the elevator and watching the elevator doors slowly close, shutting out the glaring scene, suppressing the pentup grievances and anger within her, she stroed up to Zhoi.

Zhoi, could you please give me Mr. Shin's contact information right now? Muing Shua forced herself to remain calm. Looking at her, who was on the verge of tears but was trying to appear strong, Zhaoi felt a pang of emotion. My brother Yuan is awesome. How long has it been? He's already won over the queen's heart.

Did you even make her cry? This charm is absolutely incredible. He scratched his head a blank. I don't know either. Look on his face, shrugged and said with a hint of helplessness. To be honest, I don't have any either.

Shin Yuan is elusive. He's always the one who contacts me. I wouldn't dare to reach out to him first. Seeing Mu Ching Xiwa's increasingly agrieved expression, he quickly added, trying to comfort her. Don't worry, knowing his personality, he'll probably be wagging his tail to find you tomorrow.

I know him. He's a man who can't control his lust. He can't resist pretty girls. You're so beautiful. He definitely won't forget you.

These words were less of a consolation and more of a rubbing salt into Mu Ching Shiwa's already broken heart. Upon hearing this, Muing Shua felt a surge of blood rushing to her chest, and she bit her lower lip so hard it almost bled. She looked up, her almond-shaped eyes fixed on the elevator numbers that had reached the top floor, and silently made a vow in her heart, "Shinuan! You big liar! You scumbag! Didn't you say you were going to marry me? Didn't you say you'd wait until you were famous throughout the empire? Didn't you say that I was the person you wanted to protect for the rest of your life? Good. Very good. Since you dare to lie to me in public and have an ambiguous relationship with other women in front of me, then well see.

If you truly win the Imperial Pride tournament and become famous throughout the empire, yet you don't come to marry me. I, Muing Shua, am not finished with you." Without a word, she turned around, her high heels clicking as she walked away without looking back. Her long, slender legs looked exceptionally beautiful against the backdrop of her silver star-studded gown. The hem of the dress drew an angry arc behind her, making her appear lonely and floren, yet also exuding an indomitable stubbornness. Watching her lonely and ferorn figure gradually disappear into the distance.

The two young models beside Zhao, he couldn't help but speak up with a hint of jealousy. Their eyes held a mixture of shot and frea and ingratiation. Young master, what's so great about Muing Shua? She's just a singer, isn't she? She got dumped by your brother. She's nowhere near as good to you as we sisters are. As they spoke, they snuggled close to Zhao E in a coetish manner.

Upon hearing this, Zhao Yis playful smile vanished instantly, replaced by a cold, authoritative expression befitting a top tier heir to a wealthy family. He slapped each of them once. Although it wasn't hard, the force imbued with internal energy instantly left red marks on the cheeks of the two young models. Roll. Who do you think you are? You dare compare yourself to her? The two young models were stunned by the beating, covering their faces with tears in their eyes, but dared not speak out in anger and could only shrink to the side in grievance.

They are usually quite famous in the entertainment industry, and ordinary people can't even touch them. But at this moment, they are like frightened quailes. Zhao looked in the direction Muing Shua had left, then glanced at the rising numbers on the elevator, clicking his tongue in amazement, his eyes filled with admiration and envy for Shinuan. Chapter 77. When the countest reveals her true colors, the act can no longer continue.

Top floor, the presidential suite at the Imperial Terrace. The level of luxury here far exceeded Shin Yuan's imagination. The entire suite occupies the top floor of the clubhouse, covering an area of over 2,000 square meters. Underfoot is a cool, smooth obsidian floor. Above is a holographic dome simulating a vast starry sky.

And in the distance, there is even an open air infinity pool overlooking the dazzling night view of the entire Dongai city. But Shin Yuan was not in the mood to appreciate any of this at the moment. He and Akasha sat facing each other across a huge round table carved from a single piece of white marble. Longing stood behind Shin Yuan like a perfect ice sculpture, expressionless. However, her cold phoenix eyes were fixed on Akasha opposite her.

The cold killing intent emanating from her belonging to the peak of the fourth level grand marshall master formed a stark contrast with Akasha's lazy and noble aura. Your bodyguard is very good. Akasha's gaze lingered on Lyings powerful and athletic physique for 3 seconds, a hint of approval flashing in her beautiful eyes. She then sneered inwardly. A martial artist at the peak of the fourth realm who can provide such close protection to a martial artist at the third realm.

If she were just an ordinary S-class playboy relying on family resources, then her name Akasha von Rothschild would be reversed. Beautiful women and fine wine. In this setting, shouldn't we talk about romance and poetry? Shin Yuan poured her a glass of top quality red wine worth millions from a thousand years ago. Completely oblivious to the tense atmosphere in the room, he smiled and tried to break the deadlock. Romantic tales.

Akasha elegantly picked up her wine glass, gently swirled it, and the scarlet liquid rippled in the crystal glass, releasing an intoxicating aroma. Her red lips parted slightly, her voice languid yet alluring. I prefer to get straight to the point. For example, your bodyguard is quite nice. How about I borrow her for a couple of days?" Upon hearing this, Lyings pretty face turned cold.

But before she could react, suddenly Lie's voice filled with suppressed tension came through the military-grade brainwave communicator disguised as an earring in Shun Yuans ear. Auan, the situation has changed. That woman's strength far exceeds our intelligence. We've just detected that she's at the peak of the fifth realm Grandmaster. She could break through to the sixth realm at any moment.

The seven realms war emperors of the imperial capital have already departed on the Kuen, but it will take at least 2 hours to arrive. Hold her off at all costs. 2 hours. This is a death order. A death order.

Upon hearing those three words, Shinuan's pupils contracted subconsciously for 0.1 seconds. This is a martial artist's most instinctive reaction when receiving the highest order. However, this reaction was so subtle that even he himself was unaware of it. But Akash Sha, who was elegantly sipping her wine across from her, keenly noticed it. Her gaze instantly focused on Shun Yuans left ear.

There was an inconspicuous black stud earring that fit perfectly in the ear and did not reflect any light under the lamp. Brainwave communicator Akashas heart sank. The smile on her face only grew brighter and more captivating. It turned out that from the very beginning, she had fallen headlong into a trap that had been carefully laid for her. The game is over.

All right, young master. Let's stop acting. She stared directly at Shun Yuan. Her deep violet eyes filled with mockery and coldness. Tell me, who are you? This identity is much more interesting than the so-called prodigy versus genius.

The vital energy within Lyings body erupted at this moment. She was prepared. If anything went wrong, she would immediately burn her life force and energy to forcefully break away with Shin Yuan. Shin Yuan felt a chill run through his body. the other party has seen through us.

Continuing this performance is pointless. He looked at the stunningly beautiful countest before him whose true intentions had been revealed and instead of answering, he asked, "Before asking someone for their hand, shouldn't you introduce yourself first? For example, how did you know that my identity was a disguise?" Faced with Shan Yuan's bold counterattack, Akasha giggled. The laughter, clear and melodious like silver bells, exuded the charm of a mature woman and quickly dispelled the tense, almost frozen, murderous aura in the room. That's interesting. Really interesting.

She raised her wine glass, her beautiful eyes fixed on Shun Yuan, and said something that shocked everyone. All right, since you want to play the honest game, I won't beat around the bush with you anymore. I, Akasha von Rothschild, am one of the future direct heirs of the Rothschild family, currently serving as the director of the intelligence department of the Free Federation. I came here to find you. Shinyuan's mind went blank.

What? They confessed everything. Sister, does your federal government know you're acting as a spy? Did you spend all your money on bags? An incredulous look appeared on Long Yings cold, pretty face. They originally thought Akasha would continue to pretend and wait for an opportunity to kidnap Shin Yuan, but who knew she would so bluntly reveal her identity? What kind of incredible plot twist is this? Shin Yuan was inwardly turmoil, but he gritted his teeth and continued acting. Looking for me? I'm just a student about to go to the capital for a competition.

What place would be worth your personal trip, Earl? Chapter 78. The Queen's Kiss. The Dragon's Mark. It's over. We're completely exposed.

A fierce glint flashed in Lyings eyes and her Yuan Chi telepathic message exploded in Shun Yuans mind. Prepare for a full-scale attack just as this great battle was about to break out. I just wanted to ask Mr. Shin a question. Would you be willing to have a few children with me? Faced with Akasha's shocking question, Shinuan was completely dumbfounded.

Longing behind him also froze on the spot. The murderous aura that had just gathered on his body, ready to destroy everything, stuck there in an awkward position. Oh. Akasha stopped in front of her. To the astonishment of the two men, she slowly removed the exquisite silver mask from her face. A noble, beautiful face, brimming with the ultimate charm of a mature woman, was exposed to the air without reservation. That wasn't just ordinary beauty.

Alarm bells rang loudly in Shun Yuan's mind. Warning, warning. Detected that the target is implanting an SS level talent blood control accessory mark into the host's body. Blood slave mark. Once the branding is successful, the host will become a complete slave to the target with their life and death entirely in the hands of the target.

What? This woman was definitely up to no good. Shinuan was terrified and was just about to use his dragon energy to resist. The next second, the systems notification tone became incredibly excited and enthusiastic. Foreign mental imprint intrusion detected. System countermeasures activated.

Dragon chi purification activated. Blood slave mark removal successful. Reverse branding in progress. Congratulations, host. A unique mark has been successfully implanted into the target Akasha's body.

Ding. Target Akasha von Rothschild. Sensing a higher level of life imprint. Instinctively felt fear and submission. Submission value plus 10%.

Current progress 10%. Chapter 79. The brand. The reversal of prey and hunter. The heir in the entire presidential suite.

Countless Federation spies were torn to shreds and turned into a reign of blood under the overwhelming firepower of the Imperial Army, which was like a steel torrent.

Occasionally, stray bullets that were impossible to dodge were easily deflected by the faint, almost invisible blood red shield covering her body. powerful. That's incredible. Is this the strength of a peak grandmaster of the fifth realm? It's like a bug player using invincibility mode, stomping on newbies in the starting village. As Shin Yuan looked down at the Federation spies below, who had been reduced to ashes by the Empire's artillery fire while trying to cover them, a complex and indescribable emotion welled up in his heart.

He couldn't help but ask, "Are they all your men?" Akasha didn't look back, continuing to move swiftly, her tone icy and devoid of any emotion. No, they are not my subordinates. They are merely theerary objects I prepared for you. It is their greatest honor as servants of the Rothschild family to be willing to give their lives for your arrival. These chilling words sent a shiver down Shin Yuan's spine.

This woman doesn't even consider those who risked their lives for her as human beings. In her eyes, those subordinates who risked their lives for her were no different from ants on the roadside. Boom! Another building collapsed amidst the fierce artillery fire, sending up clouds of dust. Lie Yun and Zhiao quickly killed the two crazed guards. Before they could even catch their breath, they leaped up and boarded a Blackbird class assault fighter jet that the Umbrella Corporation had been hovering in midair.

"Chase her! We can't let her get away!" Ziao Jingua personally took the pilot's seat, pushed the control stick, and the fighter jet emitted a piercing roar, instantly transforming into a streak of light, and rapidly chasing after the direction Akasha had fled. Behind them, more than 20 wingmen of the same model also formed a combat formation and followed closely behind. A thrilling chase has officially begun in the skies above the city. Akasha, holding Shun Yuan, leaped rapidly among the towering skyscrapers of the city. Her incredibly long legs encased in black lace stockings unleashed astonishing power and speed with each push against the wall, making her appear like a phantom in the night, leaving after images that were almost imperceptible to the naked eye in the steel forest.

On the ground, Ling had also broken free from the entanglement. She pushed the speed of her dragon soul battle body to the limit, her golden figure flying through the streets like lightning, attempting to intercept her from the ground. But Akasha's speed is just too fast. It was so fast that even Longing felt desperate. The black figure was getting further and further away from her.

Warning, target is approaching the port area. Repeat, target is approaching the port area. Inside the fighter jet, piercing alarms blared incessantly. Open fire. Block her route with artillery fire.

Lean looked at the rapidly moving red dot on the screen and decisively gave the order to fire. Receive. The wingman formation immediately adjusted its formation, and the six-barreled Vulcan cannons under the nose of the aircraft began to emit a teeth grinding, spinning sound. Da da da. The next second, a scorching energy blast roared and tore through the night sky.

An energy blast grazed past Shin Yuan's body, blasting a signal tower next to him into countless flying metal fragments. The scorching heat even singed a few strands of Shin Yuan's hair. What? Shinuan was so frightened that his soul almost flew out of his body. He felt that he had never been so close to death. He was held under Akasha's arm like a lamb to the slaughter, watching the deadly energy blasts explode around him.

Don't fire. We're on the same side. We're on the same side. I'm still in her hands. Are you trying to kill me, too? His voice, transmitted clearly through the communicator in his earring, reached Li Yun and Xiao Jingwa's ears.

However, his cries for help were met with Lie Yuns mocking and gloating voice coming through the communicator. Oh dear, young master, what are you afraid of? You forgot your dragon soul jade pendant can withstand all attacks from anyone below the fifth realm Grandmaster. Forget a few energy blasts. Even a small nuclear bomb exploding next to you wouldn't harm you in the slightest. Oh, right.

That jade pendant also contains a trace of martial arts essence left behind by that person. It will automatically trigger whenever you are under a fatal threat. Don't think that this countest is just at the peak of the fifth realm. Even if she really breaks through to the sixth realm, she won't be able to harm a single hair on your head. So, you can rest assured.

We promise to send you and her off with the fiercest artillery fire. Huh. Shinyan was stunned after hearing this. Dragon soul jade pendant invincible below the five realms. Is there still the true meaning of martial arts? Holy crap.

After the initial shock, a tremendous sense of security and confidence instantly surged through his entire body. Since they can't die, what's there to be afraid of? Shinuan immediately changed his attitude. One second, the hostages were terrified and crying for their parents. The next, they were arrogant and doineering wararmongers who wanted nothing more than to stir up trouble. He spoke into the communicator, his voice even more agitated than Leon's, roaring.

Why didn't you say so sooner? What are you waiting for? Don't hesitate. Fire at me. Use the strongest firepower of your umbrella corporation. Use your company's most expensive missiles. Bomb them hard.

Today, either she dies or we all have a blast. On the other end of the communicator, Lie Yun and Xiao Jingua looked at each other, their mouths twitching wildly as they listened to Shu Yuan's sudden, almost insane outburst. This kid is a real character who can change his expression all over again. Akasha also heard Shinuan shouts. She looked down at the man in her arms who had been trembling with fear just a moment ago, but now looked excited as if he wished she were blown up on the spot.

Something's not right. Something's really wrong. Chapter 82. Infiltrating enemy aircraft. Spy within a spy.

Natasha, as you wish. Lean suppressed laughter came through the communicator. The next second, the fighter jet's firepower increased to a whole new level. Akasha frowned slightly when she heard Shinuan's shouts. The immense blood red energy within her body erupted, forming a more solid and massive blood red shield around her and Shun Yuan's bodies.

At the same time, her speed increased again. She withstood the intense artillery fire, transforming into a streak of crimson light that pierced the night sky, charging madly towards the distant port. There lay her last escape route, one she had prepared long ago. Right at that moment, a private fighter jet, entirely black with a lifelike crimson rose emblem branded on its fuselof, silently swooped down from the thick clouds. The fighter jets hatch opened.

Inside the cockpit, a familiar figure came into Shaun Yuan's view. Natasha, she changed into a smart and stylish black flight suit, which perfectly accentuated her fiery and alluring figure. Her face was pale with a sickly palar, but her azure eyes, which always held a touch of allure and determination, were calm and focused. She calmly maneuvered the fighter jet with remarkable precision as she came to meet her new superior. Before fleeing the East China Sea, Akasha gave her only one task, to stay here, fly this plane, and wait for her.

You are not allowed to participate in any battles or contact anyone. Come up here. Akasha looked at the fighter jet so close at hand and finally a victorious, elegant, yet cruel smile appeared on her lips. She won. However, just as she was about to lead Shin Yuan into the open hatch among the pursuing fighter jets, Li Yun and Xiao Jingwa exchanged a glance.

The two showed no signs of anxiety or anger and instead simultaneously revealed smiles like cunning old foxes who had finally caught their prey. Everything seemed to be proceeding according to a larger, more elaborate script. Just before boarding the fighter jet, Akasha demonstrated her extreme regard for Shun Yuan, this rare treasure. She didn't even board the plane herself first. Instead, with an extremely delicate and gentle force, she gently tossed Shun Yuan, who was in her arms, into the open cabin first.

The movements were so gentle, as if they were afraid of hurting him. Shin Yuan traced an arc in the air before plunging head first into a soft, warm embrace that carried a familiar, delicate fragrance. It's Natasha. She had left the driver's seat at some point and was waiting at the cabin door. Shin Yuan threw himself into her arms, his cheek once again feeling that familiar softness.

The two locked eyes. Shin Yuan was frantically conveying a message through his eyes. What do I do now? This woman is going way too far. Am I really going to be sold abroad and worked as a pig? Natasha studied Shin Yuan without making a sound. And then with an extremely subtle movement that only the two of them could perceive, she gently squeezed his palm.

Everything is proceeding according to plan, so I'm at ease. This subtle gesture calmed Shin Yuan's anxious heart. It seems that Lie Yun and Xiao Jingwa had a backup plan. Just then, Akasha gracefully, like a queen, leaped into the cabin. She didn't even glance at the wartorrn city behind her, nor at the four bodyguards and more than 300 federal spies who had died trying to buy her time.

Those people's lives and deaths were none of her concern. Bang! The hatch closed. The fighter jet emitted a deep roar, transformed into a black streak, and sped towards the vast international sea at a terrifying speed far exceeding that of military fighter jets. They quickly left the 20 oddwing men who were anxiously chasing them far behind. Inside the cabin, Akasha sat down on the leather sofa opposite Shinuan.

Her incredibly long legs, encased in black lace stockings, had been torn in several places by the aftershocks of artillery fired during the previous battle, revealing large expanses of her fair and delicate skin along with traces of crimson blood. But this did not detract from her beauty. On the contrary, it added a touch of wildness and deadly sexiness to her noble and elegant temperament. She crossed her legs, her deep violet eyes looking at Shun Yuan opposite her with great interest and smiled playfully. Young man, you are mine now.

Shin Yuan looked at her, but in his heart he was cursing her incessantly. Damn it. If I hadn't known you guys had a backup plan, I'd probably be crying by now. He remained outwardly calm, but instead asked the question that had been bothering him. I'm very curious.

He looked at the stunningly beautiful queen before him, who seemed to have victory firmly in her grasp and asked with a serious expression, "You went to such lengths, kissing me and kidnapping me. What were you after? I'm just an ordinary person who awakened an F-rank talent of good fortune. Is it worth all this fuss?" Even at the cost of sacrificing the entire spy network of the East China Sea, what's the point? When Akasha heard his question, it was as if she had heard the biggest joke in the world. She let out a silvery laugh. laughing so hard that her body trembled and her breathtaking curves heaved violently.

"Little gentleman, you're so cute." She stopped laughing, her beautiful violet eyes fixed on Shun Yuan, her voice carrying an air of self-righteousness. What I'm after is you, of course. I brought you back so that I could have a dozen, no, dozens of children with you. It's very simple, isn't it? Just for having children. All that effort, all those deaths just to find someone who can have children is the average number of infertile people in your federal government.

Seeing Shun Yuan's still confused expression, Akasha's smile became even more eerie and fanatical. She stood up from the sofa and walked gracefully to Shun Yuan once again. She leaned down, her beautiful face almost touching Shin Yuans. In an extremely seductive, devilish tone, she whispered in his ear a scene that was both hellish and fatally alluring. Do you know what will happen to a machine like yours if it falls into the hands of a family like ours? You will be deprived of all human rights and kept like the finest breeding stock in the most luxurious manner.

You will spend the rest of your life in extreme joy and pain. Your only task each day is to constantly interact with all sorts of top tier women from around the world. Women with the finest bloodlines. Not a minute can be stopped until you are completely worthless. Shinyuan felt a chill run down his spine and his mouth went dry.

He even felt a dull ache in his kidneys. But he was even more puzzled. He forced himself to remain calm, frowning as he said, "But I've heard that ancient families like yours value the purity of bloodlines the most. Why would you ask an outsider like me to dilute your noble lineage?" Chapter 83. Akasha to become the new queen.

A tragic slap in the face. Delilution. Akasha's smile vanished instantly, replaced by a sharp, all-seeing gaze. She leaned down again, this time with an even more doineering motion, and pulled Shin Yuan up from the sofa. She whispered in his ear with an extremely seductive, devilish tone.

"My dearest young man, do you think I only want your jeans? No. What I want is for you to become my man, the sole master of my new dynasty. Help me, and I will give you everything. Rebel against me, and you will only become a prisoner being used." Before she finished speaking, she charged forward again with doineering force. This time it's no longer a test, but a blatant invasion on a spiritual level.

Warning. Target detected its fourth attempt to implant a mental imprint. Dragon chi purification activated. Purification in progress. Purification successful.

Reverse suppression is underway. Warning. The target has significantly strengthened its mental barrier. The attempt to suppress it has failed. Due to repeated failed imprinting attempts, the target Akasha has become extremely wary of the host's bloodline.

Submission value remains unchanged. Current progress 25%. A few minutes later, for the first time, an undisguised shock appeared on Akasha's languid and hotty beautiful face. As expected, that's exactly how it is, she muttered to herself, her eyes burning with a fervor that seemed to consume Shin Yuan. What that top tier Am prophet said was actually true.

You are completely uncontrollable by any mental means. Looking at the bewildered Shun Yuan, she suddenly laughed greedily. You think your talent only lets you do that? Wrong. Utterly wrong. Your talent isn't frank or S-rank at all.

It's a rule-based talent that transcends all ranks. You don't dilute any bloodline. You only perfect them. Akasha opened her arms as if embracing a brand new future, her voice trembling slightly with excitement. The offspring born from your body can not only inherit all the mother's talents and bloodline 100%, but also remove the impurities and elevate the bloodline to the most perfect form it can theoretically achieve.

She approached step by step, her beautiful violet eyes reflecting Shun Yuan's shocked face. So, you see, my dear Mr. Shan, I didn't capture you to find a tool. Akasha pointed out the fighter jet window to the Umbrella Corporation's pursuit aircraft which were now far behind them.

A disdainful smile playing on her lips. You'll always be stuck following in the Federation's footsteps, eating our leftover exhaust fumes, never even having the right to surpass us. She began to educate Shun Yuan. Her words filled with mockery and contempt for the technology and martial arts system of the Lang Shia Empire. In her words, the Lia Empire was like a giant that was strong on the outside but weak on the inside, relying entirely on a few top experts in the eighth and 9th realms who were already very old to keep it afloat.

Faced with the triple threat of extraterrestrial beasts, deep sea aliens, and the Federation, the demise of this ancient empire is only a matter of time. Shin Yuan listened to her long-winded speech, remaining outwardly calm but inwardly cursing her wildly. Sister, with your brainwashing skills, it's a waste of your talent not to be involved in pyramid schemes. However, he had to admit that although the woman's words were harsh, they made some sense. Just as Akasha's fighter jet was about to cross the East China Sea defense line and enter the vast international waters, Shinuan's heart was in his throat.

He couldn't help but scream inwardly. This isn't how the script was written. Sister Lee, Uncle Xiao, where's your backup plan? If you don't come soon, I'm really going to be sold abroad like a pig. He had even begun to consider whether to use the martial arts essence left behind by the dragon soul jade to fight this female demon to the death. But at that very moment, the sky ahead suddenly darkened.

It was as if an invisible giant hand had covered the entire sky with a black curtain. No, it didn't darken. Instead, a stunningly beautiful yet indescribably massive figure appeared silently thousands of meters above the ground. She just stood there quietly. She wore a crimson classical palace dress which fluttered in the strong wind.

That face, so beautiful it seemed otherworldly, was expressionless. Those phoenix eyes, which seemed to hold the very essence of the universe's creation and destruction, gazed indifferently down at the toy-like fighter jets below. She was just a person yet she became the soul center of the entire world. Time, space, light, everything else lost its meaning before her. One of the five pillars of humanity, a national level martial emperor at the eighth realm.

The exquisite goddess of war, Jade exquisite arrive. Boom! Akasha's mind exploded the moment she saw that figure. The noble, elegant, and composed smile on her face froze instantly. It immediately transformed into a deep-seated terror and disbelief. She screamed, her voice distorted and shrill with extreme fear.

Eighth realm Marshall emperor. That's impossible for a man. For a mere third realm martial artist, they actually mobilized a national level expert. She couldn't understand it. She couldn't understand.

This was completely beyond her comprehension. This doesn't make sense. However, the exquisite war goddess high in the sky didn't even bother to glance at her. Her indifferent gaze pierced through the fighter jet's layers of armor and landed directly on Shun Yuan, who was also in a state of extreme shock inside the cockpit. Then, under the gaze of Akasha's beautiful violet eyes filled with terror and despair.

The exquisite war goddess slowly raised her slender fair finger. He gently tapped the void below. There was no earthshattering noise. There were no earthshattering energy fluctuations. It was just a simple, understated gesture.

In an instant, the space within a radius of a 100 miles, including Akasha's fighter jet, which was fleeing at three times the speed of sound, froze. Time seemed to have been paused at that moment. The fighter jet remained in a forward-leaning posture, and then, strangely, it came to a standstill in midair. Inside the cabin, the terror and horror on Akasha's face were forever frozen in that moment. The power of a grandmaster at the peak of the fifth realm is as fragile as a joke under this one finger.

She didn't even have the strength to move a single finger. Is this the strength of an eighth realm marshall emperor? Is this the absolute power that makes words law and can control heaven and earth with a single thought? She couldn't even muster the slightest thought of resistance. Not because she didn't want to, but because she dared not. Faced with absolute power, any struggle is feudal and may even lead to more terrible consequences. Akasha was sensible.

She wasn't the kind of stubborn fool. Faced with an insurmountable force, she chose the wisest course of action to give up all resistance and obediently surrender. She wasn't even that flustered. Given her status as the heir to the Rothschild family. Even if the Dragon Summer Empire captured her, they wouldn't dare to really do anything to her.

At most, they'll be detained for a period of time, and then a long-running exchange of interests will be conducted through diplomatic channels. She still has a chance. As long as she lives, as long as she can return to the Federation, she will definitely repay the humiliation she suffered today 100fold. A thousandfold. Chapter 84.

The Countess is arrested. Her arrogance lasted only 3 seconds. The frozen state of space lasted for less than 3 seconds. Her gorgeous black velvet dress had long been replaced by an extremely plain white prison uniform. It will crumble with the slightest breeze. Yu Ling Longs voice grew increasingly cold and piercing. This is the highest directive from above in the company. Chapter 86. The goddess of wars changing perspective. Are you the boss of your umbrella corporation? Upon hearing this, a ripple appeared in Yu Ling Long's cold and unwavering Phoenix eyes. The terrifying killing intent that had permeated the entire space slowly subsided.

She stopped pursuing the matter of Akasha's fate, which was tantamount to acquiescing to Leons plan. He is working hard for the future of the Umbrella Corporation.

Struggle. Yuling Long was no ordinary person. She grasped the indescribable deeper meaning behind those two words almost instantly. She didn't ask any more questions. Instead, she walked straight to the alloy sofa outside the detention room where people could rest and gracefully sat down, her skirt swaying. Lie Yun and Xiaoing were stunned. She spoke in a flat tone devoid of any emotion. Good.

The atmosphere in the corridor outside the confinement room was so oppressive that it was hard to breathe. If he angers this lady, she'll slap him until he's a pulp and he'll have nowhere to cry. An hour has passed. Upstairs, it was still quiet without the slightest sound. Leun was also getting unsteady on her feet. She secretly sent a mental message to Su Chingu.

Her voice filled with anxiety. Ching Zu, what's going on? Isn't this over yet? The goddess of war, Ling Long, is still waiting down there. Soon, the door to Sue Ching Xus private laboratory opened. The crisp sound of high heels approached from afar. He felt that he wasn't there to conquer a goddess, but rather to be dissected like a lab rat by a crazy female scientist. Such quickly and easily removed the cumbersome silk night gown from her body. Then that body hailed as the pinnacle of domestic production, a human nuclear weapon, extremely breathtaking and exquisitly voluuptuous. What's even more shocking is that she was wearing a carefully prepared, visually striking black lace lingerie set under her bathrobe along with matching garter stockings, a pristine white lab coat paired with decadent black stockings, intellectual gold rimmed glasses. Shiny Yuan's breath caught in his throat for a moment.

He felt the blood in his body boil completely at that moment. However, Suing Ju didn't give him any time to appreciate or savor the moment. She adopted a queen-like aggressive stance. She leaned down. Her stunningly beautiful and intelligent face close to his ear.

Don't move. Let me see. Her voice carried a hint of a scientist's composure and a hint of a woman's barely suppressed excitement. Your heart rate is accelerating, reaching 120 beats per minute. Your body temperature is rising at least 2Â° higher than normal.

Based on my S-level talent gene insight, I can see that the dragon energy within you becomes incredibly active when you are excited and even produces some strange energy mutations that I have never seen before. As she spoke, she extended her slender fair hand painted with bright red nail polish and began to touch his body. Every movement and every touch of hers was like the most precise scalpel, meticulously dissecting every inch of Shun Yuan's jeans. At the same time, her beautiful eyes hidden behind her gold- rimmed glasses shown with an increasingly bright light. And she muttered to herself, "This is so interesting.

It turns out that lust is the best catalyst for the power of your bloodline. When your desires reach their peak, the dragon energy within you will resonate with your spiritual power in a peculiar way, unleashing a terrifying energy activity far exceeding normal levels. if I could extract this energy and then utilize it. Her words made Shun Yuan feel like he had been completely turned into an experimental subject. This woman is still thinking about writing her lab report at a time like this.

At this moment, a man's dignity was severely challenged. That's enough. Shinuan suddenly reached out and grabbed Su Ching Xus slender hand, which was still taking a sample from his chest. The force was so strong that Su Ching Xus eyebrows furrowed. Dr.

Su, are you sure you've made a mistake? He stared into her eyes, which shown with fervor, and said, word by word, "I'm not here to help you finish some lab report, a brilliant counterattack." Shin yuan looked at the woman who had just dared to treat him like a guinea pig, her dark eyes burning with fierce flames. "Dr. Su, have you finished collecting your experimental data? Now it's my turn to test it myself. How much of your G-Level skill is actually real?" Startled by his sudden outburst and the wild look in his eyes, Su Ching Xus heart skipped a beat. But there was no fear in her eyes.

On the contrary, there was an even deeper almost frenzied excitement and anticipation. She likes this feeling. I like this feeling of being out of control where everything is beyond my control. Her beautiful eyes, which always shone with rationality, were now brimming with tears, revealing a yearning to unravel the talents of the strong and the powerful genes within them. Bring it on, she didn't back down at all and said in a cocketish tone almost defiantly, "Let me see if your clinical performance matches your seemingly perfect experimental data." As you wish.

Chapter 106. Old Chin slays the dragon. One man protects the nation. The deep abyss of the East China Sea, 10,000 m above the ground. This place is an absolute forbidden zone of the Dragon Sea Empire, shrouded year round by raging thunderclouds and dimensional storms that tear apart steel.

Ordinary fighter jets, let alone intruding, would be shredded into scrap metal by the terrifying power of nature, even if they came within a 100 miles. At this moment, a jet black fighter jet resembling the ancient mythical bird Kuan Pung ignored the devastating thunderstorm and silently tore through the clouds like a ghost hovering above the core of the restricted area. Inside the cockpit, Mr. Chen, dressed in a simple gray Jong Sean suit, was present. He sat cross-legged leisurely on the clean floor with a set of antique purple clay tea wear in front of him.

He remained calm as he brewed himself a cup of fragrant Dah Hongpow tea. It was as if he were attending a long-awaited tea party on the edge of a cliff rather than facing a cataclysmic star beast capable of destroying civilization. He picked up his teacup, gently blew away the foam, and spoke softly to the empty cockpit. Fire. A monochromatic female voice devoid of any emotion rang out in the cockpit.

Quimping received. Command confirmed. ElderQing. Divine punishment system activated. Target: Anomaly in the Earth's vain energy below.

calibrating launch trajectory. The moment the command was given, the smooth armor on the belly of the Ku Pong fighter jet, representing the pinnacle of the Longot Empire's technology, silently slid open, revealing a ferocious, massive cannon whose interior gleamed with destructive light. This cannon was one of only a handful in the entire empire. The Kuong fighter jet was specially configured for this elderly man. The main cannon of divine punishment is beginning to charge.

A beam of destructive light, brighter than the sun and powerful enough to pierce the Earth's veins, suddenly shot out from the cannon, tearing through the sky and the thick sea water and blasted into the deep sea dragon's nest that had been sleeping for nearly a thousand years with perfect precision. The next second, Roar Dash, a dragon's roar, originating from the primordial era and carrying endless savagery and rage, resounded from the seabed tens of thousands of meters deep. The entire East China Sea boiled at the sound of that dragon's roar. The sea surface was like boiling water, churning wildly and creating towering waves hundreds of meters high. A massive, indescribably thick column of water carrying the terrifying power to easily capsize an aircraft carrier shot into the sky.

At the top of the water column, a terrifying behemoth over 10,000 meters long with a dragon's head and a human body and covered in crimson scales like burning lava revealed its true form from the deep sea. Eastern candle dragon peak of the eighth realm, a cataclysmic star beast capable of directly confronting two or three human marshall emperors. The moment it opened its pair of scarlet vertical pupils, which resembled two blood moons, the sky over the entire sea changed color. The terrifying dragon's might, like a tangible shock wave, spread wildly in all directions, causing the surrounding dimensional storms to come to a standstill. Faced with this earthshattering power, Old Sheen remained calm and composed.

He slowly finished the last sip of tea in his cup before leisurely standing up. With one step, his figure appeared outside the fighter jet, standing with his hands behind his back in the void. The marshall will of a ninth realm demagod on his body transformed into an invisible barrier, completely isolating the dragon's might, which was enough to make even a seventh realm war emperor tremble from the outside. Not even the hem of his simple Jehong suit was stirred. looking down at the candle dragon below, which was staring at him with eyes that looked down on an ant.

Old Sheen's voice was calm, yet it clearly carried for miles around. Eastern candle dragon, I have come to take a drop of your heart's blood for the continuation of the human race. Would you be willing to give it to me? These words sound like a discussion, but the tone revealed an undeniable intent to plunder. The Xulongs scarlet vertical pupils were filled with extreme contempt and tyranny. It opened its huge mouth, which was big enough to swallow mountains, and spoke in human language.

Its voice was like an eternal ice that exploded between heaven and earth. "You ant, how dare you negotiate with me? Die?" Before he finished speaking, a dark red dragon breath, 10 times more terrifying than the main cannon of heavenly punishment and capable of instantly evaporating the entire East China Sea, transformed into a pillar of death that pierced through the heavens and earth and roared toward the location where ElderQ was. Faced with this devastating attack, old Chin neither dodged nor evaded. He simply raised his right hand, fingers pointing like a sword, and gently slashed forward at the oncoming dragon breath of death. Certainly, a single word spoken becomes law.

His marshall will, which had accumulated his life's cultivation and touched the threshold of the ninth realm, transformed into an invisible chain of laws at this moment, freezing the terrifying dragon breath, which was enough to destroy a city in midair. Time seemed to stand still at that moment. Julong's scarlet vertical pupils widened instantly. What kind of power is this? Isn't this old man a Marshall emperor level expert from the human race? Before it could even react to this unbelievable scene, Old Sheen's figure appeared as if by teleportation in front of its massive mountainlike chest. He still held his fingers together like a sword and gently touched the hardest and most fatal reverse scale on the heart of the candle dragon.

Broken click. A crisp cracking sound rang out. That seemingly indestructible shield, strong enough to withstand a direct hit from a tactical nuclear weapon, shattered like fragile glass. Without pausing for a moment, Shinlau's fingers pierced through the broken scales and tough dragon skin, precisely probing into the heart of the candle dragon, which was beating violently like a small sun. Photographed.

Using his finger as a guide, he forcefully extracted a drop of heart blood the size of a thumb from that enormous heart. A drop of crimson gold blood containing an indescribable amount of life energy. Puff. After doing all this, Old Sheen instantly returned to his fighter jet. As soon as he regained his footing, he abruptly covered his mouth.

But a mouthful of dark blood, which he couldn't suppress, still gushed out from between his fingers, and his face turned as pale as paper in an instant. The old wound that had plagued him for nearly a century. The one he sustained while protecting the Dragon Sea Empire from the siege of three Federation 9th Realm Marshall emperors was aggravated once again after he forcefully used his primordial will. Cough. Cough.

He coughed violently a few times. And looking at the drop of Zhuongs heart blood in his palm, which still radiated terrifying heat and boundless vitality, a relieved smile appeared in his usually gentle and wise cloudy eyes. He placed this precious drop enough to drive any martial artist mad into a specially made jade bottle, then raised his head, his gaze seemingly piercing through endless space, landing in the direction of the distant Umbrella Corporation headquarters, and murmured to himself in a voice only he could hear. "My child, these old bones of mine can't hold on for many more years. You'd better hurry up and become the leader of the Dragon Sai Empire.

Grow up quickly." Chapter 107. In the land of gentle comfort, a new family is formed. The next afternoon, Shinuan woke up on Su Ching Xus messy experimental table, which looked as if a category 12 typhoon had passed through. This woman's fighting power is even more terrifying than Long Yangs. The worst part is that she always pauses abruptly at crucial moments, pushes up her gold- rimmed glasses, which she seems to have put on again at some point, and begins to analyze his clinical performance in the cold tone of someone reading a lab report.

Heart rate 175, adrenaline soaring, dragon energy activity increased by 1.2%. This tactic is good. It can be included in regular research projects. The body temperature exceeds 39Â° C. The flame soul and dragon chi are beginning to show initial signs of fusion.

No, this method is too dangerous and could easily cause the experimental subject to spontaneously combust. It needs to be improved. He turned his head and glanced at his side. Such Chinhu, however, had already gotten out of bed looking radiant. Her exquisite gold- rimmed glasses had somehow returned to her high-nose bridge.

Her smooth seaweed-like hair was casually tied up with a pen, and her burgundy silk night gown was loosely tied. She was leaning against the headboard, intently recording something rapidly on the holographic screen in front of her. Her beautiful, intelligent, and aloof face was now filled with the fervor and satisfaction of a scientist discovering a new continent. During the intense 12-hour experiment, the experimental subject, Shun Yuan's body, experienced a total of 17 energy peak fluctuations. Three superc critical reactions occurred during the 3rd, 7th, and 11th hours.

The two SS level energies, Dragon Chi and Flame Soul, under a state of extreme excitement, generated a new fused energy with annihilation properties. Although the appearance of this energy caused the experimental subjects to experience weakness symptoms such as muscle soreness, lethargy, and lower back and knee pain in the short term, the overall activity of their gene chains actually increased by 0.13% during the process of annihilation and recombination. Interesting. So interesting. As Shin Yuan listened to her earnest academic report, he felt his kidneys begin to ache again.

That woman is a complete mad woman. He sighed inwardly, feeling that he was probably doomed to be controlled by this female demon for the rest of his life. Whether it's her G-Level human nuclear weapon or her S-level gene insight talent, they are practically her natural enemies. Su Ching Xu seemed to notice his gaze. She turned her head and looked at Shan Yuan's utterly exhausted appearance.

Looking at her like this, Shin Yuan felt his body, which had just been fed, become drymouthed again, much to his dismay.

That vixen, as evening fell, when Shin Yuan and Su Chingu entered the luxurious restaurant reserved for them, the scene before them startled him slightly. The large dining table was already full of people. Lynn, Sharon, Natasha, Ling, and even Lung Yu, the mature woman in black stockings who had been ignored by him just a few days ago, were all on the list. The huge restaurant had become his her tea party. The atmosphere, while harmonious, carried an indescribable eeriness.

Lynn Sharon, with a gentle and tender demeanor, was wearing a loose maternity dress and affectionately holding Long Yings arm, sweetly calling her sister Longing. and L Yings usually cold and aloof face showed a rare hint of gentleness at this moment. Although she was pregnant, her powerful SS level dragon soul battle body allowed her to recover extremely quickly. At this moment, she no longer showed any signs of the fatigue of the past few days. Instead, because of the new life force in her womb, which was connected to her by blood, her whole demeanor had become much gentler.

She had lost some of the sharpness of a warrior and gained more of the radiance of motherhood. She was enthusiastically discussing a thick several hundredpage prenatal education guide for dragon born shielan infants which such had just printed out with Lin Char who was also heavily pregnant and Natasha who stood to the side with a submissive expression. I think the guide is right. We should listen to more classical music to cultivate children's sentiments and artistic talents. Lynn Sharon stroked her lower abdomen, her face full of anticipation.

Our baby will definitely be a gentle and refined artist. Natasha shook her head, earnestly, retorting in her somewhat broken long shell language. Art can't put food on the table. I think he should listen to Imperial military briefings and Federation stock market analyses every day. We need to cultivate his strategic vision and business acumen from a young age.

The two were arguing and both turned their gazes toward Longing, who held the highest position. Longing pondered for a moment, her cool and pretty face becoming serious. What you're saying is useless. She looked up at the vast training field outside the window, her tone serious. While in the womb, a fetus is most sensitive to external energies.

Lynn Churin, Natasha, the two expectant mothers looked at each other, not knowing how to respond to Long Yings serious expression. Three expectant mothers from different countries and with very different personalities have formed a surprisingly harmonious transnational alliance of expectant mothers because of the common bond they share in their wombs. Only Lung Yu maintained the black stockings and bodycon skirt combat outfit that had allowed her to successfully seduce someone once, but which had also led to her being neglected. She sat alone in the corner of the dining table, swirling the red wine in her glass.

A stark contrast to the warm and harmonious atmosphere of the pregnant women's group over there. She was like a lone wolf rejected by its pack. Her eyes cold yet carrying an undisguised sense of loneliness and resentment. She firmly believed that Shun Yuan didn't choose her that night because she changed into that damn yoga outfit.

They are women, and even they are hard to resist. A silent plume of gunpowder smoke filled the air. Chapter 108.

She directly elevated her private affairs with Shun Yuan to a strategic level concerning the company's future. This made the petty jealousy and rivalry between Longing and Lung Yu pale in comparison. Ling was speechless and unable to refute. Are you suggesting that while you can do research, you shouldn't go to such extremes? How could she say such a thing? She could only treat the expensive piece of crimson flame beef on the plate in front of her as Su Ching Xus face, cutting it back and forth with her knife and fork.

She gripped the knife and forked tightly, looking at the carefully chosen, sheer black stockings on her legs.

A wilder, bolder idea began to sprout in her mind. Since the conventional approach isn't working, we have to use a more direct, more forceful, and more irresistible method. The dinner party ended in this strange atmosphere filled with tension. As Su Chingu left, she pushed up her gold- rimmed glasses on Shan Yuans nose. Behind the lenses, her beautiful eyes, shimmering with tears, silently invited him to continue their research that evening.

Shinyuan immediately understood. He quickly stepped forward, first speaking kindly to Ling, who was clearly growing jealous, then kissing Lin Char's cheek, who was already somewhat worried, assuring her that he would definitely come back early tonight. She had even lost the last bit of courage to go up and talk to him.

She watched as Shin Yuan followed another woman away without hesitation. Shin Yuan followed Su Chingu back to her private laboratory. He had expected tonight to begin another round of academic discussions about the mysteries of the human body. Contrary to her usual behavior, Su Chingu did not immediately make a move against him. Instead, he transferred a document to his personal terminal and his expression became very serious.

This is all the publicly available information about Mu Wan Bing and a psychological profile model built by the company's intelligence department based on all her past behavioral patterns. Such pushed up her gold- rimmed glasses, revealing a pair of beautiful eyes behind the lenses that sparkled with intelligence. This woman is extremely rational, extremely arrogant, and one could even say she has a somewhat antisocial personality. She had no interest in men whatsoever. In her eyes, men fell into only two categories: useful tools and useless trash.

Ordinary male charm has no effect on her at all. It may even arouse her strong aversion and contempt. As she said this, a sly smile suddenly appeared on her lips. So if you want to win her over, your brute strength and your decent martial arts skills alone won't do. You need to make her feel that you are smarter and more valuable than her.

Su Chinghu, whom Shin Yuan had personally hired, leaned close to his ear and earnestly warned him. Therefore, I have prepared a complete hunting plan for you. From the very first meeting, I've already planned everything for you. what clothes to wear, what to say, what tone to use, and even the exact minute and second to make the right micro expressions to perfectly capture her heart. Shinyuan was deeply shocked.

Looking at the strategist in front of him, who was giving him advice, he truly felt the terror of an S-level insight type talent. Its final effect still needs to be determined through a realworld simulation. So, she looked at Shin Yuan with a hunter's excited smile like that of someone spotting their prey. Before he could finish speaking, she had already raised her hand and lightly tapped the virtual keyboard on the control panel. Laugh. The heavy alloy door closed and locked with a dull thud as it released pressure. Suching Zhu turned around and gave Shin Yuan, who was dumbfounded, a smile that could charm the world. Simulation exercise now begins.

Shinuan, someone please save me. Chapter 109. Morning. On the morning of the third day, Lie Yun and Xiao Jingua hurried over to Su Ching Xus private laboratory carrying a speciallymade Shiin Bing jade bottle. Inside the bottle was the heart blood of the candle dragon, which the company's employee had personally retrieved.

Even through the jade bottle, one could still feel the immense hellish life energy and terrifyingly high temperature. When the heavy alloy door slid open silently, the two men stopped in their tracks, and their expressions were incredibly interesting when they saw what was inside. In the huge laboratory, Shinuan had dark circles under his eyes and pale lips. He was leaning weakly against the cold wall, while his other hand was holding a bottle of high energy nutrient solution that was thicker than his arm, which he was gulping down. His extremely weak appearance made even Xiao Jinga, a fifth level Grandmaster, twitch at the corner of his mouth.

On the other hand, Su Chingu looked radiant and full of energy. That exquisitly beautiful face, so intellectual and aloof, was flushed with a captivating blush, adding a touch of mature allure to her already captivating appearance. She was only wearing a white lab coat, the collar of which was wide open. The black lace dress that Shin Yuan had personally chosen for her the night before was faintly visible through the gaps in the white lab coat, sparking the imagination. She was leaning against the control panel, wearing her signature gold rimmed glasses, staring intently at the holographic screen in front of her.

Her fingers flew across the screen, recording dense data, while she muttered discontentedly like a tireless research fanatic. No, it still won't work. The experimental body's energy reserves are declining too quickly. The fluctuation rate of the simulation data in the second half of last night exceeded 15% which is not accurate enough. The variables must be strictly controlled.

We need to conduct another full 12-hour experiment tonight and try to keep the error within 5%. Upon hearing this, Shin Yuan, who was leaning against the wall and gulping down nutrient solution, felt his legs go weak and almost knelt down before this female demon on the spot. Are you coming again, sis? Are you doing scientific research or are you trying to kill me? "Our company's young master, Mr. Shan almost got himself killed by his own people. Serves you right. Lean was both annoyed and amused. She couldn't stand it any longer and gave Xiao Jingua a wink.

Let's go. Let's not get in the way here. Let's wait outside. Xiao Jingua coughed lightly, nodded in deep agreement, and pulled his wife out of the laboratory. The heavy alloy doors slowly closed behind them.

A full half hour later, the laboratory door opened again. Such came out. She had already straightened her white coat, but as she moved, she seemed to be adjusting the row of buttons on her chest. The top button was still loosely open, revealing a small patch of fair skin and delicate collar bone. The blush on her face didn't fade.

Instead, it made her even more radiant. Seeing Li Yun and Xiao Jingua waiting at the door, she calmly pushed up her glasses as if nothing had just happened. Lean pointed at her, so angry she could barely speak.

If you damage it, can you afford to pay for it? Su Ching Xu blushed at Leans words, revealing a rare hint of girish embarrassment and whispered a defense.

I I'm doing this for science. Besides, he's enjoying it himself. Lean rolled her eyes at her, which finally brought the topic back on track. After the joke, the atmosphere became serious. Ziaoin has solemnly handed the speciallymade jade bottle containing the blood of the candle dragon to Sue Ching Zhu.
