You must immediately set to work diluting and purifying it as quickly as possible and then preparing it into the core potion needed for the dragon blood tempering pool. Understood. Suing took the jade bottle, her beautiful eyes, which had just been filled with amusement, immediately becoming incredibly focused and fervent.

This is the lifeblood of a peak level star beast of the eighth realm. She was the legendary top tier experimental material that she might never be able to access in her entire life. Leun then walked up to Shinuan. Shin Yuan effective immediately. You will serve as our umbrella corporation's special technical adviser representing the company at the East China Sea branch of Tion Shin Industries to conduct final negotiations with the mysterious female CEO Mu Wan Bing regarding the construction project of the Dragon Blood Tempering Pool.

Shin Yuan felt the pressure mounting again. Such Ching Zhu seemed to sense his reluctance, so she walked to Shun Yuan's side and put a brand new miniature brainwave communicator, which looked no different from an ordinary earring, on his ear. She leaned close to his ear and smiled confidently. "Go ahead without worry, my experimental subject. I have obtained all of Mu Wan Bings public information through the Umbrella Corporation's internal network, as well as a top secret psychological profile of her written by a top federal psychologist.

During the negotiations later, I will provide you with tactical guidance throughout the process. The curve of her lips became increasingly cunning. I want to see whether her icy heart is colder or whether my genetic insight is superior. With Su Ching Xus powerful support as a guarantee, Shinuan's pressure was greatly reduced. Chapter 110.

The stunningly beautiful icy female CEO. Nighttime in the most bustling CBD of Donghai City. A skyscraper over 300 meters tall, entirely constructed of black glass curtain walls, stands silently in the city's night like a sharp sword piercing the sky. This is the East China branch of Tianin industry, a business giant with immense wealth that rivals that of a nation and controls the most advanced civilian technology in the entire Langia Empire. Top floor CEO's office.

The private magnetic levitation elevator doors slid open silently and Shin Yuan walked in alone. The office was incredibly large and incredibly cold. The floor was made of black marble that reflected people's images. And apart from the enormous obsidian desk and two chairs, there were no other decorations. Outside the floor to ceiling windows that cover the entire wall, the city lights are dazzling.

But here, one can only feel the loneliness of being at such a high place. Behind the desk, the legendary, eternally icy female CEO, Muan Bing, who was said to be even colder than Longing, finally appeared before him. She was looking down at a document and didn't even lift her eyes when the elevator arrived. A perfectly tailored silver gray women's suit skirt, the suit jacket unbuttoned, revealing a pure white silk shirt underneath, the shirt collar tied with an exquisite bow tie, exuding an austere yet capable elite aura. The bodycon skirt she wore hugged her shapely curves perfectly, and her straight jade-like legs encased in fleshcoled stockings were elegantly crossed.

Her appearance was impeccable with a classic oval face and exquisite features like works of art. Her long jet black hair was neatly coiled at the back of her head, adding to her aloofness and majesty. Appearance score 98 or above. However, her aloofness towards the world, coupled with a natural aversion to male creatures, makes her far more dangerous than Ling. Could this woman simply be a misogynist? Shin Yuan muttered to himself.

He cleared his throat, preparing to deliver a passionate opening speech according to Su Ching Xus script. Muan Bing didn't even look up. She simply raised her hand and interrupted him with a cold, emotionless tone. No need to introduce yourself. I'm not interested in who you are.

She pushed a pre-prepared document to the edge of her desk. Well discuss solutions. This woman is more difficult to deal with than I expected. Shin Yuan, on the contrary, found it rather interesting. He pulled out a chair and sat down opposite her in a very natural and unpretentious manner.

In his mind, Su Ching Xus slightly playful voice rang out. The target exhibits an extremely strong desire for control and a fastidious approach to efficiency. Let her make the first move and don't disrupt her rhythm. This type of extremely self-confident woman loves the feeling of being in control. The more you go along with her, the more she will lower her guard.

Shinyuan understood, picked up the thick document on the table, and actually started flipping through it page by page. When Muan Bing saw that he was actually looking at the documents instead of trying to make small talk like other men, a barely perceptible hint of approval flashed in her cold phoenix eyes. What she hates most is wasting time. I've seen the blueprints. Muan spoke coldly, pinpointing the core issue precisely.

The design concept was incredibly advanced, even groundbreaking. However, its feasibility was highly questionable. Most importantly, the 100 billion budget offered by your umbrella corporation is, in my opinion, a joke. She extended three slender white fingers like works of art and gently tap them on the table. To turn this blueprint into reality and achieve the desired effect, at least 300 billion is needed.

Furthermore, all core technologies, anti-gravity construction equipment, and nanocale precision machining are entirely the sole responsibility of Tianin industry. Your company is not allowed to interfere with the specific details of the project for any reason. 300 billion. Even though Shun Yuan was mentally prepared, he was still surprised by this woman's appetite. However, Mu Wamings next words showed him what capitalist greed truly meant.

Once the project is completed, ownership can belong to your company. However, Tion Shen Industrial must be entitled to 30% of the project's net profit for the next 50 years. After she finished speaking, she leaned back in her chair, her cold phoenix eyes looking at Shun Yuan with the sharpest scanning lenses. Do you have any objections? Or to put it another way, can you make this decision on behalf of the Umbrella Corporation headquarters? Sending such an inexperienced young man from the Umbrella Corporation headquarters to discuss such a large deal with her is an insult to her and the entire Celestial Industries. She was prepared that if Shan Yuan dared to say no or show the slightest sign of difficulty, she would immediately end this pointless negotiation and unceremoniously ask him to leave.

Shiny Yuan's reaction was completely beyond her expectations. Faced with these extremely demanding conditions, Shin Yuan didn't even hesitate before closing the document in his hand and nodding decisively. No problem. Do as you say. These three casually uttered words caused a crack to appear on Mu Wan Bings icy, beautiful face.

Her delicate brows furrowed slightly, and a hint of anger flashed in her beautiful eyes. What she hates most is this kind of prefuncter and unprofessional attitude. You agreed so readily. Her voice was three degrees colder than before. Do you know what 300 billion and a 30% profit mean for a business project? Or perhaps you didn't understand what I just said at all and are just a puppet sent from above who only knows how to nod and bow.

Through the earphones, Su Chingu's suppressed, excited laughter could be heard. The fish has taken the bait. Her heart rate has increased by 8%. Her pupils have constricted by 0.2 mm and she's starting to get emotional. Now's the time.

Use the talking techniques I taught you to completely break down her defenses. Shinyuan put down the documents, leaned forward slightly, and stared intently into Mu Wan Bings cold eyes with his usually nonchalant dark eyes. He smiled. That smile carried a hint of mockery and a touch of compassionate pity. Mr.

Mu, the reason I agreed so readily is not because I'm stupid, nor because I'm some kind of puppet relaying messages. Rather, it's because I know that once this thing is built, it's impossible for it to generate any profit whatsoever. The 300 billion investment you mentioned and the 30% net profit dividend. Shinyuan looked at her face, which changed instantly and said word by word from the very beginning. It was a false proposition that never existed.

Chapter 111. Mu Wan Bing, who had been making outrageous demands, finally couldn't hold back anymore. These words stunned Mu Wan Bing on the spot. She had imagined countless negotiation scenarios and heated debates. She never expected that the other party would actually flip the table and tell her that the business model she had been talking about for so long was just a joke.

"What do you mean?" she asked, puzzled. Shinuan looked at her forced composure, but her eyes were beginning to waver and his smile deepened. He stood up and walked to the huge floor toseeiling window, gazing at the bustling and dazzling city night view outside, yet with undercurrents surging beneath, his voice becoming low. Mr. Moo, you've been in the business world for a long time and are used to measuring everything by money and profit, which is normal.

But in places you can't see, on this border of the East China Sea, in those no man's land shrouded by dimensional storms, there are tens of thousands of martial artists like me or even younger than me. They are just ordinary martial artists in the mortal world, but they are using their own flesh and blood to protect this prosperous land for us. Many of them are not very talented and have limited resources. They may spend their entire lives without ever breaking through even a small level. They could die silently at any moment in the battle against the star beasts, leaving behind not even a complete corpse.

In this pool, Shin Yuan turned around and in his dark eyes burned a raging flame. A flame called faith. It's not for making money. It is free for those martial artists who may give their lives for this world at any time. It is not limited to the warriors of our umbrella corporation.

It is a powerful tool used to strengthen the foundation of the entire empire, cultivate more powerful individuals, and prepare for the potential war of annihilation that may break out at any time in the future. Mr. Mu, you've been talking to me about prophets for so long. Did you make a mistake from the very beginning? His words were powerful and resounding like the sharpest sword, instantly cleaving open Mu Wan Binging heart, which had been frozen for many years and was now filled only with self-interest and scheming. Muan Bing was stunned.

For the first time, emotions of shock and disbelief appeared on that beautiful, usually cold, and expressionless face. She was born into one of the empires most prestigious families and received the most elite education from a young age. In her world, everything is tradable and everything has a price. She had never experienced such pure, selfless human compassion that disregarded all costs and was willing to sacrifice everything. I deep within her heart, a place she had long forgotten, even despised, seemed to be touched just as she was in shock and her mind was in chaos.

She didn't know how to answer this fatal question. Shin Yuan spoke again. This time, his voice was no longer as oppressive as before. Instead, it carried a roguish, cynical tone. Of course, I can understand the conditions you proposed, Mr.

Mu. After all, it's a 300 billion yuan project. Your ton shin industry should have some hope, right? He abruptly changed the subject, revealing an extremely smug and wicked grin. Let's skip the profit sharing and such. After all, this is a public welfare project.

Talking about money would only hurt our feelings. However, as a partner, Tion Shin Industrial must have priority access to this project. Is this condition too demanding? Muan being instinctively wanted to nod. This condition is reasonable. Shin Yuans next words, however, caused her pretty face, which had just begun to soften, to turn frosty again.

"No problem," Shin Yuan immediately answered for her. then with an extremely flippant tone, chuckled mischievously. However, let me make it clear from the outset that this is not the best approach. After this pool is built, my women and I will definitely go down there to consecrate it. If you want to try it, don't be picky.

We'll just use our bath water. You Mu Wan Bings chest heaved violently with anger at his flippant and rude words. How dare this man humiliate her. Shin Yuan continued to rub salt into her wound with a grin. Oh, right.

I almost forgot. I will also invite your sister, that globally famous singer, Ms. Mu Chingshi, to be the first to experience our soup. After all, I promised her a unique happiness at the banquet in front of everyone. Upon hearing this, Mu Wanings expression, which had been frozen for over 20 years, finally cracked.

She can no longer maintain her aloof and icy CEO image. He slammed his hand on the table. He stood up from his seat, pointed at Shun Yuans nose, and shouted angrily in a fit of rage. You're the shameless scoundrel who boasted at Zhao Yis banquet that he wanted to marry my sister. Shameless scoundrel.

Shin Yuan touched his nose, a very innocent expression on his face. Mr. Mu, you can't say that. This is mutual affection. How does that make me shameless? Besides, your sister herself publicly agreed that she would marry me after I win the Heavenly Pride tournament.

It's all in black and white and there's video evidence. As he spoke, he actually opened his personal terminal and a holographic screen was projected onto Mu Wan Bing less than half a meter away. The scene depicted is from the night of the banquet. Mu Wings pupils suddenly contracted. She saw her usually aloof and ethereal younger sister with flushed cheeks, her eyes brimming with an adoration and adoration she had never seen before.

Then under the man's affectionate gaze in the video, her silly little sister actually nodded heavily. That whispered yet perfectly clear voice recorded through the equipment said, "I will marry." It struck Mu Wan Bings heart again and again. Seeing her younger sister's shy and adorable appearance, completely blinded by love, she was so angry that she couldn't control the expression on her face. The Moo family cherished their precious little sister, protecting her with utmost care. Yet, she was easily deceived by this smooth-talking rogue with just a few words.

The sight of that smug, roguish expression almost gave Mu Wan being a stroke on the spot. Su Ching Xus voice suppressing extreme excitement and sly laughter rang out in the earphones at just the right moment. Well done. You hit her biggest sore spot. Quick, add fuel to the fire.

Tell her that her sister has much better taste than she does. At the same time, Su Chingu quickly transmitted a piece of Mu Wan Bings dark history, which was classified as SSS level top secret directly into Shun Yuan's mind through mental power. Chapter 112. The iceberg CEO's dark history is actually Akasha. Mu Wan Bing, one of the heirs of Tianin industry, has been a favored daughter of heaven since childhood.

But when she was 20, she suffered the biggest setback of her life. She once fell madly in love with a boy of ordinary background but with extraordinary talent. Despite the family's opposition, they used the vast resources of Tion Shun industry to cultivate and help him, transforming him from a penniles poor boy into the most dazzling dark horse in that year's Imperial Pride battle. However, the man to whom she placed all her hopes and feelings betrayed her without mercy after the battle of the heavenly pride for the sake of greater power and a more beautiful woman. He not only absconded with a core technology of celestial industries, but also defected directly to the Free Federation, becoming a senior adviser to the Federation military.

The one who lured him into treason was none other than Akasha von Rothschild, a direct descendant of the most prestigious family in the Free Federation, the Von Rothschild family. It is said that the man fell completely in love with Akasha after only seeing her face once, abandoning everything Mu Wan Bing had paved for him and followed her like a dog. just to become one of Akasha's many suitors. From then on, Mu Wambings personality changed drastically. She froze all her emotions, turning herself into an eternal iceberg that believed only in self-interest and loathed all men.

What? Shin Yuan was stunned the moment he received this information. Subconsciously, right in front of Muan Bing, he let out a heartfelt sigh into the air, the earphone. How could such a beautiful and extremely wealthy woman be dumped? How could such a smart and calculating woman be deceived? Is that man blind? This was a completely subconscious retort like the sharpest knife stabbing precisely into Mu Wan Bings already riddled heart to expose her most shameful and least wanted to be mentioned scars to her face. This is no longer just a humiliation. This is the most cruel way to desecrate a corpse.

However, in a flash, Shinuan remembered something else. Akasha Shinuan thought for a moment. What if the opponent was that woman? Shinyuan thoughts immediately became clear. He looked at Mu Wan Bing, whose face had turned pale with anger and suddenly grinned, muttering to himself in a tone of sudden realization. Oh, so it's that woman, Akasha.

Never mind then. He smacked his lips and commented with an air of seriousness. To be honest, if it were her, that guy's taste is actually pretty good. She's beautiful, has a great figure, is capable, and has status. If it were me, I'd probably choose her, too.

Shut up. Muan Bing was trembling with rage. Her beautiful eyes churning with humiliation and fury. Akasha von Rothschild. This name is the biggest nightmare of her life.

It is the root of all her previous pain and shame. How did he know that name? How could they dare say such a thing to my face? You are not allowed to come near my sister again. Mu Wanings voice became somewhat sharp due to extreme anger, losing its usual composure. You're so glib and smoothtalking. At first glance, you look like a scumbag who specializes in deceiving women's feelings.

He's no different from that scumbag I knew back then. Oh. Shiny Yuan raised an eyebrow and intensified his actions. He and I are not the same. He paused, then continued in a nonchalant tone.

The woman he couldn't win over is now my prisoner. He doesn't even deserve to be a dog while I can make her have my children. So the happiness I can give to a woman is something you and that traitor can never imagine. Looking at the icy female CEO in front of him who had been driven completely out of control by his anger, he decided to add fuel to the fire and completely ignite this volcano that was about to erupt. Okay then, Mr.

Mu, let's make a bet. Looking into Mu Wan Bings angry and resentful eyes, he made a bet. Let's bet on this battle of imperial prodigies. If I win the final championship, you can no longer interfere with my relationship with your sister for any reason, and you must agree to one condition that you cannot refuse. If I lose, I promise to stay far away from her from now on and never see her again.

Seeing her wavering expression, Shun Yuan's smile deepened, and he added another heart-wrenching remark. And for your sister's sake, I can help you get revenge. That woman named Akasha is in my hands now. I can humiliate you 10fold for all the injustices you suffered back then, making her cry and beg for mercy. How about it? This bet gave Muan Bing, who was enraged and humiliated, a glimmer of hope.

Battle of the Prodigies. That was the highest level stage that brought together all the top young geniuses of the entire Dragon Xiao Empire. The man she had poured so much of her resources into nurturing only managed to get a top five finish. The man before them, though somewhat mysterious, was ultimately just a useless frank talent. What gave him the audacity to boast about winning the championship? He's humiliating himself.

As for Akasha, she was in his hands. In an instant, a piece of intelligence that had shaken the entire empire a few days ago flashed through Mu Wan Bings mind. A Marshall emperor of the eighth realm from the vaugh Rothschild family, disregarding the peace agreement, personally descended upon the border of the East China Sea and openly threatened the East China Sea military region, demanding that they hand over an important member of their family. For an eighth realm Marshall emperor to lose his composure like this, the identity of that important member must be extraordinary. Could he be telling the truth? The woman who was high above him like a goddess who took everything from him has truly become his captive.

Good. Muan Bing stared at him calmly. Her rationality and calculations rekindled as a business queen. She practically gritted her teeth as she agreed to the bet which she believed she was certain to win. I'll bet you contract.

She uttered two words. Shinuan smiled. He walked to his desk, picked up the cooperation agreement about the dragon blood tempering pool that he had just rejected, and signed his name on it with a flourish. Then the agreement was pushed back to Muan Bing. Mr.

Mu, please. Muan Bing looked at the agreement he had already signed and then at the man in front of her with a confident yet irritating smile on his face. A sense of absurdity welled up in her heart. I feel like I've fallen into a trap that she's carefully set up once again. She picked up the pen and with an almost cathartic force signed her name on the agreement when two names appear side by side on the same document.

A strange feeling inexplicably arose in Mu Wan Bings heart. It seems that this is not a commercial contract. It was a contract of servitude. After the negotiations ended, Muan Bing returned to her usual ICEO persona. She stood up, ready to leave this place of trouble and turmoil that was making her feel so upset.

Looking at her slender, upright figure, exuding an aura of aestheticism, Shinuan found himself genuinely intrigued by this seemingly cold but actually foolish woman. At that very moment, the office door was gently pushed open. A sweet-l lookinging, seemingly harmless female assistant, dressed in the standard uniform of Tianin Industrial walked in carrying two cups of freshly brewed coffee. She bowed respectfully to Mu Wand, "Mr. Mu, your car is ready at the entrance of the building." However, the moment she spoke, Shinuan heard Su Ching Xus incredibly sharp and urgent warning voice.

No, Shinuan, watch out. I monitored her and scanned her genetic sequence. Her genetic model didn't match the assistance in the database at all. She's an impostor. Her cellular activity and energy fluctuations were at least at the level of a fifth realm Grandmaster.

Moreover, her adrenaline and heart rate were extremely abnormal, carrying a strong killing intent. She's not an assistant. She's an assassin. Chapter 113. The Fifth Realm Assassin, ElderQen's Marshall Will.

Before the words were even finished, suddenly a fierce glint appeared in the female assistant's eyes. The two cups of scalding coffee in her hands silently disintegrated in midair as she handed them over. The brown liquid evaporated and transformed into two energy daggers that shimmerred with a ghostly blue light and were clearly coated with deadly poison. The assassination came without warning and its speed broke the sound barrier accompanied by a sharp whistling sound. It aimed directly at Mu Wanings heart and the back of her head from the left and right.

This is a fatal blow from a peak fifth realm Grandmaster. Protect President Mu. The sixth realm female bodyguard guarding the door shouted sharply immediately sensing the killing intent and sprang up to rush in. However, another accomplice disguised as a security guard suddenly attacked at the same time, unleashing an equally powerful aura that kept her firmly entangled outside the door. Death struck in the office.

Muan Bing watched helplessly as the two eerie blue beams of death rapidly magnified in her pupils. A look of horror and despair appeared on her frozen pretty face. Am I going to die? Die at the pinnacle of the business empire he built with his own hands. It's utterly ridiculous. In that split second, in the blink of an eye, life and death hung in the balance.

Shinyuan made a move. Without the slightest hesitation, the body's instincts outpaced the brain's thinking. He pushed off with his feet and shot out like a cannonball, rushing to the back of Muan Bang. Just a second before the two poison daggers were about to pierce her body. He opened his arms and pulled that perfect, delicate body, stiff and cold with shock, into a tight embrace from behind.

Then Shin Yuan used his not so broad back to face the two deadly blades of death. Don't want. Mu Wan Bing let out a scream, her voice filled with terror and trembling that she herself was unaware of. She was held tightly in the man's arms. Her cheek pressed against his warm chest, listening to his steady and powerful heartbeat.

That shameless scoundrel who had just fought with him and nearly made him lose his temper was now like a mountain, protecting him tightly behind his back. He used his flesh and blood to withstand a fatal blow that was powerful enough to pierce through the defenses of a fifth tier star beast. Why? Why did he save himself? I just looked down on him and called him shameless. That mad man. Time seemed to slow down infinitely at this moment.

Those two poison daggers seemed to grow infinitely larger in Mu Wan Binging beautiful eyes filled with fear and confusion. Just as the tip of the dagger was about to pierce Shin Yuan's back, a sudden change has occurred. The ancient jade pendant inside Shun Yuans clothes, which was personally given to him by ElderQ and engraved with a dragon pattern, suddenly burst out with an extremely dazzling golden light. A scorching heat through the fabric burned onto Mu Wanings cheek. Roar Dash, a dragon's roar, originating from the primordial era and carrying supreme majesty, resounded deep within everyone's soul.

A solid golden dragon-shaped phantom roared out from the jade pendant, instantly forming a semi-transparent golden shield that firmly protected Shin Yuan and Mu Wan Bang Clang. A crisp metallic clang rang out. The two poisoned daggers imbued with the peak cultivation of a fifth level grandmaster, shattered like fragile glass the moment they touched the golden shield, turning into countless points of light. Not even a ripple was stirred. The assassin, disguised as a female assistant, froze on his face, his sinister smile of certain victory gone.

It transformed into a terror and horror that came from the depths of one's soul. What kind of power is this? Martial arts will. Moreover, it is a top tier marshall will that has been condensed to the extreme and has even begun to touch upon the level of laws. This is at least the work of a martial god at the ninth realm, half marshall god. How could a mere fourthlevel grand marshall master possibly possess such a powerful protective treasure? The intelligence is incorrect.

This is a trap, a deadly trap specifically designed for these spies. The female assassin's heart sank to the bottom, and she turned to run away. Something even more terrifying happened. Within the golden dragon shadow coiled behind Shin Yuan, a blurry yet towering, aged figure materialized. His face was indistinct, but the oppressive aura emanating from him, which was as longasting as heaven and earth, and as radiant as the sun and moon, froze the entire space.

Those murky yet penetrating eyes glanced indifferently at the female assassin who was about to flee. Then he extended a thin, dry finger. He lightly tapped the air in the direction of the assassin. There was no loud noise, no energy fluctuation. It was just a casual gesture like shoeing away a fly with a single finger.

In an instant, that top assassin at the peak of the fifth realm Grandmaster, her body was like a sand sculpture that had been weathered for thousands of years, turning into the finest gray white powder inch by inch, starting from her feet, gone with the wind. Not a single trace of blood was left. One finger can instantly kill a peak fifth realm cultivator. What incredible divine power this is. Outside the office, the assassin, disguised as a security guard, was terrified the moment he saw this scene.

In order to survive, he decisively abandoned this almost impossible task and resolutely burned his essence and vital energy, turning into a streak of blood red light, trying to escape through the window. The aged figure standing in the void didn't even bother to glance at him. He merely let out a cold, indifferent snort from his throat. Snort. Words become law.

The assassin had already rushed to the window. Under the horrified gaze of the female bodyguard from the six realms, his body, like his companions, turned into dust and ashes. The terrifying pressure came quickly and went quickly. The golden light faded. The dragon's shadow vanished, and the aged figure disappeared as well.

The huge CEO's office fell into a deathly silence. Only the intertwined heartbeats of Shun Yuan and Mu Wan Bing remained in the air. Shin Yuan still held her tightly, his strong arms not loosening in the slightest. Mu Waminging body had already gone limp. She leaned against the man's chest, her mind blank.

Chapter 114. The intelligent life formed Starbara. In the headset, Su Ching Xus voice for the first time lost its usual languidness and playfulness, becoming unusually serious. Shinuan, are you crazy? Don't be so reckless next time. The dragon soul jade pinned contains Elderqin's marshall will.

Each use weakens it by one point. Your life is more precious than a hundred Mu wandings. Hearing Su Ching Xus exclamation, Shinuan felt a wave of fear wash over him. He glanced down at the icy beauty in his arms, who was still in a state of extreme shock and hadn't come to her senses yet, and couldn't help but mentally complain. Damn it, this woman is truly a fem fatal.

Even discussing business with her can attract two assassins at the peak of the fifth realm. If I were to actually marry her, I'd probably be living a life of constant danger and conflict. But he felt the perfect delicate body in his arms, trembling slightly, but not breaking down and screaming, and smelled her unique, cool, and alluring fragrance. Faced with an assassination attempt of this caliber, the woman's body merely stiffened, and her breathing only became slightly more rapid. It seems this isn't the first time she's faced such a horrific assassination attempt.

Shin Yuan released the icy beauty who was still in a daysaze from his arms. Mr. Mu, are you all right? He looked at her and couldn't help but ask. Muan Bing was startled awake by his voice. She staggered and leaned against the cold wall before she could barely stand.

She looked at the two piles of ashes on the ground, no longer recognizable as human figures, and felt a lingering fear. At this moment, the female bodyguard at the sixth realm finally reacted and rushed in. When she saw this strange scene in the office and Mu Wanings pale face, she felt extremely ashamed and fearful. Mr. Mu, I have failed in my duty.

Please punish me. She knelt on one knee, blaming herself and asking for punishment. Muan Bing simply waved her hand weakly to stop her. His gaze filled with complex emotions fell upon Shinuan. This man, whom she had just despised and even called a scumbag and a shameless scoundrel, shielded her with his body at the most crucial moment without a second's hesitation.

In that instant, it felt as if her frozen heart had been gripped by a large burning hand. The man who betrayed her for power and beauty, and the man before her, who selflessly saved her without hesitation. Two figures crossed her mind, the contrast so stark, so ironic. The terrifying power emanating from the small jade pendant on his body enough to instantly kill someone at the peak of the fifth realm shocked and intrigued her. Who exactly is this man? Why would there be such a powerful protective treasure? Just as she was feeling extremely confused, she suddenly noticed that Shun Yuan was staring intently at her face without blinking.

The look in his eyes didn't seem like he was looking at someone who had just gone through a life or death experience. It was more like he was admiring a rare treasure. Shinuan was indeed looking, but not at her face. He was looking at the system panel that popped up on her face. Target: Muan Bing, age 30.

Talent: Business Genius: Gradea A. Realm: None. Appearance rating 99. Peerless beauty. Body rating 96.

Golden ratio abstinence type perfection. Status single innocent. Overall rating 98. God tier. Ding.

A god tier target with a score of 98 or higher has been detected. Special strategy mission issued. Melting iceberg. Mission objective. Achieve a 90% heart rate with the target Muan Bing and win good luck.

Personal reward. Obtain the cosmic treasure. Intelligent life starbala. Another godle player. Another 98 points.

Shin yuan's heart pounded wildly. His gaze fixed on the reward. The intelligent life form starbala. He immediately clicked on the detailed introduction. The intelligent life form starbara originating from the core legacy of the ancient technological civilization at in the Milky Way galaxy.

This civilization once dominated a star system but was destroyed in a war against the Zerg. Starbara is one of the few surviving remnants of its civilization. She possesses a portion of AT's technological database, cultivation system, and the ability to assist her master in ultra- high precision calculations and combat simulations. What Shin Yuan was utterly shocked. A legacy of a civilization.

The value of this reward is beyond words. This is even more exaggerated than the dragon blood tempering pool. Muan Bing noticed that Shun Yuan was staring at her face with increasing intensity in his gaze, making her very uncomfortable. Her fair ears unconsciously flushed slightly. She looked at Shin Yuan, opened her mouth, and said, "Thank you.

Thank you very much. I owe you a favor." This was the first time in her entire life that Muan Bing had ever said, "Thank you." or "I owe you a favor to a man." Shin Yuans next words, however, caused her emotions, which had just calmed down, to fluctuate again. Is a simple thank you all it takes? Shin Yuan snapped out of his days, grinned, stepped forward, and leaned close to Mu Wan Bings face. Then he pointed to his chest, and said incredulously, "Mr. Moo, I took this for you.

Even though it didn't block anything, the thought was there, wasn't it? Look at my heart. Still pounding for you. It's still not quite over yet." Having just survived an assassination attempt, Shinuan was still trying to claim credit. Mu Wan Binging pale face couldn't hold back any longer, and an unnatural blush appeared. But after all, he had just been prepared to risk his life to save her without any hesitation.

This shameless, even somewhat frivolous way of taking credit made her feel angry, inexplicably, and also a little amused. It seems that a crack has indeed appeared in that heart that has been frozen for many years. Whether in the past or now, she has always relied solely on herself, always being the one who has given the most. But now, a man is risking his life to protect her. It would be a lie to say I wasn't even a little bit tempted.

If it were my past self after experiencing this scene, I might have actually fallen in love with him. She didn't know how to repay this profound kindness. He had no choice but to take out a black card with the words God branded in pure gold from his expensive limited edition handbag and hand it to Shinuan. There are 50 billion in this. Consider this payment.

Having experienced so much, she believes that there is nothing in this world that money cannot solve. If so, it means there isn't enough money. Shin Yuan didn't even glance at the black gold card that could drive anyone crazy and simply pushed it back. He shook his head, his smile becoming meaningful. Mr.

Mu, you've made a mistake again. I have no interest in money. If you really want to repay me, why don't you? He paused, looked into Mu Wan Bings beautiful eyes filled with doubt and weariness, and then made a condition that she had not expected. Will you grant me a small request? What are the requirements? Mu Wan being frowned. a sense of vigilance rising in her heart.

She didn't believe that this glib tonged, scheming man would make any serious requests. Could it be that she wants me to marry her? The moment the thought popped into her head, she nipped it in the bud. Impossible. Absolutely impossible. How could I have such an absurd thought about him? Chapter 115.

The female CEO sprained her ankle. What a great opportunity. Just as she was lost in thought, Shinuan spoke up. His smile was so nonchalant, but what he said stunned Muan Bing on the spot. My requirements are very simple.

From today until the Dragon Blood Tempering Pool project is fully completed, you muan Bing must remain at the Umbrella Corporation headquarters as the chief technical director of this project to personally oversee its progress. And during this period, you must be available at any time on call 24 hours a day and unconditionally cooperate with all my work arrangements as your special technical adviser. What do you mean? Mu Wamings face turned cold. Why would she, the president of a multinational corporation with trillions of assets, condescend to be his technical director, and they also have to be on call 24/7 to cooperate with his work as an adviser? Am I not clear enough? Shin Yuan's gaze swept over the two inconspicuous puddles of ashes on the ground, and his tone became a bit more serious. Today's assassination attempt has proven that you, the president of Tian Shin Industries, have become a thorn in the side of some people.

Shin Yuans words were like a needle, precisely piercing the most taught string in Mu Wan Bings heart. A flicker of emotion crossed her cold, beautiful eyes. Indeed, in the past 6 months, there have been no fewer than five attacks and accidents targeting her, each more dangerous than the last. The old guys on the board of directors have hinted to her more than once to be careful, implying that they are afraid that if something happens to her, the backbone of the company, it will affect the stock price of Tianin Industrial. She never imagined that the other party would actually use two grand masters of the fifth realm to assassinate her on the top floor of the heavenly god industrial branch building.

Do you think that with the strength of your sixth realm marshall king bodyguard, he can guarantee your safety 100%. Today, only a peak fifth realm warrior has arrived. What about next time? Could it be a sixthrem warrior or even a seventh realm war emperor? With each word Shin Yuan spoke, Mu Wandings face grew paler. The female bodyguard from the sixth realm, who was kneeling on one knee at the door, lowered her head in shame, her back soaked with cold sweat. Staying at the Umbrella Corporation headquarters gives you plenty of opportunities. You can take advantage of your proximity, right? These last words struck Mu Wan Bings weak spot precisely.

She is a businesswoman, an extremely shrewd businesswoman who always pursues the maximization of profits. She was well aware of the strategic value of the dragon blood tempering pool. It's healed. No, it's stronger than before. The stolen drop of heart's blood did not weaken it. Instead, it acted like a key, unlocking some kind of shackle deep within its bloodline and plunging it into endless rage. It seeks revenge.

It wants to use the blood and whales of tens of millions of lives in this city to wash away the humiliation of being offended by ants. All Titan class city defense cannons immediately enter unrestricted firing mode. Throw cannonballs into that sea like they're free stones. All aerospace fighter squadrons take off immediately. Form the first line of defense.

Slow down the beast tide at all costs. Notify the logistics department. Bring out all of our company's inventory ofqi and blood enhancement potions. Distribute them immediately to every frontline martial artist. Inside the command center, a distress signal with the highest level of encryption SS was also sent at the speed of light to the capital city to the Ling Long War goddess, one of the five pillars of the human race who was stationed in the center.

Inside the Umbrella Corporation headquarters, alarms blared continuously. Inside the training room, dressed in a black, tight-fitting combat suit, Lung Yu held a highfrequency battleblade that exuded a chilling aura, her icy blue eyes filled with intense fighting spirit. She was the first to rush towards the elevator platform leading to the ground level city wall. Immediately afterwards, longing appeared. She too changed into a crisp military uniform and her usually cold and aloof face was filled with the determination and resolve of a warrior.

She was pregnant, but the powerful protection of her SS level dragon soul battle body and her terrifying strength as a grandmaster who had just broken through to the fifth realm allowed her to still possess the combat power of her peak period. She gently stroked her still not fully showing belly, and the new life force connected to her blood brought a touch of tenderness to her cold eyes that she had never shown before. "Child, don't be afraid," she murmured softly in a voice only she could hear. "Your father is a jerk, but also a treasure, and your mother is a future war goddess. Today, I'll give you a sneak peek at what true protection is.

Our long family's children grow up listening to the sounds of gunfire from the womb. That's the ultimate form of prenatal education. Meanwhile, in the laboratory that had just hosted a heated academic seminar, Shin Yuan and Su Ching Xu also rushed out from the messy operating table. When Shin Yuan saw Ling with her slightly protruding belly, rushing towards the battlefield without hesitation through the shared screen in the command center, his eyes turned red. A surge of anger and heartache exploded in his chest.

"That's my wife. Damn it. She's carrying my father's child. I'm going to, he roared, and without thinking was about to follow in Lyings footsteps and charge into the battlefield. My wife and kids are here.

I have to go protect them. Chapter 121 sued Ching Xus other side. Feelings heat up. Just as he was about to rush out of the laboratory, a voice came through the miniature communicator on the headpiece. Shin Yuan returned to the lab.

Immediately, it's Le Yun. Shin Yuan was stunned on the spot. He looked at the screen at the fierce battlefield where the vanguard of the beast tide had already clashed with the enemy and at Ling, who was about to stand firm against the endless siege of star beasts. He spoke angrily into the communicator. Leon, what nonsense are you spouting? The beast horde is at our doorstep.

You wanted to go back. My pregnant wife is still out there working herself to the bone for me. You expect me to be a coward? This is an order. Over the communicator, Lie's voice became increasingly resolute. This is a top level directive from the company.

Your talent, your body, there's no room for error. Your battlefield isn't here. After a brief pause, Leons tone softened slightly. But what she said next left Shin Yuan and Mu Wan being next door speechless. The candle dragon is a calamity level star beast at the peak of the eighth realm.

Even if the god of war, Ling Long arrives in time, she can only repel it, but cannot kill it completely. We need a new eighth realm powerhouse to completely suppress it and protect the peace of our East Sea. Lie's voice became incredibly serious and cruel at this moment. Immediately, right now, take Su Chingu back to the lab. Use every method at all costs to get her.

This is your battlefield. The sound from the communicator abruptly stopped. Shin Yuans mind went blank, his nerves torn apart by a fierce struggle between reason and emotion. Such walked over from behind him. That usually radiant, intelligent face now carried a hint of morbid excitement and a fanatical awareness that one could sacrifice everything for science.

She reached out her hand as if trying to grab Shin Yuan. Did you hear that, my dear Mr. Shin? Her voice was deep, filled with a deadly allure. Our battle has only just begun. After saying that, she grabbed Shin Yuan's still somewhat stiff hand and dragged him back to his private lounge without saying another word.

Bang! The alloy door closed again. This completely shut out the deafening sounds of artillery fire and the earthshattering battle cries outside the door. Inside the lounge, the pink lighting remained ambiguous. Shinuan, however, was like a wild beast trapped in a cage, his eyes bloodshot, staring absently at the battle monitoring light screen on the wall. Let me go.

Shinyuans voice was hoarse as he tried to break free from Su Ching Xus grasp. Calm down. For the first time, Such Ching Xus tone carried a reprimanding tone. She stood in front of Shun Yuan, staring directly into his eyes that seemed to be spitting fire. What realm are you at now? A fourth realm Grand Marshall master.

What can you do if you go out? Cause trouble for longing or become a piece of meat in the mouth of a star beast, distracting her to save you? She's a fifth realm Grandmaster, an SS ranked dragon soul battle body. Her physique far surpasses that of ordinary people. Xiao Jingua and Li Yun are both in the command center. Do you think they won't be paying close attention to her? She's much safer than you. Shinyuan knew that what she said was true, but that's the truth.

He had to watch helplessly as his woman fought valiantly outside while he stayed here. How could he possibly accept this? Seeing the lingering struggle and pain in Shan Yuans eyes, Su Ching Xus gaze softened surprisingly. She released his hand, stepped forward, opened her arms, and gently embraced the man who was suffering greatly. Her voluuptuous, soft, and warm body clung tightly to him. I know you're worried about her, and so am I.

Su Ching Zhu rested her cheek on his shoulder. Her voice no longer the coldness of a scientist, nor the allure of lovers, but a rare tenderness and firmness. But Leun is right. Our battlefield is here. Have you forgotten? What was your reward for completing the mission? You know better than I what that 5% means.

It means that tens of thousands of dragon brilliance and tens of thousands of cold moons will be born in the future. It means that we will have more confidence when facing the next or even more terrifying beast tide. So put away your useless personal heroism. She looked up her beautiful eyes which always gleamed with a probing light behind her gold- rimmed glasses staring at him intently. Be a man and fulfill your mission.

Shiny Yuan looked at her at the rationality, gentleness, and determination in her eyes. The rage and fury in my heart miraculously subsided. "Yes, what's the use of jumping around in a panic here? It's meaningless except for self-pity." He pulled the beauty in his arms, even tighter, burying his face in her fragrant hair. His voice muffled. "I see." He raised his head, and his dark eyes had regained their clarity.

Since that's the case, then I can't let my messy personal hobbies get mixed in anymore. The task must be completed as soon as possible. He looked at Su Ching Xu with a smile that was more like a grimace. Dr. Su, thank you for your hard work.

Su Ching Zhu was slightly takenback, then burst into laughter. She gently patted his back as if comforting a sulking boy. Looking at her current appearance, Shin Yuan suddenly said something as if possessed. Did you know the way you are now compared to your white lab coat, your G-cup figure, and all your usual weird and wonderful activities, more attractive? Such brain went blank for a moment. The personal terminal on her wrist emitted a sharp alarm.

Heart rate 185. Adrenaline levels too high. Dopamine levels warning. Data overflow. Such hurriedly turned off the damn alarm, revealing for the first time the embarrassment and shyness of a young woman in front of this man.

She pushed up her gold- rimmed glasses, which had slipped down her nose and cleared her throat, trying to appear calm. "Well, since you've already figured it out, then don't waste any more time. Every second outside, soldiers are sacrificing their lives." Her voice returned to its usual cool and aloof tone, but her slightly trembling eyelashes, and the way she avoided meeting Shaun Yuan's gaze betrayed the turmoil in her heart. The academic discussion is now beginning. Chapter 122.

Natural disaster strikes. A great wall of flesh and blood formation. Woo woo dash. The piercing shrill alarm shattered the tranquil night sky of Donghai city without warning. This is not a drill, nor is it a warning.

This is the highest level of blood red alert, signifying that the annihilation of the city has already arrived. A death now. The bustling city that never sleeps seemed to be instantly silenced, falling into a deathly stillness for a second. The next second there was utter chaos and panic like a volcanic eruption. A beast tide.

A beast tide is coming. Run. Get to the shelter now. On the streets, citizens, their faces ashen with fear, screamed and cried as they frantically rushed toward the nearest underground shelter entrance, dragging their families along with them. The hover cars crashed haphazardly through the crowded streets.

Alarms, cries, and collisions blending into a symphony of impending doom. Some elderly people who had experienced the last beast tide had a numbness etched into their bones. They mechanically held their grandchildren's hands, constantly muttering, "Hurry up." The horrific scene of that bustling metropolis being submerged by endless star beasts and millions of lives being turned into blood and gore is a nightmare etched into the genes of every Dragoxia person. At this moment, the nightmare begins again. Inside the Umbrella Corporation, the atmosphere was heavy and oppressive, and the glaring red warning lights cast shadows of despair on everyone's faces.

On the huge holographic main screen, a terrifying scene resembling the apocalypse in mythology, is being displayed in real time. The black tsunami, hundreds of meters high, like a towering, moving city wall, is sweeping towards the coastline of Donghai City with overwhelming force. That's not seaater at all. That was a death wave formed by the flesh and blood of hundreds of millions of deep sea star beasts with ferocious faces and huge bodies. The overwhelming aura of ferocity seemed to penetrate the screen, causing even the seasoned warriors in the command center, who were used to life and death, to feel a chill run down their spines, and the air itself to become thick and cold.

Li Yun and Zhiao Jingua, who had already changed into black exoskeleton combat armor, were standing in front of the command platform at the umbrella base. Their faces showed no panic, only the iron will and composure displayed by highlevel martial artists in the face of war. Report: Titan main cannons numbered 1 through 30 are fully charged and ready to fire. Report: The three air-to-air fighter squadrons, Sword, Sky, and Thunder have all taken off. They are on route to their designated airspace.

Report: AllQi and blood enhancement potions in the company's logistics department have been loaded. The drone delivery system has been activated. Along that steel defense line stretching for hundreds of miles, 100 Titan class city defense cannons, each 100 meters tall, roared at the same time. Boom boom boom boom boom. Beams of destruction powerful enough to instantly evaporate a lake ripped through the dark night sky, striking the boundless tide of star beasts with unparalleled precision like punitive spears descended from the heavens.

In that instant, the sky was died a fiery white. An energy explosion erupted at the very heart of the beast tide, creating a small but massive wave and a storm of flesh and blood. At the epicenter of the explosion, the smaller low-level star beasts were instantly vaporized and evaporated before they could even scream. However, this saturation firepower coverage, which would make any highlevel human martial artist tremble with fear, was like throwing a 100 pebbles into the ocean for the hundreds of millions of beasts. The light faded.

The central area that was bombarded was indeed largely cleared out, leaving behind a huge hole that was still churning with charred flesh and blood. But in just a few seconds, the hole was instantly filled by the endless horde of beasts behind it. Further away, those highle star beasts whose size was comparable to trucks or even small warships were tough and thick-skinned. After withstanding the bombardment of a main cannon, they were only shaken by the shockwave. Their hard shells didn't even have a single crack.

The devastating bombardment, on the contrary, completely unleashed their inherent ferocity. Roar dash. his dash. More ferocious and frenzied roars came from the beast tide. Their impact speed did not decrease, but increased inside the Umbrella Corporation's command center.

Everyone's hearts sank to the bottom as they watched the almost unchanged battle results on the light screen. Damn it. Zia Jinga slammed his fist on the hard alloy command platform and cursed. Are these bastards on drugs? They're even harder than last time. Lie's face was also extremely pale.

Her fingernails dug deeply into her palms and blood flowed down between her fingers, but she felt nothing. It's that candle dragon. It's using its dragon might to inflict some kind of buff on the entire beast tide. We must find a way to restrain it. That being said, everyone knows that this is an impossible task.

A cataclysmic star beast at the peak of the eighth realm unless a marshall emperor of the eighth realm like the goddess of War Ling Long personally arrives. Otherwise, any expert at the fifth, sixth, or even seventh realm would be no different from an ant in its presence. Report: The beast tide is only 10 km away from the coastline. Report: The First Energy Shields energy reserve has dropped to 30%. It is estimated to last for a maximum of 5 minutes.

Requesting tactical guidance. The urgent alarms and requests created an extremely tense atmosphere in the command center. Just then, a cold yet resolute voice came through from a separate communication channel. I am Longing. I will lead one of the company's Dragon Fong Special Forces teams to zone one to carry out a decapitation mission.

Target: All highle star beasts of the fourth realm or above into beast tide. The city walls must not be breached before I return. Upon hearing this voice, Leans heart tightened, and without thinking, she immediately spoke up to stop it. Longing, don't you know your current physical condition? Get back here immediately. That's an order.

All I heard from the other end of the communicator was a busy signal. Lung Yu and Ling guard the border city.

On the towering steel walls, cannon fire roared and smoke filled the air. Tens of thousands of warriors relying on the sturdy fortifications unleashed a barrage of firepower at the surging star beasts below. Most of them weren't even martial artists. They were just ordinary people with slightly better physical abilities. The standard issue energy rifles in their hands with a single energy bullet might only leave a shallow white mark on the carropase of those low-level star beasts.

But none of them backed down. Fear and tension were visible on their faces. But more than that, there was a deep-seated overwhelming hatred for these beasts who invaded our home. A die, you son of a All of you die. a young soldier who looked only 18 or 19 years old with a somewhat childish face, had bloodshot eyes, and was holding a heavy energy machine gun that was wider than his body, firing wildly at the area below.

The terrifying recoil made his frail body tremble, but his finger on the trigger remained as steady as a rock. His name is Wong Hu, and he is a local from Donghai City. His parents died in the last beast tide when he was 10 years old. He would never forget that day, the overwhelming monsters and his parents' torn, bloodied bodies. From that day on, he vowed to join the army and avenge his parents with his own hands.

He's going to kill all these beasts. Damn it, I'll fight you to the death. His comrades in arms were also roaring and howling. Some of them did it to protect their wives and children. Some people do it to avenge their deceased relatives.

What sustains them is no longer cold orders, but the purest and most fervent patriotism etched into the bones of every lung sha person. However, individual bravery always seems insignificant and powerless against the grand backdrop of racial warfare. Boom dash, a deafening explosion. The first energy shield on the outermost edge of the city wall finally shattered like broken glass after withstanding the frenzied attacks of hundreds of millions of star beasts for more than 10 minutes. Without the protection of the energy shield, the black beast tide instantly surged to the foot of the steel city wall.

Countless enormous star beasts with sharp limbs began to frantically climb the vertical steel wall hundreds of meters high, relying on their terrifying brute force. Fire. Fire freely. Shoot them down. On the city wall, the company captain in charge of command let out a horse roar.

Countless energy projectiles and small rockets rained down on the climbing star beasts. The defensive capabilities of these star beasts far exceeded their expectations. Most of the attacks only resulted in a series of powerless sparks flying off their hard shells. Only a few shells which happen to hit their eyes, joints, or other vulnerable parts can blast them off the wall. Ah, a scream.

A massive armored crablike creature the size of a truck and equipped with two enormous iron pincers successfully climbed the city wall. Its massive claws, gleaming with a cold metallic light, were simply flicked. He then cut the soldiers in front of him along with their weapons in half at the waist. Blood and inrols instantly splattered all over the cold steel floor. You beast, I'll fight you to the death.

A surviving martial artist watched his comrade in arms with whom he had spent every day died tragically before his eyes and his eyes instantly turned red. He roared, clutching the last individual energy cannon in his arms and charged towards the rampaging armored crab beast. He wanted to die together with this beast just as he was about to rush towards the giant beast. A graceful figure in icy blue appeared silently before him like a ghost. She was a stunningly beautiful woman wearing a black, tight-fitting combat suit with short, neat hair and an icy knifeike demeanor.

It was a cold moon. She extended a fair, slender hand, which contained the power of the four realms. Facing the armored crab beast that was about to swing its giant claws again, it gently grasped its claws in midair. Click. A crisp sound of bones shattering rang out.

That fourthrem armored crab beast, with its terrifying giant claws capable of cutting through steel, was actually crushed to pieces in midair by an invisible, extremely cold force. Roar. The intense pain caused it to let out a painful roar. However, this is just the beginning. A cold, murderous intent flashed in Longus's icy blue eyes.

She slammed both hands onto the ground. Glacier, a visible, extremely cold aura mixed with countless ice crystals spread wildly outwards from her center. In an instant, within a radius of 30 m, all the star beasts that were climbing the city wall froze in their tracks. A layer of frost shimmering with a ghostly blue light had formed on their bodies. The blood is frozen.

The action was delayed. Under extreme cold, that hard shell gradually became fragile. On the city wall, the soldiers who had been terrified were quickly brought to their senses after a brief moment of shock. Fire. Fire now.

It's instructor Lung Yu. It's Lord Lung Yu. Brothers, the goddess has come to our rescue. Shoot these frozen scumbags down. Countless energy projectiles poured down once again.

This time, the results were outstanding. Those frozen star beasts were like live targets, easily shot off the city walls. In just a few dozen seconds, this already precarious defensive line was completely cleared out. The soldier who was prepared to perish together with the star beast stared blankly at the unbelievable scene before him and then looked at the ice goddess who simply stood there and suppressed an entire battlefield. There was no sense of relief at surviving a disaster in his eyes.

Only the purest, deepest worship and awe for the strong. With a thud, he knelt on one knee and gave a perfectly standard military salute to Lung Yus back. Thank you so much, Lord Lingua, for saving my life. The warriors behind him followed suit, expressing their utmost respect for the goddess who had saved them all. Those star beasts within the domain, whether they were the thick-skinned third realm iron armored tortoises or the incredibly fast fourthrem shadow leopards, all became sluggish and stiff the moment they came into contact with that chill. Thick frost had formed on their joints, making a cracking sound with every movement, severely affecting their mobility. Their blood flow rate is reduced to freezing point, greatly diminishing their strength and reaction speed. Now, focus fire. On the city wall, the commander in charge of this war zone seized the opportunity and roared at the top of his lungs.

Those were three genuine peak level star beasts of the fifth realm. Deep sea demon octopus, three-headed kisame, giant spirit crab king. At that critical moment, surrounded by the three-headed star beast king, Long Yings usually cold and aloof face showed no fear whatsoever. Instead, she raised a proud and battle ready smile.

From the early stage of the fifth realm Grandmaster, he soared directly to the peak of the fifth realm Grandmaster.

That oppressive aura even caused the three-headed star beast king's attack to falter. Chapter 125. The dragon slayer squad. A standoff between the eight realms. What is that? A dragon.

The sword in her hand had been sheathed at some point.

Natasha nodded solemnly, her charming face revealing an undisguised lingering fear. She probably didn't even use a tenth of her strength. Hearing the conversation between the two women, Muan Bing, who had been silent all along, suddenly narrowed her eyes.

She turned her head sharply, looking at the tightly closed door of the lounge room belonging to Shun Yuan and Su Ching Zhu with a completely new and scrutinizing gaze. This incredibly powerful woman also belongs to Shin Yuan. What makes that man so special? What secret does he hold? One question after another, like vines, entangled her rational and calculating heart. Her pretty face turned pale, and her breathing became a little rapid. Killing three king level star beasts of the same rank simultaneously would consume a huge amount of her energy. Just then, whoosh whoosh whoosh, seven sharp whistling sounds ripped through the sky from above Donghai City.

Seven black streaks like shooting stars tore through the clouds that were stained dark red by gunpowder smoke and descended from the sky at supersonic speed. They wore uniform black exoskeleton combat armor that symbolized futuristic technology with flight wings on their backs that spewed blue plasma flames and various ferocious looking special weapons in their hands. They were like black swords falling from the sky, precisely piercing the area where the beast tide was most turbulent and the highle star beasts were most concentrated. Slay the dragon, one of the empires most elite and most mysterious special forces units. arrive.

The leader, a burly man as tall as an iron tower, carrying a plasma battle axe the size of a door panel, let out a thunderous roar the moment he landed. The capital city has been slain. We have been ordered to come and provide support. Madam, go and rest. Well take care of the awful here.

He swung his plasma battle axe across the room with a sudden powerful motion. A terrifying fan-shaped electric arc half a hundred meters long erupted. Wherever it passed, dozens of fourthrem star beasts along with their hard shells were instantly electrolyed and carbonized by the high voltage current kill. The other 16 members also launched an attack at the same time. Some people wielded highfrequency battle blades, their figures as ghostly as they weave through the beast horde.

With each flash of the blade, the head of a highle star beast would inevitably fly off. Some people carried small positron cannons on their shoulders and each time they fired they could clear a vacuum zone with a diameter of more than 50 meters in the beast tide. These seven people are all genuine powerhouses. Their strength is at least at the peak of the fifth realm. The seven of them formed a perfect combat team like a highly efficient killing machine like a red-hot dagger easily tearing a huge gap in the originally impenetrable beast tide.

The pressure of besieging Ling and L Yu has been greatly reduced. Well done. Inside the headquarters command center of the Umbrella Corporation. Lie Yun saw this scene and excitedly slapped her thigh. Meanwhile, the Dragon Slayer squad forcefully penetrated the battlefield from the front.

Muan Bing, who had been watching the battle closely through screen sharing, finally felt a little relieved after seeing the turning point in the battle. Although she abhored war and killing, but she knew all too well that when the nest is overturned, no egg remains intact. The reason why Celestial Industries has achieved its current status is inseparable from the huge market of the empire and its relatively stable social environment. If Donghai City falls, her vast business empire will inevitably be greatly affected. Activate the level one emergency response plan for divine protection.

Muan Bing made a quick decision and issued an instruction to the personal terminal on her wrist. Order the underground production base of the East China Sea branch to deploy all the spider series combat robots and angel series flying medical robots in stock to the battlefield. With her command, the heavy alloy gate of the underground base of the East China Sea branch of Tion Industry slowly opened. Hundreds and thousands of spider-like combat robots equipped with G machine guns and micro missiles surged out from underground forming a steel torrent rushing to the front line. In the sky, hundreds of white medical robots equipped with nano repair beams and high energy nutrient solution injectors hovered above the city walls, beginning to provide emergency treatment to the wounded soldiers.

A soldier had just had his thigh ripped open by a star beast's bone spikes, bleeding profusely. The next second, an angel robot swooped down and a soft green light shone on his wound, causing his flesh to heal at a visible speed. These war machines developed by Celestial Industries, while unable to pose a fatal threat to highle star beasts, greatly relieved the pressure on ordinary soldiers. The casualty rate on the battlefield began to decline at a visible rate. The situation seems to be developing in a positive direction.

However, all the company's top executives knew that the real crisis was yet to come. Behind the beast tide in the deep sea shrouded in endless darkness, the candle dragon, a peak level eighth realm creature with a body length of 10,000 m and the size of a mountain, merely stared indifferently at everything before it. It didn't move because it could clearly sense two auras in the sky above Donghai City that made its heart pound. One of the auras was that of Chin Lao, the ninth realm demagod who had recently forcibly taken a drop of its hearts blood, causing it great humiliation. The other one was completely new, but it still made it feel a sense of threat.

It was an existence of the same level. Donghai City, 10,000 m above the ground. The space distorted slightly, and a woman dressed in exquisite crimson armor with a stunning figure, as if she had stepped out of mythology, stood quietly on the clouds. She was Ling Long war god, one of the five pillars of the human race who rushed from the capital the moment she received the highest distress signal. She didn't look down at the brutal battlefield below, which resembled a meat grinder.

Her phoenix eyes, which seemed to contain the birth and death of the universe, were fixed on the distant deep sea where the candle dragon was also watching her. The king does not meet the king. She knew very well that she only had one task, that is to restrain this beast king. Once she clashed with Zuulong, the devastating aftershocks of the battle would be enough to wipe the entire Donghai city along with tens of millions of lives off the map. This is a silent confrontation of will and patience between top tier experts.

With the combined efforts of many parties, after more than an hour of bloody fighting, the Beast Tide's frenzy defensive was finally contained outside the Great Wall of Steel. Undying dragon blood. Bloodline name undying dragon blood Srank. Bloodline type evolutionary. Basic ability martial arts compatibility greatly increases the speed of comprehension and practice of all dragon type martial arts and techniques. Innate divine ability.

Dragons might suppress his evil. This ability exerts absolute pressure on demonic beasts, alien races, and those with lower martial arts levels, causing their movements to falter and their vital energy to become disordered. The suppression effect is doubled against targets possessing dragon blood. Special feature one, dragon blood burning. When injured, it can burn blood and chi to accelerate wound healing, and even limbs can regenerate.

Special trait two, unyielding dragon soul. Immune to mental attacks and bloodline pressure below one's own cultivation level. Special feature three. Dragon devours all things. Can devour the essence blood of demonic beasts, martial arts crystals, and rare and precious materials, quickly replenishing and purifying one's own original blood and energy.

Note, this feature requires your bloodline level to be raised to SSS level to unlock and use. Undying dragon blood. A dash, a blood curdling scream, so shrill it was inhuman, escaped from Shun Yuan's mouth. He felt like his body was a balloon that had been inflated to its limit, about to burst at any moment. Every blood vessel and every meridian under the skin is twisting and expanding wildly.

The bones made cracking sounds as if they were about to break at any moment. An unimaginable high temperature rose from his dantion and instantly swept over his entire body. His skin turned as red-hot as a branding iron within seconds and even began to emit wisps of white smoke. What happened? The sudden turn of events startled Su Chingu, who was standing nearby. Without a second thought, she immediately activated her S-level talent, gene insight.

In her view, the gene chain within Shin Yuan's body was undergoing an unprecedented, even violent recombination and evolution. Countless old gene fragments were forcibly torn apart and shattered. Meanwhile, those newly formed golden gene chains containing the bloodline of the immortal dragon were forcibly merging into his body in an extremely savage way. This kind of evolution is too doineering. With Shin Yuan's current physical strength as a fourthle grand marshall master, he simply cannot withstand it.

If this continues, he will explode and die on the spot in less than 3 minutes due to the complete collapse of his genetic chain. Damn it. Such Ching Xus expression instantly became extremely solemn. Leian paused here, her tone revealing an undisguised fervor. This makes no sense and violates the law of conservation of energy, but it happened anyway. Real and efficient. Yu Ling Long narrowed her in different Phoenix eyes slightly, her gaze sweeping over every woman present. That's interesting.

Call longing exhaled a long breath of turbid air which shot out several meters away like a sharp arrow, creating a shallow crater in the ground. Regarding lowly star beasts as ants. Her heart is as still as water. For centuries, no man has been able to stir a ripple within her. To conquer such a woman, mere flattery and sycophency will suffice. Mission objective.

Imperial armor. Five sets. With this armor, the wearer can use the power of a seventh realm battle emperor to fight against ordinary eighth realm powerhouses. Three, mass-produced equipment blueprint. Throne armor 50 sets exclusive to sixth realm marshall kings increases combat power by 300%.

Four, several blueprints for mass-produced tier five and tier 4 battle armors will be added later. Looking at this list of rewards that was enough to drive the entire planet blue star crazy, Shinuan felt his blood boiling and burning. It directly elevates you to a whole new realm. Akasha's hair stood on end. It was an instinctive reaction when a creature encounters a predator. The ripple subsided. A figure dressed in a crimson robe with flowing clouds appeared out of thin air on the coffee table in front of the two. Jade exquisite.

She stood on one foot on the table, her crimson boots, the ones Shinuan had once offended, radiating a chilling heat. She looked down at the two people on the sofa, her indifferent phoenix eyes flashing with unprecedented surprise and murderous intent. Your majesty, the exquisite beauty. Shinuans throat went dry. Why was this woman like a ghost appearing without making a sound? Are you here to see me off? Yuling Long completely ignored Shin Yuans nonsense.

Her eyes, which seemed to pierce through the soul, fell upon Akasha. Just now, as the fighter jet was about to fly out of her perception range, she keenly detected a trace of extremely obscure yet powerful energy fluctuation. That's not the aura of a Grandmaster of the Fifth Realm. That's the aura of a marshall king of the sixth realm. Six realms.

Yu Ling Longs voice was clear and cold, yet it resounded like thunder in the cabin. Rothschild girl, if I remember correctly, you were only at the peak of the fifth realm when you were captured. Right. Yu Ling Longs tone was inscrable, devoid of any discernable emotion, yet chillingly cold. After being locked in a dark and secluded cell for more than 10 days, he not only did not weaken, but broke through the barrier and became a sixth realm marshall king.

She raised her eyelids, looked at Shun Yuan, and a dangerous smile curled at the corner of her lips. Little guy, don't tell me this is also thanks to your talent. Shinuans heart skipped a beat. Broken. They were so caught up in having fun that they forgot about this.

Akasha was already at the peak of the fifth realm, just one step away from the sixth realm. These past two days, she has been thoroughly nourished by his S-grade dragon blood. The wondrous dragon energy not only conquered her mind and body, but also directly helped her break through that bottleneck. The current Akasha is a genuine sixthrem powerhouse. What's the difference between this and carrying a nuclear bomb to the palace? Your majesty, please let me explain. Shinyuan forced a smile. It was indeed an accident. It was mainly because my genes were too outstanding. Just a little bit of them overflowed and she broke through.

And rest assured, she has completely reformed and turned over a new leaf. She's mine now. Are they your people? You Ling Long scoffed lightly, but the killing intent in her eyes not only did not diminish, but intensified. Akasha von Rothschild, the infamous black widow of the Commonwealth, is known for her deep, cunning, and ruthless methods. Would such a woman betray her family and her beliefs simply because she slept with you for a few days? Her increased strength only makes me feel that she is plotting something bigger.

Yuling Long slowly raised her right hand, and a ball of crimson gold flames suddenly ignited in her palm, instantly distorting and deforming the surrounding space. She really was going to kill someone. Huh? Akasha was startled and instinctively tried to mobilize her internal energy to resist, but under the pressure of the eighth realm marshall emperor, she couldn't even move a finger. Please stop. Akasha looked at Shun Yuan, who was so close to her, and at his eyes that had turned bloodshot from protecting her.

Back to the dragon's nest site. As soon as Shin Yuan stepped off the stage, Akasha pounced on him, her purple eyes sparkling. Dragon Lord, you were so cool. That slash was absolutely awesome. Shinuan laughed heartily.

Is that cool? It's just basic stuff. He sat back down in his chair, took the water lung you offered, and drank it all in one gulp. mad. Still that familiar madness, but this time no one thought he was showing off because he just proved it in the most brutal way. Shinyuan has the right to be arrogant. The first round of the Battle of the Prodigies came to a close in this dramatic and thrilling atmosphere. Cough, cough.

In midair, Su Xiao flapped her pink light wings and regained the spotlight. A wicked smile, however, lingered on her cute childlike face. With a low mechanical hum, the ground in the center of the arena cracked open once more. This time instead of cages, 100 streamlined silver white devices resembling space capsules rose up.

Su Xiao Yao excitedly introduced. The rules are simple. Once everyone enters the cabin, the system will directly read the deepest fluctuations in your cerebral cortex and generate a customized nightmare just for you based on your personality weaknesses, fears, and desires. In this dream, you will encounter the monster you fear most, the past you least want to face, or the temptation you find hardest to resist. She held up three fingers, her expression turning serious.

The longer you persist, the higher your score. However, if you suffer a mental breakdown or your heart rate exceeds a critical value within 3 minutes, you will be forcibly ejected. Then we'll eliminate you directly. Don't blame me for not warning you. Mental trauma is much harder to heal than broken limbs.

We won't be responsible if you end up with a mentally impaired mind. Before he could finish speaking, the entire room erupted in uproar. A spiritual trial. This is the most feared level for martial artists. Physical injuries can be healed with medicine.

I'll be right back. It'll only take me a nap. The dragon lord watched with concern in Akasha's purple eyes. Shinyuan waved his hand and casually laid down in his deep blue nightmare. The hatch slowly closed, plunging everything into darkness.

Outside, above the dragon's nest arena, the giant holographic projection screen was divided into 100 small screens, broadcasting each contestant's experience in the illusion in real time.
