A blizzard raged, leaving her all alone in the world, silent, cold, and utterly desolate.

That's absolute loneliness that can drive a person crazy. But Chin Schwe sat cross-legged on the icy plane. Her expression indifferent as ice, not even raising an eyebrow. Is this the heart of the ice phoenix? Embrace solitude. Dominate solitude.

On the other side, Xiao Hongi's illusion was a battlefield of carnage, a veritable hell on earth. Countless hideous demons crawled out from underground, trying to drag her into the abyss. No matter how noisy the outside world was, Shin Yuan, lying in the silver white space capsule, looked completely bored. Within the illusion, Shin Yuan was utterly bored. The illusions of beautiful women seemed to sense the man's heartlessness, gradually thinning and finally dissipating into pink smoke. The surroundings were plunged back into a void of darkness. That's it. Shinyuan sat up and patted off non-existent dust.

Is this the difficulty of the second level? It's way too easy. He looked around and saw that the darkness was not pure black but rather contained countless flowing data streams like the underlying code of some kind of program. Since this thing claims to be able to read memories deep in the brain, a bold idea suddenly popped into Shun Yuan's mind. From the moment he transmigrated until now, he has known nothing about this body or his mysterious past. Moreover, Shin Yuan felt that this body was the same as his original one, but the world he was in was different.

Otherwise, Shinuan wouldn't even realize he had a history of time travel. Old Sheen said he couldn't find it. The file was top secret. Does that mean that his original memories actually contained some truths that even he himself was unaware of? Since we're already here, why not give it a try? Shin Yuan closed his eyes, no longer resisting the mental connection of this system, and instead took the initiative to relax his mental defenses. The flowing data streams seemed to be subjected to some terrifying suction force, starting to spin and twist wildly, eventually converging into a huge vortex. Outside at the Dragon's Nest Arena, beep beep beep beep. The piercing alarm blared out without warning.

The giant sky, I number one, which was suspended in the air, suddenly began to tremble violently, and fine cracks appeared on its originally silver white mechanical shell. What's going on? The system is overloaded. Su Xiao Yao was so frightened that her wings froze, and she looked up in terror. Suddenly, Shinyu on screen, which had been full of pixelated images, went black. It's not black because the signal is interrupted.

It is a profound all-encompassing blackness seemingly capable of swallowing all light. Dark, an endless expanse of darkness. But this darkness is not empty. On the contrary, it is filled with a suffocating sense of oppression and an ancient and weathered atmosphere. Shun Yuan felt as if his consciousness had detached from his body, traversing endless space and time from a perspective that exceeded the speed of light.

He saw the blue star transform into a tiny blue marble and disappear rapidly into the distance. He saw the solar system and the Milky Way galaxy rushing past his feet like quicksand. Countless dazzling nebula, raging black holes, and desolate galactic debris flashed wildly before his eyes like a series of fast-forwarded slideshows. Final. The scene freezes on a completely unfamiliar starfield.

There is no starlight here, only endless void storms raging. And at the very heart of that storm stood a colossal bronze gate that defied description. That door is too big. It is so large that it seems to be able to fit into the entire solar system. The door was carved with countless ancient and intricate totems, including roaring dragons, phoenixes rising from the ashes, and countless other gods, demons, and strange beasts that Shin Yuan had never seen before.

They seemed to come alive on the door, silently roaring at the void. Where am I? Shinyuan's consciousness was so insignificant before this giant gate that it was not even worth a speck of dust. Just as he was overwhelmed with shock, the colossal bronze gate, which had been tightly closed for countless billions of years, suddenly moved. Rumble. No real sound came, but the tremor that came from the depths of his soul made Shun Yuan feel that his consciousness was about to collapse at any moment.

The giant gate slowly cracked open. It was just a crack. An indescribable aura of terror surged out from behind the door, traversing endless space and time and descended directly upon the blue star at this very moment. Outside the atmosphere of Earth at an altitude of 30,000 mi, the silver gay warship representing the seventh martial arts academy of the Star River Alliance was shaking violently like a leaf falling in a gale. if that man truly possessed such extraordinary abilities. She touched the fine lines at the corners of her eyes, a hint of madness flashing in her eyes. His bones were like jade, and his meridians were incredibly broad and resilient. Most importantly, her gaze fell on Shan Yuans lower abdomen, and she licked her red lips with the tip of her tongue. Primitive evolutionary factions. I want to bring my family. Shinuan felt a little uncomfortable with her blatantly lustful remarks and coughed lightly. Teacher Hua, I know I'm handsome, but your praise is making me almost embarrassed. Let's get straight to the point.

You came all this way in the middle of the night. Surely not just to give me a compliment. Juan Nonging toned down her flirtatious manner, and her expression became slightly more serious. Shinyuan, I have a question for you. Do you want to see the real universe? The real universe? Shinyuan raised an eyebrow.

That's right. Juan Nonging stood up, walked to the French windows, and pointed to the dazzling starry sky outside. Blue Star is too small for a genius like you. This place is like a shallow puddle. Even if you become the king here, even if you collect all the beauties on this planet, you will still just be a goldfish trapped in a fishbowl.

She turned around, her back to the starlight, and her whole being seemed to be bathed in a sacred glow. That's the stage you should be on. On behalf of the seventh martial arts academy of the Star River Alliance, I formally extend this invitation to you. Huan Nonging looked at Shin Yuan and invited him, enunciating each word clearly.

Become my personal disciple. Come with me. Seventh Martial Arts Academy. Shin Yuan leaned back on the sofa, his fingers lightly tapping the leather armrest as he chewed on these words. Although I had heard of this name from Elderqin and Le Yun before and knew that it was a sacred cultivation ground within the human race's territory, being invited in person by a top level instructor from there was still a different kind of impact.

Akasha, who was standing next to her, was so shocked that she stopped breathing. The Seventh Martial Arts Academy. And even the patriarchs of big families will treat you as an honored guest.

Going to a place like outer space sounds exciting, but what if you get bullied in an unfamiliar place? Moreover, Shin Yuan sized Huan Nongying up and down. If it were a country bumpkin who had never seen the world, he would probably be kneeling down and cowtowing in gratitude by now. Before Shinuan could answer, she began to count off her fingers as if they were precious treasures.

The mainstream one is the temple of war. Those muscle-bound barbarians who only know how to fight and kill all day long. They practice the path of physical ascension to saintthood, which is boring and tedious. Then there are the elemental towers, a bunch of charlatans who play with wind, fire, thunder, and lightning. They lock themselves in towers all day to study the laws.

Primitive evolution. Shin Yuan became interested. It sounded intriguing. What exactly did it involve? Huan Noming leaned forward and her delicate fragrance enveloped Shin Yuan once again. Simply put, it is about studying the most fundamental mysteries of life.

We do not rely on external objects or a single elemental law. We explore the infinite potential of the human body by studying genes, bloodlines, and the profound principles of Ein and Yang harmony. She stretched out her fingertip and drew circles on Shy Yuan's chest. Her voice becoming extremely seductive. Even Juan Noming leaned close to Shun Yuans ear, her breath as fragrant as orchids. I myself can also be your research subject as long as you are strong enough to withstand the teacher's guidance. Boom. Upon hearing this, Shin Yuan felt a surge of anger rising within him.

This isn't recruiting students. This is clearly inviting, you know. Moreover, it's the kind of good thing where you can learn skills and cough cough, cultivate yourself. If you refuse, are you even a man? However, Shin Yuan still retained a sliver of reason. He glanced at Akasha beside him, who though not daring to speak, had eyes full of grievance and worry.

He also thought of Lin Sharon, who was still waiting for him in the East China Sea, and of Ling, L Yu, and Su Ching Zhu. Teacher Hua, the offer is indeed very tempting. Shin Yuan suppressed the restlessness in his heart, but I have a problem. I love my home. Moreover, I'm a rather greedy person.

I can't bear to throw away any of the bottles, jars, flowers, or plants in my house. Shin Yuan pointed at Akasha, then pointed in the direction of the East China Sea. If I'm to go to the Department of Domain Studies, can I bring my family members? Bring family members? Huan Nong Yings smile faded slightly and her brows furrowed. It's all so comfortable. Chapter 172. The impatient mentor. Shin Yuan is reluctant to part with her. You, Shin Yuan's unyielding attitude made Huan Nonging laugh in exasperation.

Huan Noming sighed helplessly and gently tapped Shin Yuans head with her folding fan. I didn't say you had to abandon them. Let's compromise.

Who wants to elope with you? Juan Noming stood up, her purple Chong Sam taught with the movement, highlighting a stunning curve in her waist and hips. That was absolutely a forbidden power that touched the very origin of the universe. The source of this power lies in this seemingly carefree but actually unfathomable little man before us. Who is her majesty the empress? That is an existence that stands above all living beings in the universe and can cause even the Milky Way to flow backward with a single stomp of its foot. Over the years, the Empress has never shown even the slightest interest in any male creature. We might not even get to drink the soup. We must take it with us immediately. Huan Nong Ying abandoned her playful and charming demeanor, her tone becoming more serious than ever before.

Muan Bing stood her ground, her phoenix eyes filled with the shrewdness and rationality of a businessman. I'm the CEO and I'm responsible to the company's shareholders and Shin Yuan's assets. The laboratory's main control screen suddenly lit up with a red light. A highly encrypted communication request abruptly ended all the arguments. There was no image on the screen, only a simple file transfer progress bar. Sender Shinuan. Um, Su Ching Xu and Mu Waning stopped arguing at the same time and turned their eyes to the screen.

As the files were unzipped, two brand new holographic drawings instantly filled the entire laboratory space. The first item was a grotesque humanoid machine covered in black and red armor. Unlike those bulky traditional matchs, it is more like a sophisticated exoskeleton suit with a dense array of energy circuits hidden beneath its streamlined armor plates and even a pair of folding light wings on its back.

Next to the drawing, a line of large eye-catching text was marked. Guardian type one individual exoskeleton battle armor. Energy core miniature cold fusion battery formula attached. Armor material nanofluid alloy. Weapon system.

Highfrequency vibrating particle knife. Plus, shoulder-fired miniature tracking missile. Expected increase in combat power. Allows ordinary soldiers to possess strength and defense comparable to a third realm martial artist. Moderate mass production cost.

Chapter 1 75. Two girlfriends shake hands. Akasha finally has good luck. Alloy fiber. No, this thing is alive.

Su Ching Zhu stared intently at the blueprints for Guardian Type 1, her fingers gesturing wildly in the air as if she wanted to dismantle the Mecca through the screen. The exoskeleton's connection points utilize bionic neuron technology, meaning it eliminates the need for cumbersome button operations. A wearer's thought, or even a subconscious muscle twitch, can be perfectly captured and amplified a 100fold by the Mecca. This is a perfect fusion of human reaction, speed, and mechanical destructive power. Such Ching Zu became increasingly frantic as she watched, completely abandoning her aloof scientist persona.

She was practically glued to the control panel, her nose practically piercing the holographic projection and this miniature cold fusion battery. When her gaze fell upon the blueprints for the energy core, her breath caught in her throat, followed by a scream loud enough to shatter glass. Holy crap, how is this possible? Controlled nuclear fusion at room temperature, and the reactor has been shrunk to the size of a palm. This is a miracle that breaks down the barriers of physics. With this thing, let alone powering an exoskeleton, it would be more than enough to supply the entire power supply of Donghai City.

Compared to Su Chingu's passion for technology, Muan Bing, standing on the other side, had a completely different focus. Her Phoenix eyes, which had seen countless contracts worth hundreds of billions, were also fixed on the mass production cost analysis table for the cold nuclear fusion battery. Those strings of numbers that she had previously found dull and boring now seemed to transform into a flurry of banknotes beckoning to her. The cost is only onetenth that of traditional crystal energy. Mu wanings hands trembled slightly.

She couldn't even maintain her icy CEO demeanor and grabbed the edge of the control panel. Clean, efficient, with unlimited battery life and low cost. This isn't a battery.

This is a money printing machine. A direct route to the world's richest person. Muan Bing suddenly turned her head and looked at Su Chingu. Coincidentally, Su Chingu also looked up at her at that moment. Their eyes met in midair.

The tension from before was gone, as was the mutual dislike and disdain. It's a tacit understanding, a collaboration, no, a powerful alliance that only intelligent people can comprehend. Dr. Su Muan Bing spoke first, her voice trembling slightly with excitement. Yet, she tried her best to maintain the composure of a businesswoman regarding the budget for that dragon blood tempering pool.

Muan Bing raised an eyebrow, a confident smile curving her lips. Tion Shun Industrial has three superlar intelligent manufacturing plants in Dongghai with 20,000 high precision robotic arms.

He was like a magician. He could just throw something out and make those two arrogant women obedient. Three days passed in the blink of an eye. Ling Yun Pavilion Villa in the capital city.

The master bedroom door remained closed for 3 days and three nights. Apart from the occasional food delivery robot that goes in to deliver high energy nutrient solutions and top quality ingredients, no one goes in or out. Shin Yuan leaned against the headboard, his bare upper body covered in fine beads of sweat, his well-defined muscles looking as perfect as an ancient Greek sculpture in the morning light.

Lord of the Dragon Akasha let out a dreamlike murmur. Ding. Congratulations, host. Target Akasha has been successfully acquired. Good luck. Ding.

Detected SS level blood queen bloodline. Sixth realm marshall king physique. Calculating rewards. It's here. Shin Yuan's hand holding the cigarette trembled slightly, and his eyes burst with ecstatic light.

There was absolutely no need for him to take the initiative to guide them. That enormous energy which appeared out of nowhere poured into his limbs and bones. The meridians that had already reached their bottleneck were forcibly widened once again under the impact of this force. Every cell in the body is cheering, dividing, and reorganizing. The golden dragon shadow in the blood became increasingly solid, emitting deep dragon roars.

Shun yuan exhaled a long breath of turbid air which condensed and did not dissipate, turning into a white ribbon that lingered in the air for a long time.

Shinuan also wants to keep a low profile. Don't worry. Shin Yuan reached out and tucked the blanket around her, speaking softly. Now that you're my woman, I'll hold up the sky for you no matter what happens. He rolled out of bed, walked barefoot to the French windows, and pulled back the curtains.

The blinding sunlight instantly flooded the entire room. Shinuan narrowed his eyes and looked at the dragon nest arena in the distance, which lay like a giant beast in the center of the city. The final match is about to begin there today. Five realms middle stage. Shinyuan twisted his neck and his joints cracked like popping beans.

3 days later, this magnificent building, which can hold 100,000 people, was once again submerged by a surging crowd. Just a few days ago, they were calling me little sweetie, and now they're all calling that woman goddess. Even though Su Xiao Yao was unconvinced, she had to admit it. The stage in the center of the arena slowly rose. There were no backup dancers or fancy light shows. Only one spotlight shown on the beautiful figure standing quietly in the center of the stage. Long Sha was stunned by the beating. He received the highest level of royal martial arts education from a young age, which emphasizes exquisite moves and controlling the sword with chi. This is the full force attack of the purple demon eye, enough to instantly destroy the mind of a fifth realm expert. How could this kid be completely unharmed? It even surpassed the limits that the naked eye could perceive when a fifth realm martial artist was watching.

The audience below the stage only saw a blur before the tip of the spear pierced an inch in front of Shun Yuan's brow. There's no escaping it. This was the first thought in everyone's mind. This shot locked onto the enemy's vitals, sealing off all escape routes. Even Huan Nonging on the podium had her folding fan cracked from being squeezed.

This little girl is crazy. This is a desperate move. That kid is overconfident. On the arena, Shinuan did not dodge, or rather, he couldn't escape it. The extremely sharp spear and tent hadn't even touched his skin before it had already severed his protective dragon aura, and a drop of crimson blood seeped from between his brows.

The aura of death was incredibly strong. The S-rank undying dragon blood roared wildly in his veins, issuing a death warning. That's the feeling. In that life or death moment, Shin Yuans mind remained surprisingly calm. Everything around us seemed to slow down.

He could see the spinning patterns on the spear tip, the resolute killing intent in Xiao Hongs eyes, and even the dust floating in the air. Technique, move, variation. In Shun Yuans mind, all the exquisite marksmanship techniques he had previously stolen were shattered at this moment. In the face of absolute power, all fancy tricks are superfluous. Dragons don't need to learn how to use guns.

Dragons only need to use their claws to tear everything apart. Roar dash. A roar erupted from Shun Yuan's throat. The roar of the primordial ancestral dragon. Boom.

His blood and she instantly reversed direction and his heart like a high-pressure pump delivered all the power to his right arm. The crimson gold flames of the SS rank undying flame soul were compressed and compressed again and again, merging into that right fist. The flesh-coled fist instantly turned into a translucent dark gold, as if magma capable of destroying the world was flowing inside. "Break it for me!" Shin Yuan simply threw a punch, meeting the deadly spear tip head-on with a fierce slam. Only power, a power that is pure to the extreme and doineering to the extreme.

One force can overcome 10 techniques. One force can overcome all laws. Boom! Fist and gun collided violently in midair. Time seemed to stand still at that moment. Immediately afterwards, a white shock wave spread wildly outwards in a ring from the point of impact between the two.

Click, click, click. The special alloy arena beneath their feet, which was said to be able to withstand the bombardment of a Sixth Realm expert, crumbled and collapsed like paper, turning into countless fragments that scattered in all directions. The protective shield groaned under the strain, cracked, and finally shattered completely with a bang. A violent shock wave swept across the entire arena, blowing the front row spectators to their sides, and even Su Xiao was thrown dozens of meters away by the gust of wind. What was that? A nuclear explosion.

My eyes, they're so bright. Smoke and dust billowed, obscuring the sky and the sun. Everyone craned their necks and stared wideeyed at the center of the arena, eager to know the outcome. Who won? Is it the indestructible Crimson Lotus Spear? Is it still that doineering and unparalleled ancestral dragon fist? A few seconds later, a gust of wind blew by and the smoke and dust gradually dissipated. The arena had long since disappeared, leaving only a deep pit tens of meters in diameter.

Bottom of the pit. The two figures remained in the same positions they had been in when they collided. Xiao Hongi gripped the spear with both hands. The shaft bent into an astonishing arc, the tip pressed against Shaun Yuan's fist. Her red armor was mostly torn apart, revealing her scarred skin underneath.

Blood trickled from the corner of her mouth, and her face was as pale as paper. Shinuan, he maintained his punching stance. On that right fist, the flesh had already burst open, revealing the stark white bone, and blood dripped down the arm, but he didn't back down an inch. Those golden vertical pupils burned with a chilling fervor. Click, click.

A faint crisp sound rang out sharply in the deathly silence of the pit. Xiao Hongi's pupils suddenly contracted. In her hand lay a black and gold spear forged from meteorite iron which had accompanied her in battle for many years. A crack actually appeared starting from the tip of the spear. The cracks spread rapidly, crawling all over the gun like a spiderweb.

Impossible. Xiao Hongi was incredulous. This was her strongest attack. That bastard actually smashed it open with his fist. Nothing is impossible.

Shin Yuan grinned, revealing a mouthful of bloodstained white teeth. Xiao Hongi, your gun is tough, but my fist is harder. Before he could finish speaking, Shin Yuan suddenly exerted force with his right arm again. Broken. Bang dash.

The black and gold spear finally succumbed to the terrifying force and shattered into countless black fragments. Xiao Hongi lost her support and flew backward, crashing into the pit wall. Puff! She opened her mouth and spat out a mouthful of blood. We lost. We lost completely.

In his most prized field after unleashing his strongest attack, this man defeated him head-on with the simplest and most brutal punch. Who? His laughter extremely arrogant and smug. "Okay, then let's arrange for him to stay in the presidential suite in section A." "No need," Katarina interrupted him. "I heard Mr. Shan is staying at your company's most secure fortress number one. I see there are still rooms available there.

That's the Dragon Lord's palace." Akasha screamed. Perfect. This will make it convenient to report on work at night. Katarina's smile grew even more alluring. Shin Yuan felt several murderous auras locking onto him from behind.

Ling, L Yu, Muing Shua, and even Yuing Long, who had been watching the show, all had a playful look in their eyes. Let's decide on that for now. Shin Yuan gritted his teeth. Fortune favors the bold. Since you're here, your guests tonight, I'll host a welcome dinner for everyone.

With a wave of his hand, he quickly led the group of powder kegs deeper into the base. Lie watched a group of people leave, especially Katarina's swaying. Obviously, ill-intentioned back and felt her temples throbbing. Old Xiao exist. Have the entire intelligence department work overtime.

This woman's background is definitely not what it seems. Investigate her thoroughly. Also, raise the base's defense level to the highest. I have a feeling this woman isn't just here to give birth. Yes.

Chapter 200. Let's take action. First, we'll make Katarina one of our own. Half an hour later, inside the living room of Shun Yuan's extremely luxurious fortress number one, the atmosphere wasn't as harmonious as I'd imagined. Instead, it was eerily quiet.

Katarina didn't rush to the room she had stolen. Instead, she sat down in the center of the main sofa with an air of familiarity, her posture indicating that she was the lady of the house. Akasha sat down opposite them, fuming. Ling and Lung Yu stood on either side of Shun Yuan, looking like bodyguards ready to take action at any moment. Muing Shiwa, on the other hand, was somewhat at a loss.

This highle situation was clearly not something she, the newly crowned queen of pop, was used to. Only Yuing Long chose the furthest single sofa, toying with the Crimson Phoenix token in her hand without saying a word. A bystander who remains uninvolved. Mr. Shun.

Katarina swirled her wine glass, breaking the silence. There are no outsiders here. We can speak frankly about some things. Please speak, madam. Shinyuan sat beside her, not blinded by her beauty.

You have already seen the sincerity I brought. Katarina put down her glass, leaned forward, and the scent of tulips wafted over again. But this is just a deposit. If Mr. Shin can help me fulfill that wish.

I can offer him the entire west coast of the Commonwealth or even all of the Rothschild family's overseas assets. A wish? Shin Yuan smiled enigmatically. To have children, it's not just about having children. Katarina's eyes shifted slightly, and the doineering aura of someone accustomed to being in a superior position instantly surfaced. I want to use your seed to create an heir with god-like talent.

Then, with your influence, I'll get rid of that old geyser in the family. Oh, Shiny Yuan raised an eyebrow. Akasha sneered from the side, finally showing your true colors. I knew you weren't up to any good. You want to use the dragon lord to deal with great grandpa? Are you crazy? Great grandpa is at the peak of the ninth realm.

He's only one step away from becoming a 10th realm marshall god. So, what if he's at the ninth realm? A glint of madness flashed in Katarina's eyes. He's old. He's held his position for too long. The Rothschilds need new blood.

They need a stronger leader. She turned to look at Shaun Yuan, her eyes full of temptation. Mr. Shan, that old man possesses a secret navigational map to the Seventh Star region, as well as countless artifacts unearthed from ancient ruins. If we join forces, all of these are yours.

Shin Yuan stroked his chin, seemingly weighing the pros and cons. This is indeed a huge piece of fat, a navigational chart to the star system, a divine artifact. This is much more attractive than any crystal mine. But Shin Yuan's gaze swept over Katarina's voluuptuous body. This woman is too dangerous.

She's cunning and ruthless. Cooperating with her is like asking a tiger for its skin. Rather than cooperating, it is better to. A barely concealed malice flashed in Shin Yuans eyes. He suddenly stood up, walked behind Katarina, and boldly placed his hands on her rounded shoulders.

The lady's suggestion did indeed sound very appealing. Shin Yuan lowered his head, his lips brushing against her earlobe, his voice low and deep. However, since we're family, talking about a deal would be too formal. I'm not interested in those magical artifacts. I'm only interested in the lady.

Katarina stiffened, then relaxed, grasping Shin Yuans hand in return and smiling seductively. Mr. Shan can take it anytime he wants. Good. Shin Yuan laughed loudly, then suddenly winked at Longing and Lung Yu in the distance.

That was a pre-arranged code signal. Move. Kidnapping. Now that this woman has come to us, why should we let her go? No matter what schemes or tricks you have, just detain the person and sew the seeds of good fortune. If they become one of his own, then the Rothschild family will still belong to him.

This move is called catching a turtle in a jar. Ling and Lyu instantly understood. Plank. Longing transformed her hand into a blade, and a sharp burst of energy instantly locked onto Katarina's throat. Two ice swords appeared in Lung Yus hands, pointing directly at Katarina's brow.

At the same time, Shinuan suddenly exerted force on Katarina's shoulders. The power of the S-class dragon blood erupted, gripping her collarbone. "Excuse me, madam." Shinuan grinned, revealing a set of white teeth. "Since you're here, you're not leaving. Let's change the way we conduct this family meeting." The change happened in an instant.

Akasha jumped up excitedly, her palms glowing with crimson light, ready to deliver the final blow at any moment. She had wanted to get rid of this annoying ant for a long time. However, faced with this sudden attack and Shun Yuan's terrifying strength capable of crushing alloys. Despite being restrained, Katarina showed no sign of panic. She maintained her elegant posture, not even spilling a drop of red wine.

She merely turned her head slightly, looking at Shin Yuan, who was so close to her. Her beautiful, alluring eyes held not fear, but rather a hint of mockery. "Mr. Shan, your way of treating guests is a little rude," Katarina said softly. The next second, "Buzz!" An extremely obscure yet powerful aura that made one's soul tremble suddenly erupted from Katarina's body.

"That was not her power. That was a will." Boom! Shin Yuan felt as if his hands were gripping a red-hot iron, and a terrifying force of recoil shot through his arm straight to his heart. Shin Yuan grunted, his entire body being forcefully thrown back three steps by this force. The blade energy that Longing unleashed shattered just 3 in from Katarina. As if it had encountered an invisible wall, L used two ice swords hovered in midair before turning into dust.

What? Shin Yuan steadied himself. his golden vertical pupils contracting sharply. A faint golden light appeared around Katarina's body. Countless complex runes faintly flowed across the light barrier. And that aura, that's the power of the ninth realm, or even the power of a demagod at the peak of the ninth realm.

Is this the family's guardian seal? Akasha, standing nearby, exclaimed in shock, great grandpa actually planted the holy seal on you. How is that possible? That's a method that consumes your very essence. Katarina stood up gracefully, straightened her slightly wrinkled skirt, and her smile, though still charming, now carried a chilling air of composure. Akasha, you're still too young. Katarina shook her head.

Since I'm venturing into the lion's den, how could I not make some preparations? She glanced at Shun Yuan reproachfully, but it was more like she was admiring a mischievous little wild beast. Mr. Shan, this sacred seal was personally left behind by that ancestor. Unless you are at the peak of the ninth realm or a star lord of the 10th realm, no one can harm me in the slightest. Moreover, with a light tap of her fingertip, the light shield slowly disappeared.

If I am ever placed under a mortal threat, this holy seal will erupt in full force. At that point, not only this fortress, but the entire base will likely be raised to the ground. This Shin Yuan felt a chill run down his spine. This isn't just about capturing a beauty. It's like bringing back a nuclear bomb.

Moreover, it's the kind of smart nuclear bomb that's programmed to explode when attacked. Jade exquisite. Shinuan suddenly turned his head and looked at the woman who had been sitting in the corner watching the show and began to frantically plead for help with his eyes. Big sister, you're an eighth realm marshall emperor. Why didn't you make a move earlier? Now, only you can break this situation, right? Yuling Long sat there steadily, holding a teacup in her hand.

A clear cold voice resounded directly in Shun Yuan's mind. A mental transmission from an eighth realm expert. Don't look at me. That holy seal is indeed the primordial power left behind by that old codger. If I had forced my way through just now, I might have been able to break it.

But the aftershock of that explosion would have instantly turned you and all your little lovers into dust. Moreover, Yu Ling Longs voice carried a hint of shot and Freuda. Since that old man dared to let her bring the holy seal, he must have had a backup plan. Once this seal is broken, he will be able to sense it immediately from the Federation's side and will be able to use the seal to directly tear through space and descend. Do you want to start a war with a ninth realm demagod right now in the East China Sea? Shinyuan felt a chill run down his spine.

Damn it, why didn't you say so earlier? Shinyuan roared inwardly. You didn't even ask. Yuing Long replied with absolute certainty. Besides, judging from the way you were so eager to take advantage of her just now, you didn't seem like you wanted to listen to advice. Shinuan, this woman definitely did it on purpose.

She's definitely getting revenge for the time I took off her shoes and touched her toes last time for teasing her. The current situation is extremely awkward. Should we fight? We mustn't. Once that holy seal is triggered, we're all doomed. Hurry.

How do we hurry? They came with tens of millions of tons of supplies and they were also surrendering. If they were to turn their backs on them now, it would not only make Donghai seem petty, but more importantly, Shin Yuan would be reluctant to give up such a lucrative opportunity once it was within his grasp. That's the Rothschild family's estate.
